title: $6500 / 3br - 1900ft2 - 1/2 MTH FREE! Unfurnished modern 3bd+/3bth ++ Home in Serene Setting (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1/2 MONTH FREE RENT FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE-IN (Lease through June 30, 2020)!  
Contemporary, well appointed 3 bedroom/3 bathroom ++ home in the Berkeley Hills.  About 2,000 square feet of usable space, this home is nestled in serene setting surrounded by lush zen-like garden. Includes tastefully designed kitchen, 2 master suites open to backyard, with walk-through master closet, office space/den or workout room.  Finished garage can be used as a guest room. The home is on the 65 bus line, close to Rose Garden, Gourmet Ghetto, Solano Avenue, and one mile from the north entrance of the UC Berkeley campus.  Easy access to downtown and North Berkeley BART stations.
All Anderson Windows and French Doors -- double pane, energy efficient.  Wood floors throughout; bamboo and maple upstairs and European oak waxed floors downstairs.  Outdoor shed measuring 10 x 8 x 6 for storing sports equipment, tools, etc. 
Street parking is always available; Very safe neighborhood! The house is extremely private with bamboo hedges blocking the house from the street, very quiet.
Pets will be considered case by case, with additional deposit.  
Showing available now, by appointment only.
Lease Term: until June 30, 2020. Open to longer term lease.

title: $3185 / 2br - 910ft2 - 2 bed, 2 bath -- New remodel on Temescal / Rockridge / Bushrod Borders (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Available March 1.  
Newly renovated 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom in incredibly convenient location.  About 910 sf.  Owner lives in the building so everything is well maintained.  Open kitchen is completely refinished.  Washer-Dryer in unit. Dishwasher, garbage disposal.  Back yard area with shared patio (anyone can use it) and garden boxes for small gatherings, hanging out, etc.
Walking distance to Rockridge.  Also walking distance to downtown Temescal and all the shops on Telegraph Ave.  3 nearby BARTs makes getting into SF easy; bikeable to downtown Oakland or Berkeley.  Direct access to highways makes it really easy to get around.  Perhaps best of all, it is one block from both Bushrod Park and Dover Park.
Very easy parking.  Always spots available and no permits required.
Perfect for couples, roommates (2 bathrooms!), young families (both parks have great playgrounds and amenities).
Pets allowed.  Water is not separately metered, so $30/month/adult charge not included in rent.
$3200.

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1050 sq.ft $2600 per/month Available Now! 
Loft located in a 3 unit building. This is a 2 room loft (1 bedroom and another bonus room), and 1 bath. Great for people who don't want to live in a large complex. Located in Jack London Square, each unit features new kitchen appliances, hardwood floors, recessed and track lighting, and a bathroom with jetted tub. 
These lofts are ideally located within 1-4 blocks from the Oakland Estuary, Amtrak, BART, and highways 880/580/980 and 24, making an easy commute to San Francisco, Hayward, the Peninsula and Contra Costa County. It is walking distance to Jack London Square, Jack London Cinemas, Estuary Park, Oakland China Town, the SF Ferry and BART (only 15 minutes BART ride to SF). 
- Large dual-paned windows allowing abundant natural light in living area 
- Southwestern exposure offering partial view of the marina 
- exposed steel beams with high ceilings 
- Large bedroom with spacious closet 
- Beautiful hardwood floors on main level and carpet in bedroom 
- Bathroom includes granite vanity and tiled floor with jetted tub 
- Straight staircase leading to second level bedroom/mezzanine 
- Overhead track and other lighting throughout 
- refrigerator, gas oven/range, dishwasher and garbage disposal 
- Washer/Dryer all in one in unit 
- Steps to Jack London Square, Nido, Jack London Cinemas, Estuary Park and the SF Ferry and BART.

body:

Hi. I am looking for someone to take over the lease for my 1 bedroom apartment in the southside of Berkeley starting from March 2019. My lease ends on May 2019, and you have the option to renew it by discussing with the landlord. 
The apartment is located in a safe, quiet neighborhood. It is a 10 minute walk from UC Berkeley (Sproul Plaza) and 15-20 minutes from downtown (Shattuck Avenue). There is a bus stand 2 minutes away and the 51b line will also take you to downtown, or the Rockridge BART Station which is nearby. There is a CVS located close by, and the Berkeley Bowl Marketplace is also within walking distance.
The apartment is a spacious 1 bedroom with a large living room that can be converted into a double, in addition to the more private bedroom. The bedroom has a walk in closet as well as a regular one. The kitchen area is also quite spacious with plenty of storage space. It has laundry on site which needs a key to access and you can pay with a phone app (no need to get quarters from the bank every month). There is also a driveway where you can park your car. title: $1425 / 2br - 1 Private Bedroom in a 2BR Apartment (South Berkeley) (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Heyo! My girlfriend and I are looking for a single person to fill a bedroom in our two bedroom apartment in South Berkeley from April 1 - July 31.
The location is great! Neat and quiet neighborhood. 14 minute walk to downtown Berkeley BART stop and 15 minute walk to the Ashby stop. 
10 minute walk to Berkeley Bowl.
13 minute walk to Target (campus style)
17 minute walk to Trader Joe's. 
Walkable distance to everything in downtown Berkeley and AshbyAve. 
Walkable distance to UC Berkeley campus.
Amenities:
Entry gate
Bike racks inside gated area
Balcony
Furnished common space
One parking space included in the parking garage below (All yours!)
Coin laundry in the parking garage
Water is included in rent
Utilities:
$20 application fee (one time)
$14 / month for internet
$28 / month average for gas and electric 
About the Place:
Kitchen: Galley style, with open concept to living space. Recently renovated with quartz counter tops and grey floor tile. Stove/Microwave/Fridge included.
Bathroom: Same new grey tile as in kitchen, and glass shower doors (no curtains). 
Bedroom: Single window allows plenty of light in, especially in the mornings. Comfortably fits a queen size bed, nightstand, and dresser against the opposite wall. Floor to ceiling mirrored closet doors.
No additional pets per landlord's policy since we already have two :/ 
About My Girlfriend and I:
I work as a political staffer in Richmond and she works at an architecture firm in San Francisco. We clean up after ourselves and prefer common spaces clean as well. We love plants, books, board games, video games, TV shows, and movies. We have two cats that are litter trained, social, and really sweet. We are sure you'll love them too!
We are looking for someone employed or a full-time student for a year lease (until 07/31/19 - with option to renew closer to the date). If this sounds up your alley, we would love to meet you!

title: $3200 / 1br - 831ft2 - 1B/1B Furnished Apt, 1 block N UC Berkeley, sunny, spacious (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Attractive and sunny, upper floor, fully furnished one-bedroom apartment located one block north of the University of California, Berkeley campus.
Rent includes: water, garbage, complimentary WiFi, TV satellite service, electricity, gas, furnishings, linen and towels.  Available for short- and long-term rental.
For more information:
http://www.oxford-apartments.com/listing/1705-1-bedroom-apartment-berkeley-california/
Features include:
   Queen-size bed and linens
    Full kitchen with breakfast nook
    Housewares and utensils
    Dining room with table/4 chairs
    Living room with queen size sofa-bed
    Large closet
    48" Smart TV and premium satellite package
    Complimentary Wi-Fi
    Bathroom with tub/shower
    Courtyard
Walk to grocery stores, shops, banks, post office, public transportation and Berkeley's famous "Gourmet Ghetto" http://gourmetghetto.org/Home
Located in the vibrant and beautiful North Berkeley area, within one block of UC Berkeley campus and with a Walk Score of 97. The neighborhood features a variety of fine cafes and restaurants, including the world-famous Chez Panisse, the birthplace of fusion "California Cuisine."
A rich variety of grocery stores, bookstores, clothing stores, parks with tennis courts, bakeries, and a post office are all within short walking distance. Public transportation - including BART (Bay Area Rapid Transit) and a shuttle bus to the Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory - is also just a quick walk away.

title: $2995 / 2br - 760ft2 - 2bd/1ba with Parking + In-Unit Laundry + Hardwood Flrs (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1819 Carleton Street #B
- 2-Bedroom / 1-Bath, 760 sq feet
- $2,995 / month, $4,500 Security Deposit
- Available Now for 1-Year Lease OR Lease Ending May 31, 2019
- Utilities Included: Garbage
- No Pets / No Smoking*** For Viewings: Please email showing coordinator Greg(at)northberkeleyproperties.com ***
Completely remodeled 2-bedroom / 1-bath flat available at the 1819 Carleton Street triplex. This apartment features an updated kitchen + bathroom, in-unit laundry, and hardwood floors.
Kitchen was recently redone with quartz countertops and brand new shaker cabinets. Appliances (fridge / freezer + gas range) come included. A brand new stacked washer and dryer is on its way and will be installed soon.
Spacious living room area provides lots of open space for relaxing or entertaining guests. Both bedrooms located towards the back for more privacy. Each bedroom has its own dedicated closet space for ample storage.
1x parking space will be included and reserved for this unit. Surrounding area also has ample street parking with no permit restrictions for the neighborhood.
1819 Carleton Street is located a quiet tree-lined street a few blocks away from bustling Shattuck Avenue and less than 1 mile away from Downtown Berkeley or Ashby BART and UC Berkeley. Residents can also easily reach Berkeley Bowl for grocery trips, the new Equinox gym, and lots of other stores and restaurants on Shattuck Ave.
This listing is posted by North Berkeley Properties. Day-to-day management and lease signing handled by Owner. For more listings please visit us online at www.NorthBerkeleyProperties.com

title: $3800 / 2br - 775ft2 - 2BR/1BA FURNISHED Rental House-CC Accepted-AVAIL MARCH (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

AVAIL MARCH 2018




Furnished House For Rent/Lease - 2BR/1 full BA - Berkeley, California




Flexible Rent Durations




((House Available Year Round)) ((Right now available for move-in starting in MARCH 2019))


**** Full info with pictures: http://www.vitalita.com/rental/




THE MCGEE HOUSE - BERKELEY, CALIFORNIA



Contact owner from above web site.



Everything Included: No need to pay for utilities, internet or anything else.



(posted in "apts/housing for rent" since this house is available for periods 3 months or more)


When observing below rates, consider that:
            
               Guests will NOT have to setup or pay the following bills (all these bills are covered by the owner, so included in below prices):
               
               
               
               Electric Bill
               
               
               
               Gas Bill
               
               
               
               Water Bill
               
               
               
               Sewer Bill
               
               
               
 Trash Bill
               

               
 Internet Bill
               

               
 Telephone Bill
               
               
               
               (This could save guests almost $400/month)
               
               
            
Availability Varies - please check the AVAILABILITY CALENDAR on the below web site
(red dates are not available)




QUIET CENTRAL BERKELEY NEIGHBORHOOD HOUSE (part of side-by-side duplex):
            
               7 blocks from UC Berkeley and Downtown Berkeley (near MLK and Bancroft).  Very easy walk.
               
               
               
               Perfect for short-term rental (see below in pricing for details) - No need to pay utilities or for furnishings: everything is included.
               
               
               
               Fully remodeled house - quiet tree lined street - private fenced-in backyard 
               (other duplex unit has its own separate backyard).
               
               
               
               2 bedrooms (2BR) - one full bathroom (tiled floor) with tub and shower (1BA). 
               
               
               
               Hardwood floors - fireplace - no apartment above unit - only one common wall - lots of southern light - furnace for heat (separate WisperWarm heating in bathroom).
               
               
               
 All utilities at no extra cost: internet (as above), phone service (unlimited calls to US and Canada numbers - incoming calls - voice mail), and of course all basic utilities as well: electricity, natural gas/heat, water, and trash service. Also 40" Sony Google TV (with Netflix unlimited streaming subscription included - plus a DVD/CD player on a surround sound stereo system).
               

               
 Bedding and linens included: all sheets and towels are 100% organic cotton.
               

               
 Fully furnished: Washer/Dryer (W/D), all kitchen equipment (pots and pans, microwave, toaster oven, coffee/espresso maker), sofa, tables, chairs, beds, HD TV, etc.
               
               
               
               Perfect for visiting Cal faculty (15 minute walk to campus) or as a corporate apartment rental.  Great alternative to a hotel (only for stays 14 nights or longer).  Accommodates up to 5 persons.
               
               
               
               Environmental considerations: (1) House is carbon neutral - offsets are purchased every year from TerraPass (www.terrapass.com) based on energy used at the house. (2) Only environmentally friendly cleaners are used. (3) All linens are made with organic cotton.  (4) Green Purchasing Policy in place.
               
               
            


GREAT CONVENIENT BERKELEY LOCATION:
            
               7 blocks from University of California at Berkeley (Cal) campus (10 minute walk - about 1/2 mile).
               
               
               
               6 blocks from Downtown Berkeley BART station (train/subway) and all downtown amenities (restaurants, shops, cinemas, banks, library, buses).
               
               
               
               25 minute ride on the BART (train/subway) to Downtown San Francisco.  
               
               
               
               4 blocks from large grocery store (supermarket). 
               
               
               
               Close to everything, but a very quiet residential neighborhood.
               
               
               
               Very easy access to highway I-80.
               
               
               
               10 minute drive to downtown Oakland or Emeryville.
               
               
               
               One block to Berkeleys Bike network.
               
               
            AVAILABLE: 
Year Round (but right now, available for move-in starting in MARCH 2019); (See 
availability calendar on above web site to check dates) (see below for minimum booking fee)

LOCATION: McGee Ave at Bancroft Way; Berkeley, CA  94703 (Google Map)

CONTACT: For any questions, or to inquiry about specific dates, contact Mark using the contact information on the main McGee House web site (vitalita.com/rental) (email is usually the fastest way to reach Mark)


PRICING:

             
               Rates vary by length of booking.
               
               
               Current: For a Spring 2019 move-in (or later), minimum booking period is 3 months. Please inquiry.
               
               
               OVERALL RATE STRUCTURE:
               

                   Booking Length: 6 Months or more ==; $3800/month;
               

                   Booking Length: between 2 Months and 6 Months ==; $4200/month;
               

                   Booking Length: between 4 weeks and 8 weeks ==; $1300/week;
               

                   Booking Length: between 14 nights and 27 nights ==; $260/night;
               

               All above rates includes all fees, taxes, furnishings, linens, utilities (gas, electric, water), trash service, high speed internet service, Netflix streaming service, and telephone service (with free calls to US numbers). The only additional charge is a $100 cleaning fee.
               

               Payments can be made with credit card (MasterCard or Visa or Discover). Under certain conditions, paypal and wire transfer may also be options.
               

               Please inquire about your specific time period, and I can calculate the total cost based on these above rates.

title: $5700 / 4br - 1600ft2 - 4-bed, 2-bath, large, beautiful Apartment; UCB southside: June 1 (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This spacious apartment, measuring approximately 1600 square feet, is located on the second floor of a well-kept two-unit building and receives quite a lot of sunlight.  There are 4 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and a large kitchen with an eating area.  One of the bedrooms is large enough for 2 students to share.  The apartment features high ceilings, period details, and wood floors throughout.  There is also a washer/dryer and a forced-air heating system inside the apartment.   
The UC Berkeley campus is just a few blocks away.  Its size, condition, and location make it a very exceptional apartment.  No smoking.  No pets.  Garbage paid by Landlord.  Garage parking may be available for an additional fee.  Available June 1.  Rent is based on 4-students occupancy ($5900/month for 5; 5-students maximum occupancy).

title: $2060 / 1br - 6-Month Sublet 1 bdrm/1 bath apt in Downtown Berkeley next to BART (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello,
I'm looking for one person (sorry, no couples) to sublet my fully-furnished 1-bedroom, 1-bath apartment in downtown Berkeley for around ~6 months, starting in March and ending in August/September. Exact start and end dates can be flexible. 
The apartment is a newly remodeled corner unit, with hardwood floors throughout and new appliances. The bedroom is large and includes a walk-in closet. The location is fantastic, right in the heart of downtown Berkeley yet just far enough from Shattuck and the street noise. It's less than a 5 minute walk to the downtown Berkeley BART station, and easy walking distance to practically everything in downtown and to Berkeley Bowl and the Trader Joe's on University. Rent is $2060/month plus utilities and internet (<$100/month).
I'll be showing the apartment this upcoming week or so and hope to make a decision shortly thereafter. Looking forward to hearing from you!

title: $3595 / 2br - 63rd & College.Lower Flat!3 Blks 2 Rockridge BART!W/Parking!Avail Now! (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is it! In the Heart of Rockridge! This is what you have been waiting for! Available Now! Amazing flat with 1 bath near the Cole Coffee building. Hardwood floors. New Marvin Tilt Pac Double Pane Windows in Bedrooms! The location is optimal and provides for quick access to transportation, shopping and CAL. Living room has fireplace and beamed ceilings. Dining room has built in china cabinet, wainscoting, and beamed ceilings. Wrap around windows, including 1 bay window, provide for tons of sunlight. Sun room off of Living room. Large kitchen with tons of cabinets and separate pantry-Plus separate storage room. Sorry no dishwasher. Stainless steel gas stove and frost free refrigerator. Washer and Dryer included. Bathroom has tiled tub shower combination. Very nice closet spaces. Shared but, Very quaint and private courtyard area included. Quick access to restaurants (Wood Tavern), coffee shops (Cole Coffee), salons (The Nail Spa), and grocery stores New Safeway and Trader Joe's . Yoga Studio on the same block. Transportation: 3 blocks from BART and 4 blocks from CA-24. Conveniently located with easy access to San Francisco (15 min drive), Oakland airport (15 min drive) and a 10 min walk to BART (Rockridge station). Walk to casual carpool to SF at College Ave and Claremont Ave (less than one block). This is an action packed area and is not the quietest location. Please call Dan @  show contact info
 for more information. $40.00 application fee is required.

title: $3000 / 1br - Art Studio Made Into Fabulous Living Space (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Art Studio Made Into Fabulous Living Space
Your own private, entire first floor of a large modern Mediterranean home, high in the hills behind the Claremont Hotel in Berkeley.
A spacious separate living room, loft bedroom, two bathrooms, work area, elevator entrance, and front door entrance. Because of its architecture, nobody lives above you, below you or beside you. If you want silence or amplified music; it's your choice.Your private and separate space:Beautiful art studio made to live in, to the fullest!
Large separate loft space lit by 6ft. by 6ft. skylight. May be used as bedroom or workspace with amazing light.
The loft has a new clothes closet and bathroom with a shower. 
Main floor new second guest bathroom and a large storage closet. 
And, a project work area with solid oak butcher block workbench on casters under a ventilation hood. 
Plenty of room under the exhaust hood for any other portable equipment.
6 ft. butcher block table with storage underneath; all on casters so it may be easily moved to your favorite location - barstool seating, on three sides of the table, for five or more guests.
Excellent quality commercial sink with pull out pre-rinse sprayer, 
New Haier refrigerator, 
New Bosch dishwasher.
Living-entertaining space with room for couches and chairs that may be arranged for conversation and monitoring the TV. Also, may be used as a bedroom with its own bathroom and closet.
Many of the cabinets are installed with casters to arrange the rooms as you like. 
New Mitsubishi heating and cooling system with your own remote thermostat.
This beautifully designed, by a renowned architect, to include sunset views of Claremont Canyon,
A locking elevator that opens directly into your private space plus a private front door entrance.
Laundry, with a new Miele washer and dryer, is across the hall. Easy parking in front of the home.
Eleven minutes walk down Eucalyptus Path to Claremont Hotel, Peet's, Rick and Anne's and other great shopping and restaurants. A few minutes more, College Ave.
Many world-class biking and hiking trails with views of the entire SF Bay Area.
All utilities included: water, gas, electric, upgraded cable, and garbage.
Common areas:Common areas are located on split levels above.
The residents have the use of the semi-commercial kitchen with separate food prep room and pantry
Also, the formal dining room and living room are available for large dinner parties.
For musicians, a BÃÂ¶sendorfer professional grand piano is available for practice or house concerts.
For dancing, yoga and workout routines, or meetings, a very large mirrored studio with Canadian Maple hardwood floors, professional sound system with hookups for your iPod or computer. For meetings, the studio has seating for thirty. For quiet time, a large authentic Japanese tea house with shoji screen sliding doors and tatami mat floors and wooden veranda overlooking a rock fish pond and waterfall within a private formal garden set among Japanese split leaf maples and a cathedral of mature redwoods. Available for tea ceremonies, yoga or meditation, or other activities. A large cedar sauna room with two levels of benches along two walls.

Channing Manor Apartments
2118 Channing Way
Berkeley, CAÃÂ  94704


Property DescriptionÃÂ 

The Channing Manor Apartments is a three-story building comprised of 11 two bedroom and recently remodeled three bedrooms. This 
1960's building is one long block from the southwest corner of the UC Berkeley
campus and is a short walking distance to Downtown Berkeley BART and the
Shattuck Avenue shops. The complex also includes 
an onsite coin operated laundry facility and covered parking in the rear of the building. Units have carpets or 
wood flooring and are equipped with gas heating for cozy living in the 
fall and winter. Large windows maximize natural light and help warm the 
room during the day. The living areas and bedrooms offer ample space 
with over-sized closets with built in shelving. Some units have remodeled kitchens with chic 
granite counter tops and new dishwashers.

ÃÂ 


Neighborhood Information

Neighborhood DescriptionÃÂ ÃÂ 


The convenience factor at this location is second to none. Step out of your
front door onto Berkeley's Cal Campus in a matter of a minute or 
two. Nearby schools include Global
Montessori International School, Berkeley High School and Washington Elementary
School. The closest grocery stores are Shattuck Market, Berkeley Student Food
Collective and Sam's Market. Nearby coffee shops include Royal Ground Coffee,
Pipeline Coffee and Heat Cafe.


Some of the best restaurants in Berkeley are just a short walk which include Nanayiro Restaurant,
La Note Restaurant Provencal and Wiki Wiki Hawaiian BBQ. 2118 Channing Way is
near Martin Luther King Jr. Civic Center Park, Old City Hall Complex and University of
California - Berkeley. There are excellent bike lanes. 2118 Channing Way is a biker's paradise in which most daily errands can be
accomplished on a bike or by foot.ÃÂ 


Note


The contract rent will be adjusted by an additional 1.8% as it is subject to
Measure U1, which was adopted by voters in 2017. This increased rent
shall be used to support Berkeley's Affordable Housing Trust Fund (AHTF).


Property Features

title: $3100 / 1br - 700ft2 - BEAUTIFUL 1B/1BATH CLOSE TO EVERYTHING! (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
For rent is a beautiful 1BR/1 BA 700 sq. ft. apartment on the top floor of a 3 unit building. This unit is the entire top floor, is bright, spacious, and located on a prime Berkeley street. Just blocks away from UC Berkeley, and a few doors away from Willard Park, this home is close to everything Elmwood offers. This unit just underwent a complete remodel that is full of designer finishes. 
The kitchen has all brand- new appliances, dishwasher, disposal, dual-fridge/freezers, and a gas stove. There?s plenty of cabinet storage, plus a walk-in pantry for everything else. Enjoy nice views of the Berkeley Hills from the eat-in breakfast bar in the kitchen.  
 Marble counters, subway tile backsplash and  hardwood floors throughout the entire apartment make this unit absolutely charming. 
The bathroom was re-done with all period correct finishes,  clawfoot tub/shower combo, plus lots of storage. The bedroom is large with plenty of space for a king bed, and has a great sized jr. walk-in closet. There is a large living room with a cozy little office/reading nook area. 
Most everything else was replaced, with all new double paned windows, nice lighting, new electrical, and plumbing.  The heating is a central gas heater, and there is free laundry on-site. There is also a sunny backyard shared with the other tenants, but is there for your enjoyment.  Parking is possible, but may require an additional fee. Most pets are welcome, but are $50/month extra and require an extra $1000 deposit. Max 2 people for this unit. Please note this is on the 3rd story so must be ok with stairs. Students are welcome, and may require a cosigner is all. 
Available: Late January

title: $3300 / 3br - 1185ft2 - Beautiful Berkeley Furnished Berkeley Available for March (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful 3-bedroom /2-bathroom fully-furnished house on the Berkeley/Albany border.  Available from March 1st - March 31st
This is a child/baby friendly home. There are a total of 3 beds (King bed in the master bedroom, queen in the upstairs bedroom and twin the nursery/children's room) and a crib (crib can be removed if need be).  There is also a detached studio which is currently not being used (no furniture) can be used as a workshop.  The house is fully furnished with all appliances needed in the kitchen and with an internet connected TV in the living room.  Washer and dryer included.  Off-street parking for 1 car included as well.
The size of the house is 1,180 sq. ft., plus another 300 sq.ft in the detached studio and a remodeled garage with a full workout area/office.  The workout area has a complete Olympic weight set and other workout equipment.
Located about a 10 minute walk to Solano Ave. which has lots of choices for restaurants and grocery stores.  Whole Foods, Sprouts and a Walgreens are within a 5 minute walk as well.  It's about a 15min walk to the North Berkeley BART station.
One month deposit required.  No pets please. NO SMOKING.  Utilities (gas, electric, trash/recycling, internet) will be billed separately/monthly.  We currently do not have cable TV, but it can be added to the bill if necessary.  We also have a great housekeeper who can be billed separately too.

title: $4500 / 3br - 1450ft2 - Beautiful Home with deck and yard - Amazing Location! (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We have a beautiful home for rent. It is available May 1, but we are flexible and could be ready by mid to late April if needed. 
We have a 1930's house in the heart of the coveted Northside neighborhood in North Berkeley. It is two stories, has three bedrooms, a shared backyard, and 1.5 bathrooms. It has a separate office with it's own entrance that could be used as a 4th bedroom if necessary. It has a newly renovated gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and both bathrooms are newly renovated as well.
It's in a fabulous location in a beautiful neighborhood: 10 minute walk to to the Gourmet Ghetto with its phenomenal eateries, gourmet shopping, boutiques, and an all organic farmers' market. 5 minute walk to the north gate of CAL campus. It is a stand-alone separate unit with a shared yard and laundry facilities with the tenants next door. There is room for a small car in the driveway, but if your car blocks the sidewalk you will need to get a parking permit from the city and there's ample street parking.
Tenants pay water and gas/electric. Owner pays for garbage and landscaping.
We are looking for a year lease commitment, serious inquiries only please.
4 PERSON MAXIMUM
The other side of the duplex, a 2 bedroom/1.5 bath which is a mirror image of the 3 bdrm, is available June 1 for $4100/month. If you are interested in that as well, please let me know in your email.

title: $5500 / 5br - 2000ft2 - Beautiful Large Remodeled House, 6+ Rooms, Private Yard (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Large, two-story house, that receives wonderful natural light in every room. Three bedrooms and a full bath upstairs. One of the bedrooms is quite large with two very large walk-in closets. All hardwood floors. Downstairs has a large totally remodeled kitchen with brand new stainless steel refrigerator, gas stove, and dishwasher. Brand new maple cabinets with black galaxy granite and an under mounted sink. Beautifully painted throughout house. Laundry room with hook-ups and an exterior door that leads to the private, fenced-in yard. Gardener's delight! Just throw your seeds and watch them grow. Lots of room to garden and incredible dirt! Fully grown banana tree with fruit. Asian pear and more. Large shed for storage only. Large 4th bedroom with closet that could be used as a good-sized living room. Large formal dining room with bay windows and high ceilings. Sixth smaller room in the back with its own exterior door which is next to a second full bathroom. Both bathrooms have tub and shower and new vanities and sinks. One off-street parking and plenty of on-street parking. First, last, and deposit and one years lease. Available now!

title: $3550 / 2br - 1100ft2 - Beautiful Westbrae Home, Everything Included (Util + WiFi) (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful, quiet, and convenient 2 bedroom, 1 bath house for rent in the Westbrae neighborhood of North Berkeley.
Two blocks from Monterey Market, Natural Grocery, bus lines, and four blocks to the North Berkeley BART station.
This bright and spacious house features:
- Newly refinished hard wood floors throughout,
- Large kitchen with stainless steel countertops, new dishwasher, stove, refrigerator, and microwave,
- Bright dining room with original, built-in hutch as well as library shelving,
- Spacious living room with new custom windows, wood burning stove, and original details,
- Two bedrooms with large closets, in addition to two linen closets and a front / entry room with large coat closet
- Front (covered) and back porches,
- Laundry room (included in rent, not coin operated),
- Shared hot tub, gas BBQ, vegetable garden, and a landscaped and fully fenced backyard area,
- All household utilities included in rent, including gas, electric, garbage, water, and high speed wireless internet.
Please note that this beautiful house does have shared spaces with 2 other tenants, including the backyard, laundry room, and gardens. There are also three raised beds with an app controlled, multi zone watering system, ideal for anyone with an interest in growing their own veggies (or whatever)
There is no assigned parking space, but the area has plentiful street parking and does not have permitting.
We will be having showings on the first Sunday in March, but the house is occupied until March 31.  Ideally the new lease would begin on or around April 15, though there is some flexibility for the right person.  15 month lease preferred, first and last months rent, and $1500 security deposit needed for move in following credit check. We will run a credit check for $25 or you can submit your own credit report - you should be able to access one for free every year.  Please feel free to reach out for more information, or to schedule a viewing. 
Thanks!

title: $2700 / 1br - Berkeley Hills furnished In-Law Apartment (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A quiet sanctuary in the North Berkeley Hills - this furnished rental is available for minimum of 3 months and maximum of 10 months.  Ideal for visiting professor or graduate student. 
Traditionally considered an 'in-law' suite, the apartment has its own private entrance and is the bottom floor of a beautiful old house in the Berkeley Hills.  It has a bedroom, living room, full kitchen, bath, and shared laundry room.  Enjoy your own back porch with a view of the shared garden and the SF Bay on the horizon. 
The location is a short walk to UC Berkeley, Tilden Regional Park, the Berkeley Rose Garden and the famous "Gourmet Ghetto" in downtown Berkeley - an area you will find delicious eats, grocery stores, yoga, etc. The apartment is steps to bus stop.  San Francisco is easy to access in less than an hour using the BART public transit system, where two stations are less than a mile away.
Other amenities included in monthly rent are: Heat, Hot Water, WiFi. 
Sorry, no pets allowed.
If interested please contact Gaby by replying to this post. 
Only serious inquiries.

body:

Beautiful new construction has high-end finishes and hardwood throughout. Enter from fenced front patio into spacious ground floor with 2 story ceiling. This flexible room has enormous windows and tons of natural light. Great home workshop for architect, photographer, or other creative artists. Just beyond, the first bedroom has walk-in closet, with dressing alcove, stacked washer/dryer, and full en-suite bathroom.
Upstairs on the second floor, the master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom with shower over tub and double sink vanity. Huge two person walk-in closet is an organizational dream. A bonus space next to the landing with two full windows could be used as an office or study.
Top floor is a show stopper with vaulted ceiling, exposed wood beams, and giant windows. The kitchen is thoughtfully designed and well equipped. title: $4350 / 3br - 1500ft2 - Charming 3 Bedroom off College Avenue Available Now (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:

We are proud to present for lease a charming two-story turn of the 20th century brown single duplex in the coveted Claremont-Elmwood neighborhood. This three-bedroom, 2.5 bath home features original hardwood floors and craftsman details, including coved and coffered ceilings and tasteful upgrades. Located in the front of the property, steps up to the front door open to a foyer with a large living room on the right with a decorative only fireplace and a half bath. Pocket doors separate a dine-in kitchen from the living area. The pleasantly updated kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher and stainless steel appliances. 
Upstairs you will find a master suite that features a bonus sitting room, walk-in closet, and a bright and private bath with claw foot bathtub. Two spacious bedrooms are also located upstairs along with a laundry room and patio balcony. A third full bath completes the upper level.

title: $2200 / 1br - 550ft2 - charming Victorian apartment with private deck (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a lovely apartment in a 3 unit, owner occupied Victorian building, from the 1890's.  It has hardwood floors, 9ft. ceilings and stained glass light fixtures.  It has a gas fireplace.  The kitchen has plenty of cabinets, a gas stove, microwave hood and butcher block counters.  There is a back kitchen door which leads to a private, spacious deck.  
The steps from the deck lead to a shared backyard/patio.  There is also a shared laundry(free) in the basement/storage area, and another locked storage area for your bike.  
The apartment is located easy walking distance to the West Berkeley Bowl (fabulous grocery store), CitySports Gym, various restaurants and bars on San Pablo Ave.   We are located one mile from the Ashby BART station, and two blocks from the TransBay Bus.  
We have two dogs (older Chihuahua and an older mixed brown dog). We love animals, but don't wish to add more pets to the property.  (service animals excepted as per law)
Available March 1, possibly sooner. Water, garbage and WIFI is included.  Security deposit is $2200.  Please contact Vicki  show contact info
 for further details or to schedule viewing.

title: $2950 / 2br - 985ft2 - CHARMING WATERFRONT COTTAGE, EASY COMMUTE TO BERKELEY & SF (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Enjoy tranquil waterfront living with beautiful views of San Pablo and San Francisco Bays and Mount Tamalpais from "Bay Waves Beach Cottage." This newly-renovated,  fully-furnished 2-bedroom, 2-bath charming Victorian-style property is part of the historic Sandy Beach waterfront community in South Vallejo (not Berkeley), where all houses sit upon piers above the water.  (It's listed in Berkeley because past renters have come from Berkeley.)  Bay Waves Beach Cottage offers an out-of-the-ordinary Bay Area living experience with easy commutation to San Francisco, and the East and South Bay. 
Fall asleep to the calming sounds of tides gently rolling in and out underneath the cottage. Fish off the deck or sunbath while sail boats pass in the distance. Learn to sail at the nearby yacht club. Savour a glass of wine and grilled meal while taking in stunning sunsets over Mount Tam.  Take a relaxing ride on the Bay Area Transit Ferry to downtown San Francisco for work or pleasure. Drink in the moonlight dancing on the water.
Expansive bay views from 2 pairs of sliding glass doors in the kitchen/living/dining areas. They opens unto redwood deck with space for lounging, dining, gas grilling and entertaining. 
Easy commute to Berkeley, East and South Bay via car or downtown San Francisco via Vallejo ferry, which is a 5-minute drive from the cottage.
Easy access to major highways, including routes 80, 780, 680 and 4.
FULLY FURNISHED. Tasteful design/decor. New bathrooms, kitchen appliances and island, quartz countertops, Bamboo floors, Smart HDTV, stand-alone air conditioning unit, wood burning stove, vaulted ceilings, sunscreen blinds, skylights and much more. 
Rent: $2950.00,  excluding utilities. $3200 with utilities (gas/electric, cable TV/internet, water, garbage & parking.)
Available: April 1. Minimum rental time: 6 months. Inquire about viewing.

title: $1975 / 1br - Cozy 1Bd 1Bath Apartment in So Berkeley (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Looking for someone(s) to move into our cozy 1 Bed 1 Bath apartment in South Berkeley. We love the area and the apartment, but have decided to move into SF to be closer to work. It's a great space with tons of windows/natural lighting, conveniently located near the Ashby BART station, Berkeley Bowl, Walgreens, USPS and a variety of local restaurants/shops. The apartment is part of a gated complex with shared garden space and a quiet reading nook next to a fountain. The community is generally pretty quiet and respectful. This place is perfect for any working professional individual or couple who keep normal business hours and/or commute into the city. Details/Amenities:
Rent: $1975/mo (Through Cedar Properties)
Lease Terms: 1-Year Lease (negotiable through Cedar Properties)
Move-In Date: April 1st 2019
Furnished: ***FULLY FURNISHED OPTION***
- We are looking to take as little furniture with us as possible
- Available items: Bed-Frame/Box Spring/Mattress (almost brand new), Small Love-Seat Chair, Couch, Coffee Table, Turkish Rug, Shower Rod/Curtain, 3 Shelving/Bed-side Units, Stand-Alone Clothing Rack
- We would pass on most or all of these furniture items to you for a small additional one-time fee (negotiable in person)
- Also it can come unfurnished too
Utilities: 
- Gas/Electric, Water, and Garbage INCLUDED in rent
- Tenant responsible for Internet Service
Appliances: 
- Fridge
- Stove-top Oven
Location: 
- Adeline St. & Ashby Ave
- 1 Block from Berkeley Bowl & Walgreens
- 1 Block from the Ashby BART station
- Easy access to highway on-ramps (MLK or Ashby Ave)
- Within walking distance to a bunch of cafes, restaurants, bars/pubs, and a weekly farmers market
Food/Drink (Only a few blocks away):
- Starry Plough Pub (Great pub grub, craft brews and live entertainment every night)
- Lemat (Traditional Ethiopian food)
- Kirala (Sushi bar)
- Easy Creole (Cajun-Creole cuisine) 
- Sconehenge (Dank Breakfast/Brunch stuff)
- Fat Fish (Fried everything)
- Ashby Market (Deli/Bodega)
- Black & White Liquor (Good alcohol selection and snacks) 
- Easy access to food delivery services for tons more food options
Nature:
- Short drive to Tilden Regional, Redwood Regional, and Anthony Chabot Regional Parks which contain numerous hiking trails, dog parks, and other forms of outdoor recreation
- Close by to the Aquatic Park and the Mclaughlin Eastshore State Park
- Blocks away from a few smaller community parks 
***Please contact via email for more information or to set up a time to come check it out for yourself!***

This private one bedroom cottage is located at the rear of the property behind the main 4-unit building. Enjoy the peaceful landscaped common courtyard area and front yard.  We are only 1 block to Berkeley Bowl East, 3 blocks to Whole Foods, 5 blocks to Ashby Bart, and less than 1 mile to UC Berkeley campus!
Cottage consists of:
Sunny living room with vaulted ceilings and electric heater
One bedroom
One bathroom with new vanity, toilet, spacious tiled stall shower, tile floor, light fixture and fan
Open kitchen with new cabinets, quartz counters, stainless steel gas stove and fridge, tile flooring
Hardwood floors and double-pane windows throughout
Updated electrical and plumbing throughout
Private backyard area AND additional bonus storage room just for the cottage!
Additional Notes:
Tenant to pay PG&E. Owner pays water and garbage
Tenant shall be required to cover 75% of the hardwood floors with area rugs to protect the refinished floor.
NO smoking, NO pets (Service/Support animals OK with proper documentation)
Minimum 1-year lease agreement. Berkeley Rent Control applies.
Security Deposit $3000 (does NOT include last month's rent)
Applicants must have good credit, references and meet income requirements.
Renters' Insurance will be required.
Contact Erin for showings via craigslist email: Include your name, email address, phone number, the rental address, and a few days/times you can view the unit. If no email access, call or text listed phone number and leave message with the same info. PLEASE CALL OR TEXT BETWEEN 9AM-8PM ONLY.
T. Okamoto & Co. Property Management

GENERAL:
Comfortable unit is 900 sq. feet, two bedrooms, one bath, unit has two levels.
Located in the desirable Elmwood District, three blocks to stores and laundromat, 5 restaurants, pet store, bank, movie theater, florist, 7-Eleven, post-office is 4 blocks, etc. See the Google map for store labels and a birds eye view. Type "2965 College Avenue, Berkeley, CA"

Quick access to streets/freeways headed to SF, Oakland, Walnut Creek, and San Jose.
MORE INFORMATION:
Unit is two levels -- for privacy and quiet from shared areas, interior stairwell separates
Top: living room, kitchen and dining room, Bottom: 2 bedrooms and 1 full bath
Extremely quiet, friendly tenants
Large picture windows for natural lighting
Hardwood floors except bathroom and kitchen are linoleum
Kitchen - newer design, double stainless steel sinks, gas stove/range refrigerator, plenty of cabinets and drawers.  No garbage disposal or dishwasher.
Gas central heating.
Shared deck at the top of the apartment for sunning, entertaining, breathtaking view of the Berkeley Hills and a narrow view of San Francisco.
No pets.
There is no onsite laundry, washer or dryer.  Coin laundry is 2 blocks away.
Utilities: Landlord pays for garbage removal only. Tenant pays and is responsible for electricity, water (including sewer and seismic charges), and gas.
*Apartment is located behind a house -- 2818 Benvenue Avenue. Walk down driveway. Please do not disturb the tenants. You may view the apartment during the day. Be sure to view the deck (needs cleanup). Take a stroll on College Avenue and visit the many businesses on College Avenue.

title: $3100 / 1br - 700ft2 - Emeryville one bedroom, PHENOMENAL LOCATION (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
For rent is a beautiful 1BR/1 BA 700 sq. ft. apartment on the top floor of a 3 unit building. This unit is the entire top floor, is bright, spacious, and located on a prime Berkeley street. Just blocks away from UC Berkeley, and a few doors away from Willard Park, this home is close to everything Elmwood offers. This unit just underwent a complete remodel that is full of designer finishes. 
The kitchen has all brand- new appliances, dishwasher, disposal, dual-fridge/freezers, and a gas stove. There?s plenty of cabinet storage, plus a walk-in pantry for everything else. Enjoy nice views of the Berkeley Hills from the eat-in breakfast bar in the kitchen. 
Marble counters, subway tile backsplash and hardwood floors throughout the entire apartment make this unit absolutely charming. 
The bathroom was re-done with all period correct finishes, clawfoot tub/shower combo, plus lots of storage. The bedroom is large with plenty of space for a king bed, and has a great sized jr. walk-in closet. There is a large living room with a cozy little office/reading nook area. 
Most everything else was replaced, with all new double paned windows, nice lighting, new electrical, and plumbing. The heating is a central gas heater, and there is free laundry on-site. There is also a sunny backyard shared with the other tenants, but is there for your enjoyment. Parking is possible, but may require an additional fee. Most pets are welcome, but are $50/month extra and require an extra $1000 deposit. Max 2 people for this unit. Please note this is on the 3rd story so must be ok with stairs. Students are welcome, and may require a cosigner is all. 
Available: Late January
Lease length: negotiable

title: $3100 / 1br - 700ft2 - FULLY RENOVATED- lots of light, plenty of space (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
For rent is a beautiful 1BR/1 BA 700 sq. ft. apartment on the top floor of a 3 unit building. This unit is the entire top floor, is bright, spacious, and located on a prime Berkeley street. Just blocks away from UC Berkeley, and a few doors away from Willard Park, this home is close to everything Elmwood offers. This unit just underwent a complete remodel that is full of designer finishes.ÃÂ 
The kitchen has all brand- new appliances, dishwasher, disposal, dual-fridge/freezers, and a gas stove. There?s plenty of cabinet storage, plus a walk-in pantry for everything else. Enjoy nice views of the Berkeley Hills from the eat-in breakfast bar in the kitchen.ÃÂ 
Marble counters, subway tile backsplash and hardwood floors throughout the entire apartment make this unit absolutely charming.ÃÂ 
The bathroom was re-done with all period correct finishes, clawfoot tub/shower combo, plus lots of storage. The bedroom is large with plenty of space for a king bed, and has a great sized jr. walk-in closet. There is a large living room with a cozy little office/reading nook area.ÃÂ 
Most everything else was replaced, with all new double paned windows, nice lighting, new electrical, and plumbing. The heating is a central gas heater, and there is free laundry on-site. There is also a sunny backyard shared with the other tenants, but is there for your enjoyment. Parking is possible, but may require an additional fee. Most pets are welcome, but are $50/month extra and require an extra $1000 deposit. Max 2 people for this unit. Please note this is on the 3rd story so must be ok with stairs. Students are welcome, and may require a cosigner is all.ÃÂ 
Available: Late January
Lease length: negotiable

title: $3100 / 1br - Furnished apartment, steps away from UC Berkeley (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
About the building:This is the original building that started Berkeley's charming Normandy Village. The building contains 8 units, and is located just steps from UC Berkeley. The magnum opus of William R. Yelland, the master of Storybook Style in Northern CA. Built during 1926-1928 for Yelland's friend, a former Lafyette Escadrille flying ace named Colenl Thornsberg, whom Yelland met while studying at the Ecole de Beaux-Arts in Paris during The Great War.
About the unit:Sunny, fully furnished North-side one bedroom apartment (approx. 700 sq. ft) that occupies the 2nd and 3rd story of this building. It is located just a ÃÂ½ block from UC Berkeley campus. 
Available March 1st, 2019. 

Apartment Highlights:Completely remodeled professional kitchen & bath
Majestic spiral staircase to loft bedroom / office
Hardwood floors
15+ foot cathedral ceilings
Great natural light, with large gothic style windows
Antique Claw-foot slipper back tub
Stone fireplace
Property Features:Historic Landmark
Quiet
Rose garden and patio in back
Outdoor table for cozy, secluded dining

Amenities:Bosch Washer/dryer <--in unit!
(2) Fisher&Paykel drawer dishwashers
Granite counter tops
Stainless steel refrigerator
Dual fuel gas/electric Viking stove
Venezia Range Hood
Urban loft bedroom/office, with new queen-sized Casper mattress
47" LCD TV built-into living room wall, with bi-fold hide-away doors
Black Sea Gallery oversized couch and love seat. (Couch is a fold out, includes a tempurpedic mattress topper)


Just steps away from: downtown, Triple Rock Brewery, BART, Cheese Board, Gourmet Ghetto, shops, restaurants, grocery stores, markets, bakeries, theaters, movies, public library, and some of Berkeley's best coffee shops. 
Includes water, gas, refuse, tenant billed separately for electricity and cable by Lessor.
One year lease 
First, last & security. No smoking, no pets.

This 2+ bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is located on the second floor of a charming 4-unit building. It features high ceilings and hardwood floors throughout. The entire kitchen was recently remodeled with new cabinets and new appliances, including a dishwasher.   The living room is large, the bedrooms are spacious, and the bathroom has a bathtub/shower. A small sunroom affords some view of the San Francisco bay (the view is also visible from one of the living room windows).  
Located in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Berkeley, the apartment is just 3 blocks from the UC campus and the popular shops and restaurants of the gourmet ghetto. One covered parking space is included. Garbage paid by landlord. No smoking. No pets. Rent based on 2 adults.  $3590/month for 3 adults.  Available June 1. Square footage is approximate.

title: $1988 / 1br - GREETINGS OVERSEAS & DOMESTIC VISITORS (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Welcome to beautiful Berkeley!
This is not a SHARED rental. There is no one to share with & you get the FULL house to yourself.
Because of teaching commitments I will be traveling away from February 2019 until around Sep2019. I am therefore making my furnished home available for this period. Many visiting scholars, internationals, professionals & out of state-ers have stayed here over the years. It is a small private home located in a SAFE family area among caring neighbors.
If you are looking for a bridging residence while you are visiting or need a place while you search for more permanent housing, this could be for you. It has hardwood floors, an off-street parking space a private yard and all necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. It is within a short walking distance to UC Berkeley, supermarket, BART and downtown.
It is big enough for 2 adults who are non-smokers and have no pets. As this is my primary residence I would also preferVegetarians.If this sounds interesting please write with your professional details, number of proposed tenants, flexible move-in date and contact details. A refundable security deposit is also required.

title: $3885 / 2br - June 1 Available 2BRs, 1BRs, Studios, 4BRs Near UCB (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We will be holding an open house for our coming available Studios, 1 Bedrooms, and 2 Bedrooms all located at 2333 Channing Way in Berkeley, CA!
Our first open house will begin on Friday, February 15th, 2019. Please feel free to stop by anytime between 3pm-5pm. No appointments necessary!
This apartment building provides you with an excellent location! It is only two blocks from the UC Berkeley campus and only a few blocks from the Downtown Berkeley BART station and Telegraph! We offer several units that have exquisitely finished hardwood floors, carpet, modern kitchens, and abundant natural lighting for comfortable living. These are well-maintained and organized units with a homey and relaxing appeal.
Amenities & Features:
- Hardwood Floors & Carpet
- Cable/DSL Ready
- Modern Kitchen (Refrigerator, stove included)
- 2 blocks to campus
- 1.5 blocks to Telegraph Avenue
- Secured building entry system
- On-site coin-operated Laundry available
- On-site maintenance team available
- On-site office management team
- Clean, well-run apartment building
- No Parking
- 1 year lease term
Lease Term will begin June 1st, 2019.
This apartment does not allow for smoking or pets.
Holding Deposits will be accepted to hold a unit for 2 business days, giving the applicant(s) adequate time to become approved and sign their lease. The holding deposit will be in the form of a personal check for $1,000. This check does not get cashed and is only to show earnest money and may be retracted at any time with no penalties.
Savvy Properties is committed to offering you a quality living environment and provides equal housing opportunity for all. We abide by fair housing laws and do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, handicap/disability, national origin, familial status, ancestry, age, marital status, source of income, sexual orientation or other factors that are unrelated to an applicant's ability to comply with the rental agreement and community policies.
Rental applications will be processed on a first come first serve basis for all prospective applicants. As part of your application, a credit report will be obtained, your income will be verified, and your rental history will be evaluated. Please note: no other credit reports will be accepted. Savvy Properties reserves the right to require a guarantor or deny occupancy.
Please feel free to contact us for more information.

title: $3495 / 2br - 1304ft2 - KENSINGTON - Charming Home With Great Views! (albany / el cerrito)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Enjoy dramatic sunsets and sweeping San Francisco Bay views from this charming 2 bedroom home in Kensington. With over 1,300 square feet of living space, this delightful home offers original hardwood floors, a spacious living room with large bay window, formal dining room, and dedicated laundry room with storage. 
The large master bedroom features a lovely sun room, perfect for enjoying gorgeous vistas with your morning cup of coffee. This home also includes an attached 2 car garage and a large backyard with mature lemon tree.
Conveniently located near shops and restaurants at Kensington Village, Community Center, hiking trails and picnic areas in Tilden Park and an AC Transit bus stop less than a block away. Easy access to UC Berkeley campus and El Cerrito Plaza BART. Access to coveted Kensington Elementary School.

title: $2500 / 1br - 600ft2 - Light-filled apartment in hills above the Claremont Hotel (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Airy apartment nestled in the hills on the Berkeley/Oakland border. 
This two-level apartment with dramatic spiral staircase has just been remodeled and has a new refrigerator, stove, carpet and bathroom. In addition to the bedroom, there is a large nook that is perfect for an office. There is a sliding glass door off the living room that leads onto a deck with views of the Claremont Canyon Preserve. The area is quiet. Owls nest nearby and deer wander by regularly.
We are open to a short-term or long-term rental. Some furniture is available.
This apartment is an in-law unit next to a family home but is private.

title: $4395 / 3br - 1350ft2 - Luxurious & Spacious Remodeled 3-bed in Great location (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
THE APARTMENT
This remodeled and spacious three bedroom apartment offers a quiet escape while being just a few minutes from the best restaurants and retail in Berkeley. The apartment features refinished, hardwood floors, tons of natural light, modern amenities and wonderful period charm. Virtually the entire apartment has been taken down to the studs and completely remodeled with high end finishes. In addition to the spacious floor plan, the apartment also has a 250 square foot balcony spanning the entire length of the apartment. It is one of just seven apartments in a quiet mid-century modern building in the heart of Northbrae.
THE LOCATION
The apartment is nearly dead center of the Northbrae neighborhood, which was ranked number 2 in American Planning Association's Great Places in America. It is equidistant (about 5-10 minutes walking) from three of the prime shopping districts in Berkeley: Gourmet Ghetto (Chez Panisse, Cheeseboard, Andronico s Market) to the South, Monterey Market and associated shops to the West, and Solano Avenue (Andronico s, La Farine, Starbucks, Peet s Coffee) to the North. The newly-renovated North Branch Berkeley Public Library (1936) is a couple of blocks away, Bicycle Boulevard, which connects to a network of bicycle-friendly streets throughout Berkeley is around the corner, and the bus stop for the number 7 and 18 buses to the UC Campus and Downtown Berkeley BART station is a few steps away. Across from the bus stop is the start to Terrace Walk one of the public walking paths and steps that criss cross the Berkeley Hills.
* 1300 square feet (plus 250 square foot balcony)
* Hardwood floors throughout
* Fully remodeled kitchen with bamboo cabinets, quartz countertops and brand new stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, refrigerator and range/oven)
* Remodeled bathrooms
* Private storage (About 350 cubic feet)
* Onsite laundry 
* Covered Parking available (see details below)
* Pets allowed (Breed restrictions apply, see details below)
* Available January 11th
LEASE TERMS
* Pets: $75 added to the base rent per pet
* Garbage, Recycling and Common Area Charges is a flat monthly fee of $50 paid in addition to the base rent
* Parking: Covered parking is available for an additional $100/month
* Security Deposit: $4,500
* Smoking is not permitted on the premises
* Lease duration: 16 months
* Must meet credit and income requirements
Please include your email and phone number with your inquiry.

title: $4595 / 4br - 1467ft2 - Luxury 3 bed/ 1 bath living in Kensington plus a 1 bath Studio unit (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
8 Eldridge Ct is a house in Kensington, CA 94707. This 2,235 square foot house sits on a 3,496 square foot lot and features 3 bedrooms and 2 bathroom. Also includes a private entranced 1 bath studio unit. This property was built in 1951. Well located with quick access to Solano Avenue, the Gourmet Ghetto, UC Berkeley and downtown Berkeley. Nearby schools include St. Jerome Catholic Elementary School, St Jerome Catholic School and Thousand Oaks Elementary School. The closest grocery stores are Colusa Market, Youngs Market and Safeway Community Markets. Nearby coffee shops include Starbucks, Peet's Coffee and The Sunny Side Up Cafe. Nearby restaurants include Kensington Circus Pub, Cave Maps Jicama Salad Co/Box and Benchmark Pizzeria. A MUST SEE property! https://youtu.be/PMGv-QNoejc

title: $5200 / 3br - 1200ft2 - Luxury detached House; 3 blocks from UCB campus; June 1 (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This two-story detached townhouse was recently restored to its original charm and character. It has hardwood floors throughout and double-paned windows. The kitchen has maple cabinets and granite countertops, as well as a dishwasher.  Downstairs there is a small living area, a bedroom large enough for 2 students to share, and a full bathroom with a washer/dryer. Upstairs are two sunny bedrooms and another full bathroom. The rooms are wired for internet access. Situated at the rear of the property, it is sunny and peaceful, and it has a good-sized private yard/open space.  The UC Berkeley campus is just 3 short blocks away. Owner pays for garbage. No smoking. No pets. Off-street parking may be available for an additional fee.  4-student maximum occupancy.  Square footage is approximate. Available June 1. 
Please include a phone number in your email.

title: $1495 / 1br - Modern Loft, Private Bedroom and Bathroom (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
$1495 (+$100 utilities)
1 Private Bedroom/1 Private Bathroom (indicated in yellow on the floorplan)
Deposit : $1495
Furnished or Unfurnished
Move in March 1, 2019
We are looking for someone to share our beautiful new loft apartment located steps away from the bustling 4th Street district in Berkeley and right next to Aquatic Park and the pedestrian bridge to the Berkeley Marina and expansive Cesar Chavez Park.  At over 1,400 square feet, this is the largest unit on the 19-unit property.  For more information about the property and our unit (304) you can visit the property website: http://secondstreetloftsberkeley.com
We are a midwestern gay couple in our late twenties and both work as designers - urban design and animation. Erujie has a typical 9-5, M-F work schedule and commutes to San Francisco.  Logan is in grad school at Berkeley and has classes and studio work on weekday afternoons and evenings.  We also have an adorable 5-year old dachshund that loves his belly rubbed. 
We'll occupy the upper loft space and share the kitchen and main living area with our new roommate.  You'll have your own private bedroom and bathroom on the first floor - both are spacious and feature polished concrete floors. 
There are two sets of photos featured. One set is from the real estate company and shows a similar furnished unit.  The other set of photos show images of the actual unit, unfurnished.  We'll move in on March 12 and will furnish the apartment tastefully and with a home theatre projector set up.  We value a clean minimalist style with LOTS of house plants.
If you are still reading, please let us know about you and your typical weekly schedule and your core values in cohabitating with others.  Let us know about your current living situation, why you have chosen to find a new place, and when you would like to move in. If you are comfortable, please send a linkedin profile link as well. 
Looking forward to hearing from you,
Logan and Erujie

Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Ceiling lights have dimmer switches, and bulbs are warm-tone LEDs
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Porch in front and shared grassy rear yard
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Washer and dryer in separate laundry room
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Near Alta Bates Hospital and Whole Foods Market and convenient to Ashby BART and all transportation
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  In an attractive, well-maintained fourplex typically occupied by friendly professional people and graduate students
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Friendly, interesting, diverse neighborhood with cafes and coffee shops a short walk away
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Building has a 100% crime free history for at least 25 years
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Utilities paid by tenant: PG&E, EBMUD. Paid by owner: Garbage
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  One year lease
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  Security deposit of one and a half month's rent
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  One indoor cat is OK
Ã¢ÂÂ¢  This is a no smoking building.
This apartment must be seen to be fully appreciated. The address is 528 66th Street, #1 just west of Telegraph Avenue, between Ashby and Alcatraz. Please feel free to drive by. This unit is on the lower left, the one with the bay windows. Please do not disturb present occupants.
For further information or to schedule a showing call Brian at  show contact info
.
OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 2/10 at 1:00 PM

title: $2099 / 1br - 550ft2 - One Bedroom Apt. in Downtown $2099/mon. (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Desired good location: blocks away from UC Berkeley West Gate/Oxford, close to boutique shopping and Gourmet Ghetto in downtown area. Walking to BART station. Nice & well maintained One Bedroom apartment, with eat-in kitchen & walk-in closet in desirable community. Good privacy: Independent kitchen with side door, and private bathroom, hardwood floor and lot of natural light through windows. Double panels for windows. Option is with basic furniture. Available Now, till August 2019, rent $2099/mon., ideal for single person or a couple with good privacy, pay part of utility in unit average, security deposit $1000 and last month rent. If less than 3 mon. add ad. $200/mon. In-house wireless internet available to join. If interested e-mail me to introduce yourself and set up view appointment.

title: $2099 / 1br - 550ft2 - One bedroom Apt. in Downtown (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Putting the icing on the cake is the One bedroom unit's location for walking to UCB campus and BART station, and shopping on Shattuck Ave. & University Ave., restaurants, coffees, grocery, cleaners and banks.
Stepping through hallway to the unit, you'll find yourself in well designed floor plan: larger sitting room, eat-in kitchen and independent bathroom, and closet. Hardwood floor throughout, a lot of natural light with double-panel window. Small apartment building, with reasonable maintenance.
Option is with basic furniture, bed & mattress, writing table & chair, dining table & chairs, and bookshelf.
In-house wireless router is ready for join, or can set up own cable.
Available now, $2099/mon. to Aug. 2019, security deposit $1000 & last month rent for move-in. Pay part of utilities. Send e-mail to make initial communication for your rental intention.

title: $1995 / 1br - One Month's Free Rent Available* (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The unit is available now.
Near the corner of Ashby Ave. and Sacramento St., this unit has excellent transit access with the Ashby BART just five blocks down the street and several bus lines less than a block away. The brand new West Berkeley Bowl is an easy stroll away.
The apartment has carpet throughout, a recently remodeled kitchen with a gas range, great natural light from all new windows, and washer/dryer hookups for your own private laundry. It even has a small view of the City of San Francisco from the kitchen window.
Available: Now
Deposit: 1.5x Rent
One Year Lease
Off-Street Parking
Sorry, No Pets
SHOWINGS:  
Saturday, February 9th from 11:45am to 12:15pm
*** The final contract rent will be adjusted by an additional 1.8% as it is subject to Measure U1, adopted by voters in 2016. This increased rent shall be used to support Berkeley's Affordable Housing Trust Fund (AHTF).
Visit our website at www.cedarproperties.com for more details, and to view our qualifications and upcoming open house schedule.

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Rent the entire top floor of a completely renovated private home in the Berkeley/Oakland Hills with views of the bay and San Francisco. Surrounded by multi million dollar homes and situated on a private road. Convenient access to  Bart, and highway 24 and UCB campus ; Located in the charming Claremont area, above the neighborhoods of Rockridge and Elmwood.
Large open floor plan with views from every room. Over 1,800 square feet of spacious living, dining, den areas with fireplace and vaulted ceilings. All new gourmet kitchen. Master suite features a jacuzzi tub, separate shower, bidet and summer sleeping porch. Central half bath. Bonus room useable as an office, guest room, crafts room. 3 decks, attached 1.5 garage. 
This large previously private home has been split into an upper and lower floor units. Shared utilities and laundry.  Pets considered if compatible with neighbors and with extra security deposit.
Available 2/1 or possibly sooner.

title: $6500 / 4br - 1780ft2 - Panoramic Berkeley Hills 4 BR, 3.5 Bath Home (berkeley north / hills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Located on a quiet Berkeley Hills cul-de-sac, this light filled home was designed by the famed Sea Ranch architect Charles Moore in 1964 and has fabulous panoramic views. Tastefully updated with modern finishes, the house invites "easy living" and is close to trails, Tilden Park and UC Berkeley. Open and airy, it is serene and secluded with maximum privacy on a large downsloped lot. The level-in entry opens to a vaulted living room and renovated kitchen area and a bedroom on the main floor. Two more spacious bedrooms and bathrooms are downstairs, and storage is underneath the house. In addition, a separate bedroom / office / in-law studio features its own entrance, full bath, floor to ceiling windows and its own deck with views overlooking the Bay.
Upper Floors:
- 3 spacious bedrooms
- 3 full baths
- Vaulted ceilings and open floor plan
- Updated kitchen and baths
- Newer systems
- Laundry
- Fireplace
- Carport for 1 car with electric car charger
- Secluded and private setting close to trails and the Berkeley Lab
Lower Unit:
- Separate entrance leads to studio/office/guest quarter
- Gorgeously renovated full bath 
- Floor-to-ceiling windows
- Deck overlooking the Bay
1 Month security deposit and the first month's rent required; 1 year lease with 1 year additional option. No subletting will be permitted.  Utilities not included.  Sorry, no pets.

DESCRIPTION
Welcome to Casa Bonita Apartments! A beautifully constructed Spanish Villa apartment building located in the heart of Berkeley. This property is conveniently located close to local coffee shops and restaurants. With close proximity to Downtown Berkeley which is famous for it's shopping, restaurants and rich culture. Close by is also the UC Berkeley campus and gorgeous hiking trails surrounded by lush green trees everywhere you look. This community breathes life and freedom of expression and is a great location to engulf yourself into the culture. This building is full of vintage and classic gems such as hand crafted Spanish tiles, iron hacienda wrought railings, and beautiful iron candle chandeliers that fill rooms with immense light. There is one dedicated elevator that services all floors as well as the garage for easier transport of groceries and shopping bags. Laundry is on-site in the basement that is conveniently set up to take credit or debit cards for payment instead of the hassle of carrying coins. There is also a bike rack in the garage for resident's bikes. We make life more convenient for you here so you can pay your rent online with autopay by debit or credit card and submit any maintenance requests necessary through the online resident portal. In this Casa Bonita apartment you will experience the following:
Large Bay windows that allow refreshing amounts of natural light
Tall 9 foot ceilings
Beautifully classic light fixtures
Tons of cabinet storage space
Gorgeous built-ins for additional storage

title: $920 / 5br - 135ft2 - Semi-Co-op Seeking Sixth Housemate (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello!
We are looking for a housemate to share a spacious, well-maintained 5BR/2BA house in North Berkeley. Many amenities including sunroom, deck w/ BBQ, attached garage with space for storage, and free washer/dryer. We are five late 20's (one 30), a mix of studying and working in biology, statistics, education, and social justice. We enjoy lots of good times, creativity, plants, fungi, and algae. We like to chat and joke around. We have a pullup bar. We love our plants. We're all passionate about what we do, pretty independent, and we all enjoy relaxing together whenever possible. Recently we've been doing a lot of jigsaw puzzles!
Space details:
ÃÂ· Total house area = approx 2500+ ft2
ÃÂ· Size of your (private) room = 133 square feet, rectangular with a sliding window and ample storage
Money Details:
ÃÂ· Rent: $751.13
ÃÂ· Food (staples like veggies, fruit, pasta, rice, etc.; includes 6 house meals/wk): $150
ÃÂ· Internet (Symmetric 1000Mbps D/U): $20.43
ÃÂ· Power: $0.00 - we're a solar house
ÃÂ· Water & Gas: $0.00 - landlords pay
ÃÂ· Total base price per month: $921.74
ÃÂ· It stays close to this base price unless we need to buy the odd infrequent house supply, such as bulbs (we're going LED!)
. Total move in (first, last, food, internet and $400 deposit) = $2072.69
House Highlights:
ÃÂ· Five bedrooms and two full bathrooms. Well-kept and updated. Custom tile and murals.
ÃÂ· Large living/dining room and kitchen
ÃÂ· Huge sunroom. Our many plants love it!
. Deck with BBQ, hammock, and relaxation space
. Large backyard/garden with raised planting beds and fruiting trees
ÃÂ· Easy street parking (plus one dedicated, shared private parking spot for the house)
ÃÂ· Functional fireplace
ÃÂ· Washer/dryer included in the attached garage
ÃÂ· Located in North Berkeley off the Ohlone Greenway
ÃÂ· Walking distance to Monterey Market, Westbrae Biergarten, tennis courts, track, Solano, BART, etc.
House Culture:
ÃÂ· Each of us cooks for the house once a week, which means you get at least 6 meals each week, only one of which you prepare.
ÃÂ· We each do about 2 hours of chores per week
ÃÂ· QTPOC friendly house
About you:
ÃÂ·  POC/queer-friendly 
ÃÂ·  Generally tidy person excited  to actively maintain the house- we have set chores and often do home-improvement projects
ÃÂ·  Someone who is looking for a home and not just a place to sleep
ÃÂ·  Someone who wants to contribute to a social house dynamic (including things like making dinner 
once a week, eating with us when we cook for you, watching movies, gardening, barbecuing, etc.)
ÃÂ·  Someone who tends to be awake during the day and sleeps at night and foresees having a presence in the house
About us:
An - 28yo, grad student in statistics.  Hobbies include photography, cooking, and board games.
As - 28yo, white/Jewish/queer, does prison abolition organizing stuff, loves/is allergic to cats.
E - 28yo white cis queer femme, grad student in plant biology (until May!!! Then who knows what!), loves backpacking, walking, gardening, reading and book club-ing, singing in a queer choir.
C - 30yo old aspiring curmudgeon of the house. Full-time biology grad student; part-time bread baker, fish keeper, music player.
N - 28yo, cis gendered white man starting a long path to a PhD in health economics, and working in development (East Africa). He takes baths, writes maths and bikes down paths. An aspiring camper when the weather is less damp...er.
Time frame aka the deets
ÃÂ·  April 1 move-in
ÃÂ·  Details on meeting us and moving in: we will look at the housemate responses from now through February 16th. Interviews will be scheduled for the week of Feb 18th. We would ask you for confirmation of your decision and rent/deposit within 3 days of an invitation to join the house. 
ÃÂ·  Unfortunately our lease says no (mammal) pets. 
ÃÂ·  If you are interested please reply with "sundew2" in the subject line. Feel free to include any description of yourself, or info you think would be of interest to us.  A link to any social media you use would be appreciated. 
Thanks much!
