title: $2795 / 1br - 612ft2 - Spacious one-bedroom apartment in downtown Berkeley (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This spacious one-bedroom apartment in The Stranda Building is available now. It has a well-lit bedroom with lots of closet space, one bathroom, and a large room with a kitchen area and a living area. The kitchen has quartz countertops and modern appliances, including a dishwasher, microwave, oven, stove, and large refrigerator and freezer. There's a washer and dryer in the unit.
The building also has a roof garden area with a barbecue and wifi, and a co-working/business room. There's bicycle parking in the garage (and there might be parking spaces available in the garage, but I'm not sure). The neighbors (mostly students) are friendly.
It's a 20-minute walk to UC Berkeley, a 14-minute walk to the Downtown Berkeley BART station, a 14-minute walk to Berkeley Bowl, a 10-minute walk to CVS, or a 14-minute walk to Trader Joe's. There are many restaurants nearby, and several gyms and movie theaters.
I'm currently on a lease that ends on June 18, but I want to move in with my girlfriend, so I'd like to find someone to sub-lease it to. (This will be exactly like getting the apartment the usual way - you apply to the real estate company and pass the credit check of 650 and so on - except that instead of committing to a 12-month lease, you're only committed until June 18. After June 18, it'll be month-to-month.)
If you like, I can leave you some furnishings such as a bed, desk, curtains, and some kitchenware. Or I can leave it bare - it's up to you.
Contact me via Craigslist email or phone to arrange a time to check it out.
The apartment building has a website here: http://altacrest.wixsite.com/strandaapartments

title: $5995 / 3br - 1976ft2 - Spacious Single story 3bdr, 2bth home, updated kitchen-2951 (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Frank Lloyd Wright inspired, rare single story, spectacular Mid-Century modern custom home with plenty of windows for natural light. Vaulted redwood ceilings. Remodeled Granite kitchen, off street parking. Close to UC Berkeley, College Ave. An ideal location in Berkeley, easy walk to hikes, parks, schools, university, concerts, shops, transit and more. 
Granite Kitchen with tons of cabinetry and stainless steel appliances
Dining room has built in lighted bar area.
Large Living room space with built in bench seating and bookshelves.
Large side patio with awnings
Large rear patio area off of the master bedroom.
Long drive way for plenty of off street tandem parking.
Washer/Dryer in the home.
$5000 deposit, all utilities are to be paid by the tenant
Fabulous Elmwood Location. Minutes to Claremont hotel, Berkeley Tennis Club, Fournee Bakery, Petes Coffee and Tea, and multitude of shops, coffee shops, fine dining, boutiques and more: https://www.elmwoodshop.com/ 
Minutes to the 24/13 corridor and a 30 minute commute to downtown SF or a 15 minute commute to Walnut Creek.
School Information:
John Muir Elementary School >>>>>> K-5 >>>> 0.1 mi
Willard Middle School >>>>>>>>>>>> 6-8 >>>> 0.6 mi
Berkeley High School >>>>>>>>>>>> 9-12 >>>	1.5 mi
LEASE TERMS
========================================================
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
Please email/text/call Chris for a viewing appointment @  show contact info

1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the beginning/end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) Proof of renters insurance will be required.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff
-pedram

title: $1600 / 1br - 235ft2 - Studio Apt. in Berkeley $1,650/mo. all utilities included (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hi Everyone,
We live in a two story, wooden, Victorian-style house with a large yard/garden/orchard. Upstairs we have a new studio for rent completely furnished, brand new, Murphy bed/ couch, kitchen, bathroom, table, dresser, amoire, private entrance, pots & pans, silverware, plates, etc. You are welcome to share the yard, solarium and laundry room with other residents of the household. If you have your own furniture, we can store ours in the garage and/or attic, except the Murphy bed/couch combo is built-in.
We are all very relaxed, mellow, quiet time 10:30PM to 6:30AM, ie; keep music/movie/conversation volumes down so others can sleep/relax/chill-out. No laundry or rattling dishes after 10:30PM. You're welcome to have guests over, parties, as long as you check-in with the other housemates so all our needs can be met. We are straight-friendly, gay-friendly, queer-friendly. We speak English, Spanish, Italian and ASL in the household. We are biologist, agronomist, historian, medievalist and a really friendly dog (lives downstairs). Your place is private so you could interact with other residents as little or much as you wish. You can smoke anything you want outside, but not inside.
rent is $1,600/month plus $50 for all utilities/WiFi included (fiber optic WiFi coming soon!!). First, Last and $1,000 deposit. 
Our neighborhood is called "Poet's Corner" right next to the area now called "International Market". You can basically shop around the world in a radius of 4-5 blocks from our house: Latin American, Indian, Middle Eastern markets, Berkeley Bowl West Market. There are plenty of nearby restaurants from cheap to elegant: Spanish, German, Thai, Middle-Eastern, Vietnamese, Mexican.....
We are a 25-30 minute walk to Downtown Berkeley and UCB, about a 10-12 minute bike ride, or 4 blocks from the 52 bus lines up University Ave. A 15-20 minute walk or 5-10 minute bike ride to N. Berkeley BART or 4 blocks to the F and G trans-bay bus lines into SF. Or a quick drive right onto the freeway and Bay Bridge.
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask. The studio is available now.

body:

Completely remodeled craftsman bungalow for rent in a convenient neighborhood in Berkeley. Just a short walk to shops and restaurants in Berkeley's Westside Gourmet Ghetto and 4th Street. The house is located one mile from North Berkeley Bart and two miles from UC Berkeley. Rapid bus service to Oakland and San Francisco is within 7 blocks.

The rent is $3,880/mo for families and three adults, and the security deposit is 2x monthly rent ($7,760). A maximum of four adult tenants will be allowed for $5,500/mo. The security deposit may not be used as last month's rent. The rental agreement will extend from February 2019 to June 2019 (approx. five months). Starting in July 2019, annual rental agreements will be offered thereafter. Note, the rent will likely increase to $4,180/month, starting in July. You will enjoy a slightly discounted rent, during the slower winter/spring months.

Enjoy classic craftsman charm without sacrificing modern comforts & amenities.
Granite countertops
Energy efficient appliances
Sunny (for Berkeley) backyard
Off-street parking for up to three cars (piggy backed)
Quick transit and freeway access
Monthly gardening & trash/recycling fees included in rent

No pets nor smoking permitted at this house.

title: $3300 / 2br - 1100ft2 - Sunny Solar House for rent - 2 bedroom, 2 bath (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
My sunny Berkeley bungalow is for rent starting March 1st. The 1100 square foot home has solar panels on the roof and a nice backyard with fruit trees and a storage shed. The house has a bonus room that can be used as an office or a play room or for storage. Other house amenities: wifi, convection range, stainless steel fridge, dishwasher, one off-street parking space for a compact car and a rose garden. Most of the utilities are not included in the rent: water, gas, electric (subsidized by solar), security alarm fee and wifi. For the current tenants these costs have added up to $150/month on average, but will vary depending on your usage. I pay for the trash/recycling/composting service. The house is located in a bike/ped/transit-friendly neighborhood on a bike boulevard (Russell) with a 10 minute walk to Ashby BART and Berkeley Bowl (east) with a walk score of 82 and a bike score of 100. A nice park is located two blocks away with tennis and basketball courts, a baseball diamond and unofficial dog park . The South Berkeley branch library and the South Berkeley Senior Center are also both just three blocks away. The rental is likely to last for 18 months since I'm planning to do some construction and move back into the house in the fall of 2020. A credit check is required with a non-refundable deposit of $200 to hold the house. A security deposit of $3,300 with first and last month's rent is required for move-in. The photos show the house with my furniture that is now mostly moved out. The optional furniture that can remain in the rental is: the flat screen TV mounted on the wall in the living room, a full size bed in the 2nd bedroom, some shelving units and possibly a couple other small items like bedside tables.

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1 bedroom, 1-bath unit with recently remodeled kitchen and bathroom, in-unit washer/dryer and refinished hardwood floors. Open floor plan connecting kitchen, dining and living space. 
Top floor, south-facing unit with tons of light. Quiet building. 1 off-street parking spot included! 
Fantastic location near the corner of College Ave and Ashby Ave. Walkscore of 92 (Walker's paradise) and Bikescore of 98 (Biker's paradise), with everything close by. Less than 5 minutes walk to:
- Lots of restaurants and coffee shops
- Berkeley public library
- Rialto Cinema
- Post Office
- shopping, wine (Vintage Berkeley), banking (Wells Fargo) and many others.

title: $2800 / 1br - Tranquil Berkeley Hills Garden Apt. Furnish - Util. , Clean + Laundry (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful Modernist home, 5 min from UC Berkeley campus. Weekly cleaning and laundry available.  Formerly owned by the famous architect and former Chairman of Landscape Architecture Dept. at UC Berkeley, Garrett Eckbo.  Nestled in the scenic Berkeley Hills, 1 mile north of Berkeley campus. Neighborhood walks are complete with Berkeley Rose Garden, meandering trails throughout the hills,  Tilden Park, and vistas at every turn. Close to Alice Waters' Chez Panisse restaurant, Cheese Board, organic markets, fabulous cafes, Berkeley museum and the famed Pacific Film Archive .
Fully furnished, the studio apartment is very private with gorgeous views of garden from two walls of the unit.  Queen size memory foam bed, limestone bath and kitchenette. In floor radiant heat, weekly cleaning and laundry available. High speed internet, cable,  included. Two bus stops 1/8 mi from house and will take you  mile to north gate of campus or 1 mile from downtown area ( passing Gourmet Gulch). 1 mile from 2,000 acre+ Tilden Park.  
Fully furnished and ready to move in with clothes and a laptop. Option for Red or Gray sleeper sofa. Great place to work, write, rest.   Short term 2 - to 10 months. Additional furniture not allowed. Suitable for one, non-smoking person.
Available to single, non-smoking person.
- Fiber Optic high speed internet
- Memory Foam Queen Bed
- In floor radiant heat throughout
- Disposal
- Instant hot water,
- Microwave and toaster oven
- Cooktop
- Kitchen utensils and all cookware included
- Limestone bathroom with large sandblasted glass window in shower enclosure
- Private garden area and entrance
- Low voltage lighting
- Smart TV

title: $2400 / 1br - 650ft2 - UNIQUE BERKELEY HILLS APARTMENT - 1-bedroom, 1-bath (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Located in the North Berkeley hills one block from the UC campus The Highlands (1771 Highland Place at the top of Ridge Road) is a 32-unit building offering a friendly atmosphere in an excellent location with beautiful views, a  swimming pool, and an expansive roof deck.
THE UNIT: Along with over 650 square feet of living space, [plus a balcony off the large living room,] this 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment features lovely views of Berkeley Hills. The open kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, garbage disposal, and plenty of cabinet space. Radiant heat throughout the apartment keeps the floors luxuriously warm. There is a laundry room in the building, and the unit includes one parking space in the garage. 
THE NEIGHBORHOOD: We are a short walk from the northeast corner of UC Berkeley and steps from the entrance to LBL, and a slightly longer walk or short drive to BART, Tilden Regional Park, and Berkeley's Gourmet Ghetto.
AMENITIES: The building features a swimming pool and a roof deck with extraordinary bay views. There is elevator access from the street and the garage and friendly and accessible onsite management. The owner pays for heat, garbage and water. We are a non-smoking building.
One-year lease, at $2400.00 per month, with a security deposit of $3600.00. No dogs, but most other pets are negotiable.
Please reply to this posting with your phone number and desired move-in date, and we will contact you with further information.

title: $2200 / 1br - 550ft2 - Victorian 1 BR with deck (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This apartment has old world charm, hardwood floors, 9ft. high ceilings, stained glass light fixtures, and a newly installed gas fireplace that looks like a wood stove.  The kitchen has a gas stove, microwave hood, plenty of cabinets, and room for a small kitchen table.  There is a private deck off the back kitchen door.  There is a shared, free laundry in the basement storage area.  This apartment is in an old Victorian, 3 unit, owner occupied home.  We love this old house and want to make it a comfortable place for you to call home too.  
Our street is a fairly quiet street, located in the south west corner of Berkeley.  We are one mile from the Ashby BART station and two blocks from the trans bay bus.  We are walking distance to the West Berkeley Bowl, City Sports Gym, and several cafes, restaurants and bars.  Street parking is available.  The apartment will be ready for move in around March 1.  The security deposit is $2200.  Water, garbage and WIFI are included. 
Call Vicki, at  show contact info
, for any questions or to schedule a viewing at a time convenient to you.

title: $2149 / 1br - 475ft2 - Video Tour,Hot-tub, small shared yard (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
rent:  2,149
deposit: 2,149
Lease:  Lease renews yearly
Pets:  No dogs, no cats
Video Tour:  https://youtu.be/7fnu8qByUQk
Available: 
* 3rd week in March (tenant moves out March 15th, so within a couople days for it to be cleaned)
utilities: tenant pays pge, garbage, phone, cell, internet, landlord pays water, sewage. 
Description:
Enter your one bedroom unit that is part of a tri-plex (there are two units on the bottom floor which this is one of and there is one larger unit on the 2nd floor).  There is a split bathroom with a toilet in one room and a sink and shower/tub in the other room.  Also, lots of storage in the entry/hallway as well as below the house.  You enter into the kitchen which is not huge but has all of the normal appliances (no dishwasher, sorry!).  From the kitchen, you enter the living room which has windows that let in a lot of natural lighting.  And a door off of the living room leads to the bedroom.  The one bedroom is not tiny, but it is not big.  It is about 525 square feet.
Dimensions:
Ceilings are slightly over 9 feet high, so it doesn't feel cramped like lots of apartments do.
Bedroom: 11 x 10.5
living room 9.2 x 13.5
kitchen between 8 and 11 feet by between 10 and 12 feet.
entry way, bathroom, closet, and storage, and hallway 12x11
Amenities:  
* access to HOT TUB (in common yard)
* Small private outside deck
* Laundry - coin operated in common area
* Hardwood floors (in living room and bedroom)
* Lots of light with tall victorian windows
* Small shared yard
* An area to have a beautiful garden 
* Access to under-house storage area 
* Yard is small but has landscaping, room to store your bike, have a bbq, etc (if you are going to throw a frisbee you will need to go to the park a block away).
Neighborhood:
* Beautiful Strawberry Creek Park is less than a block away.  It has areas for bbq, basketball, tenniss, people walk their dogs, a beautiful creek, and a cafe, herbal store, and yoga store are off the park as well.
* This neighborhood was a bad neighborhood in the 1980's.  Now it is a mix of working class families and wealthy newcomers (due to increased rents and property values).  So, within eyesite of the place there are houses worth over a million dollars and an ugly apartment building.  It is in a neighborhood that is usually relatively quiet.  There is a youth afterschool program across the street so sometimes they have events.  Immediate neighbors are stable, professional, and friendly.
* Walk to BART (0.7 miles - google says it is a 14 minute walk, I get there faster).
* Walkscore.com gives the neighborhood an 89 on neighborhood is walkable - meaning everything you need is in walking distance - post office, pubs, food, resturaunts, stores, lane splitters, the albatros, public transit, etc. 
* Walkscore.com gives it a 99 when it comes to biker friendly.
*  walkscore.com gives it a 62 with public transit (which is suprising because there are major AC transit lines within a couple blocks (72, 73, 52, 51 which go to UC, Oakland, Commute to SF, etc) and it is .7 miles from BART.
Video Tour:  https://youtu.be/7fnu8qByUQk
Showing Times:
This week the tenant can show it Friday 12-2p .  Please contact me so I can get you in contact with the tenant who is arranging to show it prior to March 15th.
I can show it starting March 16th regularly.
Call Todd at  show contact info
 if you would like to arrange a time to see it.

title: $4050 / 2br - 1229ft2 - Well kept 2bdr 1 bath home 6 blocks to UC Berkeley campus 2512 (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please text Chris or Pedram.
Large master bedroom that will accommodate a Queen or King size bed, 
Second bedroom can accommodate a full size bed.
Spacious kitchen has all modern appliances and granite counter tops.
Washer/dryer in unit.
Central heating.
Detached garage
Small front yard and porch, back yard is fenced and has a deck.
No pets allowed.
Owner pays for Garbage/sewer and monthly landscaping.
Walking distance to many cafes, stores and restaurants.
========================================================
LEASE TERMS
========================================================
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the beginning/end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) Proof of renters insurance will be required. Bay's Elite management must be listed as "Additional insured" with a general liability of $100,000 and maximum deductible of $1,000.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff
-pedram

title: $4750 / 3br - 2054ft2 - Amazing Single Family Home in a Gated Community, SF & Bay Views 8257 (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
NO PHONE CALLS PLEASE. TEXT OR EMAIL Pedram ONLY...
AVAILABLE 1 MARCH 2019
**One-of-a-Kind Single Family Home in Oakland Hills with an Amazing Floor Plan & Views from Every Room
**3BR + an office, with 2.5 Bath
**Stunning Bay, Downtown San Francisco & Canyon Views
**Stainless Steel Appliances, Granite Counters, Beautifully Refinished Oak Cabinetry, Kitchen with a center Island & Breakfast Nook, Pantry
**The formal dining room could fit a very large table and the living room has a fireplace and dramatic high vaulted ceilings.
**The master bedroom suite adjoins a luxurious master bath and there is a large walk-in closet. Level in and easy living!
**Hardwood Flooring, Tile & Carpeting throughout
**Wonderful Patio to Bask in the Sun
**Washer & Dryer 
**2 Car Garage
**Secured Gated Community
**Great Drought Tolerant Landscaping
**Conveniently Located within a 30 Minute Drive to Downtown San Francisco, 5 Minutes to the 580 Freeway, 5 Min drive to the Hills Swim & Tennis Club, 3 Minutes to the Sequoyah Golf Club, 5 Minute Walk to Anthony Chabot Regional Park with its horse and multitude of other trails & Top Notch Green Reserves
Proof of renters insurance is required. Bay's Elite Management must be listed as an "Additional Insured". General liability must be at least $100,000 and maximum deductible of $1000.
========================================================
LEASE TERMS
========================================================
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the beginning/end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) Proof of renters insurance will be required.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff
-pedram

Rent for an apartment being furnished including all utilities, TV and wi-fi is $3900.

body:

This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1047 Sq. Ft. 
Jefferson Street Apartments Near BART in Oakland
STEPS FROM GREAT SHOPPING, DINING, AND LIVING
Maxwell apartments deliver a turnkey lifestyle with everything you need within walking distance, and so much more just a short BART ride or drive away. A variety of fine dining options, countless concert venues, and social lounges are steps from your front door. Maxwell Apartments near BART are also in close proximity to the Jack London Square, and a quick 15 minutes BART ride puts you directly in San Francisco.
From Maxwell, you can walk to the shops, bars, and restaurants of Uptown Oakland. The Old Oakland Farmers Market is a local favorite that is regarded as one of the best farmer's markets in the area. High end shopping at Bay Street is a drive just minutes away as well.
Maxwell is also adjacent to the 19th Street BART station for quick and easy access to the Oracle Arena, or San Francisco. Our location also offers light speed access to Interstate 980, 880, 580, and 80. For those of you who work at Pandora, BART, Kaiser Permanente, and Uber, you'll find our location especially ideal -- not to mention numerous major employers in the area.
This combination of city conveniences and natural beauty make Maxwell's Jefferson Street apartments a perfect fit for every lifestyle - from young professionals and families, to older adults and pet owners who flock to downtown Oakland where your pet are always welcomed.

Pet Policy:

title: $1750 / 1br - 900ft2 - 1.5 BR / 1 BA INLAW AVAILABLE IN THE EL CERRITO HILLS (albany / el cerrito)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
In-law living arrangement perfect for a single occupant or couple. Beautiful views of San Francisco and the bay. Convenient but still has that untouched East Bay local feel. It's a perfect balance of being close to nature yet only a five minute drive to Bart. Available as early as March 1st.
*Large master bedroom with walk-in closet and sliding door to backyard patio
*Small half-bedroom or office -- it's kind of a bizarre shape but would be a perfect office or for the right arrangement, it could work as a separate bedroom
*Bathroom with shower and good water pressure -- only accessible through master bedroom
*Living room/dining area
*Kitchenette with electric stovetop -- NO OVEN
*Private entrance
*LOTS of natural afternoon light
*Plenty of free, on-street parking (no street sweeping!)
*Very close to Tilden park and neighborhood walking trails
*Quiet, peaceful neighborhood
*Finished cement floors
*Plenty of storage in your backyard shed
*Exclusive to the downstairs backyard desperately awaiting a green thumb
*Washer/dryer shared with upstairs
**Photos are from a previous occupant / This space is unfurnished**
*A block away is a bus stop for the 7 to Berkeley and the H into the City
*15 min drive to UC Berkeley
*7 min to Highway 80
*5 min drive to El Cerrito Plaza Bart
In all honesty, this place is awesome but not a good fit if you don't have a car. The bus is great for commuter hours, but stops running pretty early. 
Who lives upstairs: 
Married couple with their small well-behaved 13-year old terrier mix that sleeps all day (and enjoys the occasional belly rub). Everybody has 9-5 M-F work schedules. 
Asking for a six-month minimum commitment, extra points if you can commit to a year. Month-to-month okay after that. Unfortunately, per the landlord no cats. 
$1750/month rent covers a single occupant and 1 dog.
We're asking for $1900/mo for couples or any occupant with more than 1 dog.
Utilities are on average an additional $200/mo and include PG&E, EBMUD, EBSAN and Wifi.
First months rent and a $2500 Deposit are due upon lease signing to reserve the space.

title: $3600 / 3br - 1800ft2 - Beautiful 3 + bedroom/2 bath house! (albany / el cerrito)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Convenient, executive style property on a quiet cul de sac. 
All on one level, this exceptional 3 or 4 bedroom house is offered unfurnished and in excellent condition. ÃÂ The rooms are spacious with over 1800 sq. ft of living space. The living room has wall to wall carpeting and a fireplace. The separate dining area off the kitchen opens onto the back deck --perfect for entertaining or just relaxing. The kitchen is well appointed with newer appliances and breakfast bar. ÃÂ A room off the kitchen/dining area can be used as a family room or closed off and used as a 4th bedroom. A large master bedroom opens onto the deck as well. Two full bathrooms! 
Windows are double paned and the house is well insulated and energy efficient. Newly refinished hardwood floors throughout with cedar floors in closets. Central heating.
The garden has many fruit trees and garden maintenance is included in the rent. There is a two car garage with automatic garage door opener and off-street parking in the long driveway. Washer and dryer are located in the garage. 
"Very Walkable" on walkscore.com!ÃÂ The Ohlone Greenway pedestrian and bike path is nearby; BART is less than 1 mile. It is close to AC Transit ( .2 miles) with easy access to freeways (north and south!). El Cerrito Plaza is 1 mile away andÃÂ El Cerrito Swim Center, Community center and Cerrito Vista park are close by! ÃÂ Truly an ideal ÃÂ location!!!
Rent of $3600 per month plus utilities. ÃÂ $5000 deposit. 1-year lease. Owner pays garden maintenance and garbage.ÃÂ  No pets. No smoking. Shown by appointment.ÃÂ

  Available: 02/15/2019

SG Real Estate
Description
  
    Open living space and hardwood floors greet you walking in the bright apartment. A beautiful kitchen is home to plenty of counter tops and cabinet space. The hallway offers a linen closet with shelving for extra storage in unit. Both bedrooms offer hardwood floors, oversized windows for ample natural light and sizable closets. Outside the apartment one can find even more tenant friendly features, a court-yard lush with local plants, laundry on site, covered parking and a small storage locker in front of each parking space is all included in the rent. Wi-Fi available. The lease term is 12 months and water and trash removal are included! 
Location, location, location!
This apartment is perfectly located 1 block off the busy San Pablo Avenue that features many local shops and restaurants while still offering the quietness of a tree lined residential street. With a Walk Score of 85 this apartment offers a lot for the person on foot. Approximately 1 mile from El Cerrito Plaza BART, walking distance to El Cerrito Natural Foods Co, less than a 5-minute drive to 80, many restaurants and even a Trader Joe's. The apartment is a 7 minute bike ride or 15 min walk to El Cerrito Plaza BART. body:

Perfect for those seeking quiet, private living. This cozy, ground level suite is entered from its own backyard deck. The deck connects to a brick-lined patio and very large yard with fruit trees, and vegetable and flower gardens.

title: $1400 / 1br - 650ft2 - MANAGER'S UNIT, 1BD/1BA, Large patio, Parking, On-site laundry (albany / el cerrito)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Ma Properties is seeking an on-site building manager at 1239 Liberty St. in El Cerrito.
IF INTERESTED, PLEASE DO THE FOLLOWING:
-- Email us your resume and a good phone number to reach you at.
-- In the email, answer these questions:
    1. How many hours per week do you usually work?
    2. How many different places have you lived in the last 10 years?
    3. How long did you live in each of those places?
    4. What are your long-term goals regarding your job/profession?
    5. Would you have any problem with picking up garbage or pushing garbage carts to and from the street?
    6. Have you had any maintenance jobs in the past?
    7. What is math proficiency?
CORRESPONDENCES LACKING THE ABOVE WILL BE IGNORED. 
One Bedroom Apartment
1239 Liberty St., El Cerrito, CA 94530
Terms:
$2100/month rent (reduced to manager's rate of $1400.00/month)
$2300 refundable security deposit
Parking: one carport space included
One-Year Lease
Apartment Includes:
Private patio
Carpeted floors
New windows
New cabinets
Microwave
Garbage disposal
Electric stove
Refrigerator
Approximately 650 Square Feet
NO DOGS
Manager position:
We are looking for a long-term manager (at least a year or more). If you are not looking for a long-term situation, this is not a good fit.
Duties include:
*Cleaning the building
*Communicating issues to the main office
*Occasionally giving locked-out tenants access to their units
*Coordinating showing appointments/showing vacant units to prospective tenants
*Cleaning and painting vacant units
*Minor repairs
These duties will probably take about 20 hours per month. You will be compensated for this time in addition to getting the manager's rent rate.
The manager must have NO evictions or criminal activities. NO EXCEPTIONS. All resident managers must go through our standard rental procedures as well.
As a rental applicant, we require that you:
- have a gross income of three times monthly rent or be financially stable
- have good credit or be willing to pay a higher deposit
- not be Section 8.
Rental application process:
1. completed application
2. $35 application fee
3. copy of payroll stubs that reflects one month's salary or bank statement to validate other sources of income
4. copy of ID-driver's license or passport

body:

Leasing Special is for a 12-month lease, Rent is 3,250.00. If you choose to spread over 12 month's rent is $2,980.00. *Move in by March 1, 2019
NOW OPEN!!! 
Daily 9am-5pm
Madison Park introduces its newest development Hollis Oak located at 3250 Hollis St. Oakland CA.
Hollis Oak is a modern apartment community located in Oakland. Our newly built beautiful apartment homes are located at the crossroads of Oakland, Emeryville and San Francisco. With easy access to BART makes public transportation a breeze. Hollis Oak offers; Studios, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3-bedroom homes as well as live work lofts and townhomes. Our apartment homes feature bright open spaces, with oversized windows and hardwood style floors that create a stylish touch. Each apartment home is fully outfitted with ultra-modern kitchens with designer cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and in-home washer and dryers. 
Discover a host of amenities at Hollis Oak. Hello,
I am looking for a roommate to share a 2b/2b apartment at Avenue 64 in Emeryville, CA.  I am a Scientist working in a biotech company in Emeryville, CA. title: $3495 / 3br - 1200ft2 - 2-3 bdr detached craftsman house, close to Bart, available March 4th (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2-3 bdr/1ba renovated, detached one story Craftsman house.
Living and dining room, hardwood floors throughout, beam ceilings, hardwood cabinets, mosaic tiles in bathroom, Jacuzzi tub, modern appliances, granite countertops, dishwasher, washer & dryer. Third room (w/ marble floor in pics) can be used as a bedroom or office/den, located next to the laundry room. South facing, lots of windows, good light.
Long driveway, shared with rented garden studio, quiet and safe neighborhood, good neighbors. No pets. No Yard. Utilities paid by tenant. Available March 4th.
Very close (1/2 block) to San Pablo Av., and Emeryville shops (Safeway 2 blocks, Trader Joes et al) and restaurants, e.g Lanesplitter's Pizza, Micropubs, Wally's cafÃÂ©, Arizmendi Bakery, Sushi, Indian cuisine, Vegan. Four blocks to Telegraph and the heart of the popular Temescal district, w/ diverse selection of stores, restaurants and bars. 
Three blocks to Bart (Macarthur), nine miles to SF, two mins to I-80 & I-580. Open to view by appointment. Emails w- rental resume/bio preferred.
thank you,
gez

title: $2395 / 2br - 650ft2 - 2bd-Amenities--Hardwood|Wash/Dry|Parking|Grounds|LocationSEE Sat10AM (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please come by Saturday right at 10AM to see the place.
1023B 62nd St., Oakland (NOBE Area)
Secluded, airy, redone unit with one regular and one smaller bedroom. New hardwood floors throughout; bathroom has new tile; bedrooms open into a kitchen/living area. Small, additional sunny area suitable for two-person dining nook next to kitchen. Stacked washer & dryer in unit as well.
Redwood fence with redwood trellis topper backs private bamboo walkway on east side.  Note that the apartment has windows facing all four directions of the compass for all-day, year-round natural lighting!
Bldg is set off the street with off-street parking. Peaceful, quiet setting with redwood trees in a shared yard. 
Close to Emeryville shops; two blocks from Berkeley; close to Ashby BART station, minutes from UC Campus, and near freeway. 
Amenities: 
- Cable, Telephone, DSL ready 
- Gas oven and stovetop
- Washer and dryer in unit
- Gas furnace 
- Hardwood flooring throughout 
- Off-street parking space included! 
- Additional parking available 
- Building is set back from street with large front yard, private side yard, and access to gardening plot
- Blocks to Ashby BART
- Two blocks to Berkeley, one block to Emeryville 
- Minutes to UC Berkeley 
- Convenient to freeway, SF 
- One mile to Emeryville shops & restaurants, including Emeryville's Market Hall restaurants
- Short walk to Sweet Adeline and Actual cafes
- Golden Gate Community Garden and Recreation Center 1/2 block away 
Look for the gray Victorian in the front (1019 62nd St), then come back to the left side of the second building. 1023B is on the left side, at the end of the stepping-stone path. 
If you have questions, please click Reply above.
Available: Now
Lease term: 1-year, renewable for successive year terms
Rent: $2,395/mo
Deposit: One month rent.
Utilities: Residents pay all utilities (gas/electric separately metered, water/garbage/landscape maintenance to owner)
Enclosed dog run included. Dog (maximum size 35lb and of approved history, care regime, and breed or mix) is an additional $100 per month rental.
Well-behaved single cat or dog with known history welcome.

title: $3495 / 2br - 1200ft2 - 2bd+ Detached Craftsman House, close to Bart, available March 1st (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
2bd+/1ba renovated, detached one story Craftsman house.
Living and dining room, hardwood floors throughout, beam ceilings, hardwood cabinets, mosaic tiles in bathroom, Jacuzzi tub, modern appliances in kitchen, granite countertops, dishwasher, washer & dryer. 3rd room (w/ marble floor in pics) could be used as an office or den. 
South facing, lots of windows, good light.
Long driveway, shared with rear garden studio, quiet and safe neighborhood, good neighbors. 
No pets. No Yard. All Utilities paid by tenant. Available March 1st.
Very close (1/2 block) to San Pablo Av., and Emeryville shops (Safeway 2 blocks, Trader Joes et al) and restaurants, e.g Lanesplitter's Pizza, Micropubs, Wally's cafÃÂ©, Arizmendi Bakery, Sushi, Indian cuisine, Vegan. Four blocks to Telegraph and the heart of the popular Temescal district, w/ diverse selection of stores, restaurants and bars. 
Three blocks to Bart (Macarthur), nine miles to SF, two mins to I-80 & I-580. Open to view by appointment. Emails w- rental resume/bio preferred.
Thank you,
Jez

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This extremely rare 1bd/1ba corner condo in the sought after Watergate complex boasts amazing water views as well as gorgeous views of the Bay Bridge, Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, North Bay and Emery Cove Yacht Harbor! Beautiful engineered maple floors flow throughout the spacious living room and formal dining area. Kitchen updates include a tile backsplash and newer, glass front cabinets. The bathroom has been updated with a new vanity, medicine cabinet, shower tile, refinished tub, and porcelain flooring. The enclosed balcony is a perfect spot to revel at the stunning sunsets over the Bay as you relax in your amazing new home. Enjoy Watergate's 4 swimming pools, spas/hot tubs, fitness center, steam rooms, saunas, locker rooms, and 4 lighted tennis courts. Lounge in the clubhouses or stroll down the greenway and boardwalk. Plug in to multiple EV stations for resident use. The on-site 24hr security and HOA office support residents, Wifi internet in the house.

Just 15 minutes from downtown San Francisco, and under 10 minutes to Oakland or Berkeley, this is an excellent location for the working professional. Other conveniences include walking distance to a variety of local shops, restaurants, and entertainment (including Bay Street Shopping, Berkeley Bowl West and Trader Joe's), the free Emery-go-Round shuttle to/from BART, and easy access to the Transbay Bus.

title: $1975 / 1br - 800ft2 - Cozy 1BR in North Oakland Sunbelt - $1975 (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a well-located, freshly painted 1-bedroom unit in the North Oakland Sun Belt, with brand new wall-to-wall carpet and playful black-and-white checkered flooring in the kitchen and bathroom. Located on the ground floor of a well-maintained 2-story craftsman bungalow, the apartment has lovely plants outside each window, providing privacy while also affording contact with nature and sunlight. The kitchen has refreshed cabinets, counter, refrigerator and gas stove, and the bathroom has new cabinets and a stall shower. A clothes washer and dryer are in the apartment's laundry room, which also has wall cabinets. The bedroom and living room are inviting and snug, and there is a large closet and ample storage in the laundry room. The apartment, with laundry, is roughly 800 sq ft. The owner lives in the in the upstairs unit and enjoys a healthy, mindful lifestyle. The diverse neighbors are friendly, and the block has nice, social stoop life.
The apartment is located on 55th Street, 7 blocks from the heart of the hip Temescal District, which has numerous restaurants and a weekly farmers' market. The Berkeley Farmers Market is just 5 blocks away. The apartment is a half block from the main bus line to San Francisco and Berkeley, a half block from the main Berkeley-Oakland bicycle route, and a 15-minute walk to Ashby and MacArthur BART stations. The rent is $1,975/month, and the deposit is first and last month's rent ($3,950) plus security deposit ($990) = $4,940. Annual lease. The rent includes weekly garbage collection and utilities (water, sewer, heat, electricity). There is ample on-street parking, no permit required. Available now.

title: $4200 / 3br - Historic charm w/ modern furniture: 3 Bed Bungalow w/ hot tub & yard (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Available **MARCH 1st**, 2019.
Located right at the Berkeley-Oakland-Emeryville border. This fully-furnished home comes with everything you need, including bedding, towels and dishes.  
The neighborhood is quiet, safe, and centrally located. 
The large, fenced yard is pet-friendly. Enjoyed the BBQ, separate fire pit, jacuzzi tub, and outdoor table set. Sunbath in the hammock, or swing from the rope swing in the lovely and productive fig tree in the back yard. Organic blackberries your thing?  Bring your bowl right out to the source, along the back fence. 
Inside, historic features include the Wedgewood stove, Arts & Crafts furnishings, original tiled fireplace. Modern features include a second prep sink on the kitchen island, plus the dishwasher and microwave most folks expect these days. Lots of natural light throughout, including skylight that opens and closes in the dining room. 
The island kitchen is an entertainer's dream, with plenty of work space for everyone to pitch-in with food prep, mixology, and merry-making.  A flexible floor plan allows any combination of up to three bedrooms or three home offices. 
Free Emery-Go-Round shuttle takes you to MacArthur BART. 
Comes with covered off-street parking for one vehicle. Street parking is safe and plentiful.  The house is 15 minutes from San Francisco if Bay Bridge traffic allows. 
Close to: Emeryville's Bay Street shopping and restaurants, Berkeley Bowl West, Ikea, Trader Joes. Walk score of 84 out of 100!  
The rent is $4200 per month. The cleaning fee is $110. Minimum 4 months rental, but no 1-year lease required.  Section 8 is not considered for this property. 
FAQ:  
Q) Is it still available?
A) Yes. This ad will be removed within minutes of payment and contract signing by the new tenants.
Q) Can I rent this unfurnished?
A) No. There are tens of thousands of unfurnished rentals in this area. My rentals are for folks who prefer a furnished rental. I travel a lot myself for work. I do my best to make sure that my rentals feel like home, the moment you arrive and open your suitcase. That's what I want when I travel, and that's what I try to provide here. While the home will come furnished, of course I can store an item or two, if you have a special TV, office chair, or some other item that you'd prefer to use during your stay here. 
Q) Which school district is this located in?
A) Oakland.

title: $3995 / 1br - 1740ft2 - Modern live/work Loft near Emeryville for Creative Individuals (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Modern work/live office loft in the magnificent Clawson Elementary School building. 
Available Now.
The building: re-purposed as 28-unit live/work spaces in 1999 from the Clawson Elementary school built in 1914.
Professionally landscaped & managed with strict homeowners' rules that are enforced for security, maintenance, appearance, and comfort of the community. Gated automobile entrance to parking lot behind the building. Additional visitor parking spaces in front of the building and on the street. Sentex call-box & FOB entrances to the building. A community of creative residents: musicians, artists, designers, IT workers, entrepreneurs, & other professionals.  
The unit: Two levels with three access doors; Central heating, double-pane windows, & other modern amenities; one deeded parking space directly from the first floor though a double door; situated in the center rear portion of the building with 3 private doors for convenience yet no direct access from the street; Cable/phone hook-ups; Excellent live/work space.  
First floor features: 13' ceiling; water-proof laminate floor throughout; a 20' x 23' work space; a double-door toward secure parking / garden; a 12' x 12' bedroom, an upgraded kitchen (oven, refrigerator, & dishwasher) with cabinets & stone counter tops; a full bath with a washer/dryer combo and a barn door; a 10' x 12' storage space with IKEA cabinets to store clothes, household items, or tall items around a staircase to the 2nd floor; another door to the hallway of the building to access to the mailboxes and to the 1st floor entrance to the building from guest parking.   
Second floor features: a 600+ sq ft space for creative use - office or client-facing area; a private door through a wide hallways where art works are displayed from the restored school building doors & staircases from guest parking; open space with large windows facing the Eastern deck with limited views of the Oakland Hills & the City of Oakland; A designer tile shower in a full bath room with a barn door.  
Public Transportation / Freeways: two blocks from Emery-Go-Round town/BART shuttle to the McArthur BART station; Minutes to McArthur or West Oakland BART station; Minutes to Emeryville Amtrak station; Minutes to freeways/highways 24, 80, 580, 880, 980; Close to Downtown Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville, and San Francisco.  
Nieghborhood: A few blocks to Pixar Animation Studio; Near Starbucks, Target, Best Buy, IKEA, Home Depot, Ross, Circuit City, Office Depot, Pet Co, Trader Joe, Good Guys, 12-screen Cinema, Public Market, Bay Street entertainment district, and Major hotels, and more in Emeryville; close to education - UC Berkeley, California College of the Arts, Laney college, Mills college, etc.; walking or biking distance to many high tech, design firms & other industry jobs in Emeryville and Oakland.   
Lease Terms:
Available for occupancy now for $3,995/month for a 1-year lease.  Water and Garbage is included in the rent. $5,000 security deposit at the signing of lease. $100 Move-in fee & must adhere to the HOA Rules & Regulations. Sorry, no pet.  

Drive by this magnificent building at 3240 Peralta St. Oakland.  Please look through the City infrastructure renovation project and the construction of an apartment complex across the street.  
Serious applicants only. ABSOLUTELY NO Air B&B sub-rental. Please email for showing or more Interior photos. $45 fee from EACH applying applicant when submitting rental application. (Tenant screening by the National Tenant Network, Inc.) Must score better than 61/100 on the screening report. $5,000 deposit for scores of 61-80. Applicants' photo ID's are required for screening.

Gideon Kim, Broker, 80square Realty CABRE#01446082

Equal Opportunity Housing

title: $2947 / 2br - 800ft2 - Newly Renovated 2 Bedroom in Santa Fe Neighborhood (berkeley)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Gorgeous recently renovated 2-bedroom apartment in the Santa Fe neighborhood in South Berkeley/North Oakland, available February 10th. It is located in the back of a triplex house that was renovated in 2016.
My partner and I have lived here for almost 2 years and are moving to be closer to work. We have LOVED this apartment - it includes:
- 2 bedrooms & 1 large bathroom
- Brand new, recently renovated kitchen with tons of storage, dishwasher, gas range
- Outdoor space shared with neighbors, including shared grill, tables and chairs (the complex is 5 units total, all neighbors are friendly and cool!)
- Laundry room right outside the door shared with neighbors
- Very easy street parking with no permit required 
- Cat friendly & potentially small-dog friendly with permission from landlord
- Walking distance to Ashby Bart, cafes and restaurants on Alcatraz & Adeline (including Sweet Adeline Bakery, Easy Creole, Hoi Polloi)
- Super close to 580 freeway and easy to get into San Francisco or downtown Oakland
- Attentive landlord - we have never had any problems getting things fixed!
If you are sick of living in a huge managed building - but don't want to sacrifice a spacious, new apartment, this place is perfect for you!
Please contact me via email for more details about the place or to set up a showing!

Madison Park introduces its newest development Hollis Oak located at 3250 Hollis St. Oakland CA.
Hollis Oak is a modern apartment community located in Oakland. Our newly built beautiful apartment homes are located at the crossroads of Oakland, Emeryville and San Francisco. With easy access to BART makes public transportation a breeze. Hollis Oak offers; Studios, 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom and 3-bedroom homes as well as live work lofts and townhomes. Our prime location keeps neighborhood necessities like grocery stores, shopping, cafes, and restaurants within easy reach.**

title: $1995 / 1br - 500ft2 - Remodeled MINI-1 BDRM in Resort Setting at Watergate (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
BE ON VACATION WHEN YOU COME HOME  Once a studio, now beautifully remodeled into a mini-one bedroom with walls and pocket doors that turn the former sleeping alcove into a genuine bedroom. Enjoy the upgraded kitchen with a built-in microwave and a dishwasher, a remodeled bathroom, and smooth ceilings (none of the original "popcorn"). If you don't care for carpet, you'll also love the laminate flooring.

Looking west on the third floor just across the street from Watergate's famed Clipper Club with its extensive health club, spa and large main pool (heated to 82 degrees all year long), it is the perfect resort retreat. It's also less than a block from Watergate's 4 lighted tennis courts and just down the street from the Watergate Shopping Center with a full service market and deli, a great pizzeria, a cleaner and laundry, UPS store and more. Just a short stroll away is the Anchor Club with Watergate's other heated pool which has an indoor entrance for great wintertime swimming. It also has an indoor spa, a coed sauna, a racquetball court and a ping pong court. Walk to great dining. Roba's Pizza is right there in the Shopping Center. And for great Polynesian food and incredible happy hours, Trader Vics Restaurant is right next door to the west of Watergate. Walk a little further west past the first Marina and you'll be at the Hong Kong East Ocean Seafood Restaurant with it's super popular dim sum. Or go to the east down the boardwalk and you can easily walk to Chevy's for some fresh Mex.

Watergate is an urban oasis in the heart of the Bay Area. Its central location, free shuttle to BART, well established casual carpool to SF and dedicated freeway entrance to Bay Bridge approach makes for an easy commute to SF (av. 15 minutes) or anywhere in the East Bay.With year round heated swimming pools, fantastic gym with steam rooms and saunas, lighted tennis courts, a scenic boardwalk by the Bay and more, you'll feel like you're on vacation every time you come home. 

Rent includes parking, storage locker, water, hot water, garbage and 82 channels of cable TV. AVAILABLE NOW for $1,995 on a 1 year lease. Security deposit $2,295. Application fee $30 per person. There is also a $10 per person move-in fee. NO PETS, NO SMOKING please. 

For more information or to view, call William Sievers, Realtor at  show contact info
 (direct)
 (DRE# 00692528).

Realty World Waterfront (DRE #01943875) :: 10 Commodore Drive, Emeryville in the heart of the Watergate Complex :: Office Ph.  show contact info

title: $3150 / 2br - 1200ft2 - Stunning, extra spacious 2 bed in Garden oasis setting (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Available in mid to late March. See our website:  emeryvilleapartments.com
On the outside it looks like a step into the olden days but underneath, its all new and modern.
This exceptional, large two bedroom apartment is completely new from sheet rock to appliances.  Large windows and high ceilings allow for abundant natural lighting and views to gardens.
Kitchen is a cook's delight with new high end Kutch gas range/microwave, stainless LG refrigerator, large island, new maple cabinets with lots of storage space.  Artisan tile, on demand hot water.  Bosch dishwasher.
Two large bedrooms with beautiful natural light, plenty of closet space, new carpet.  High ceilings, ceiling fan.
Living area features hardwood floors, high ceilings and crown moldings.Picture windows to gardens.
Bath has tub/shower combination, artisan tile.
This property behind the brick wall is a community of dynamic, respectful, long term tenants.  Quiet living--not a party house.  Amenities include: central vacuum to remove dust from living area, gardens and sitting areas, picnic tables, This Victorian-- which used to be part of a 300 acre cherry orchard estate-- has abundant trees and flower gardens, some of which date back to the 1800's.
FREE WEBPASS HIGH SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, FREE  COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY AND BIKE STORAGE, FREE EMERY GO ROUND  which takes you to Emeryville work and shopping locations and to BART.  This property is ideally located for public transportation:  Emery go round, BART and trans bay buses.
You can live here without having to have a car.
Good references, good credit report and adequate income required.  No short term (airbnb type) rentals allowed on this property.

$3,450.00 / Month
- Description:
Find sanctuary and minimize your commute in this 1912 revival! This gem is located in the sought after 'NOBE' neighborhood, just minutes from downtown San Francisco along the borders of Berkeley, Emeryville and Oakland.  Skip the traffic! Commute to SF, Oakland, or UC Berkeley within minutes via AC Transit and the TransBay Bus, BART, the free Emery-Go-Round or even the new ferry terminal from the Berkeley Marina could be an option for you.  Commuting to Sacramento or Davis? Amtrak is just a couple blocks away with commuter trains every day!With a Walkscore of 85, you can walk or bike anywhere you need to go via Emeryville's Greenway: Berkeley Bowl, cafes, restaurants, hip bars, Emery Bay mall and cinema, Public Market, and so much more!Looking to go to the park? Just blocks away are several beautiful parks including Doyle Street Park, Aquatic Park and nearby Cesar Chavez Park in Berkeley. This cozy home features (2) bedrooms, a full grand bathroom with shower and separate claw-foot soaking tub, large and sunny eat-in kitchen, bonus spaces downstairs perfect for an artist or office space.Other items of interest:- Oak and Bamboo wood flooring throughout- Vaulted ceilings in the kitchen- Delightful sun filled rooms- Butcher-block countertop in the kitchen- Brand new dishwasher- Restored vintage O'Keefe and Merritt Gas range- Dual glazed (paned) windows and glass door- Four piece bathroom with designer storage and claw foot soaking tub- On demand tankless hot water heater- Built in sound system throughout the house- Front-load washer and dryer- Yard consisting of a park like setting with lemon, fig, pomegranate, mandarines and calla lillies- Plenty of storage space in the basement- Gas and electric bill, flat fee of $225 per monthSome helpful links:https://www.yelp.com/biz/emeryville-greenway-emeryvillehttp://www.nobeneighborhood.com/Home.html http://www.berkeleybowl.com/https://www.emerygoround.com/http://www.actransit.org/maps/#

title: $2800 / 1br - Very Special Remodeled Cottage with Studio/Workspace, Garden Patio (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Be part of our friendly, interesting neighborhood in a fantastic location: Live in this light-filled, unique 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom standalone cottage plus writer/artist workspace/office, thoughtfully remodeled from the studs. Spacious layout with beautiful 1920s fir floors and new windows, fixtures, and appliances. Open-plan living room + kitchen includes ample, stylish lighting, a gas convection oven, dishwasher, microwave, quartz countertops, and kitchen island with granite top. 
Modern, bright bathroom. Large bedroom. Multiple closets plus clutter-busting shelving, pullouts, cubbyholes, and USB ports. Double-paned windows, all-LED lighting, high-efficiency central heating.
Semifinished, insulated basement includes front-loading washer and dryer and makes a roomy art studio or office. Landscaped garden patio adjacent to owner's yard. Separate gated entrance and easy street parking. 
Historic Peabody Lane is one of the oldest streets in Oakland, and our diverse and friendly neighborhood is one of the East Bay's best-kept secrets: Both quiet and convenient, it's centrally located on the Oakland/Emeryville border, close to transportation, freeways, shopping, restaurants, pubs, art galleries. 
Get your groceries at Berkeley Bowl West, a 5-minute bike ride via the Emeryville greenway. Other local amenities and attractions include Paradise Park Cafe, Townhouse Bar & Grill, Prizefighter pub, Urban Ore, Kala Institute and Compound Gallery, fabric and knitting stores, artisan cupcakes and donuts, house concerts, exercise studios, and more. 
Ideal commute location, with nearby buses straight to San Francisco, UC Berkeley, downtown Oakland; free shuttle to MacArthur BART; 25-minute bike ride to campus; 10-minute walk to Amtrak.
Available March 1.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Water, garbage, and internet included in rent; you pay PG&E
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Deposit $2800
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Dog negotiable, $50/mo additional rent

title: $3190 / 2br - 1033ft2 - 1 1/2 Bath Luxury Townhouse (unfurnished) (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This beautiful 3 level modern townhouse has 2 bedrooms, 1 1/2 baths, and a 2 car garage and is located on the Emeryville/Oakland border.
The first level is a 2 car tandem garage with a washer/dryer and ample storage.  The second level has a half bath, dining room, kitchen, and living room.  There are over-sized windows which let in plenty of light, and a deck off the dining room.   On the 3rd floor are 2 bedrooms (12 x 11 ft and 12 x 10.5 ft) with a bathroom and double sinks in between.  There is an additional balcony off of the rear bedroom. Total living area is 1,033 sq ft. 
The townhome has brand new white oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, black granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, gas range, new paint, and Berber carpeting. You have no one living above or below you.  
You have easy access to major freeways and the Bay Bridge. A free shuttle that stops in front of the complex takes you to MacArthur BART. Amtrack Train Station is only several blocks away. The Transbay Bus stops 2 blocks away, and takes 30 minutes to get to downtown San Francisco. 
The townhouse is walking distance to many businesses including the Berkeley Bowl West supermarket, Starbucks, Club Sport Gym, and other restaurants around Hollis Street and San Pablo Ave.
Available Feb 18th. Rent is $3190, 1 month security deposit, 1 year lease. Tenants pay all utilities (PGE, water, garbage).  No smokers, no pets please.
Please email or text for any questions. Thanks.

Oakbrook Manor is a well-maintained apartment community located nine blocks from Lake Merritt.  This gated community features a central location, clean grounds, parking, ample storage, and a quiet, peaceful environment. Recently remodeled apartments with stainless steel appliances and hardwood floors immediately signal luxury and comfort.  
The Clinton neighborhood is one of Oakland's best-kept secrets - close to everything, quiet at night and genuinely a mixture of all lifestyles. It is also home to several excellent neighborhood restaurants. Short distance to Lake Merritt, the farmers' market and the excellent shopping at Lakeshore.

title: $6195 / 4br - 2850ft2 - MASSIVE FULL LEVEL FLAT, LAKE VIEWS! WALK EVERYWHERE, GREAT LOCATION! (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

    
      MASSIVE FULL LEVEL FLAT W/ LAKE VIEWS! WALK TO EVERYTHING GREAT LOCATION! DO NOT MISS!
    
  
  Property Address

2150 Lakeshore Ave #1| Oakland, CA 94606

  Available: NOW
Offered By

 NIDO PROPERTIES
Description
Do not miss this incredible opportunity to rent a MASSIVE, ONE OF A KIND, 4 Bed/2.5 Bath unit, directly on Lake Merritt with beautiful lake and city views. 
Take the elevator up to this 2,850 square foot apartment appointed with modern amenities combined with original charm and flooded with natural light. Enjoy New York style living with an open floor plan that takes up the entire first floor of the building and includes a living room with wood burning fireplace, a large dining area with beautiful light fixtures and a massive chefs kitchen. The chef's kitchen with granite, original wood cabinets, oven, microwave, dishwasher, garbage disposal and endless storage make this a perfect kitchen for any avid home cook. A kitchen peninsula perfect for stools, a wet bar, access to a half bath and endless open space make this an entertainers dream. Freshly cleaned carpet throughout the dining room and living room as well as recessed lighting with dimmers in the kitchen help tie this beautiful nest perched above Lake Merritt together.
A solarium that wraps around the dining and living room provides exceptional views of Lake Merritt and Downtown Oakland.
Down the hall, you will be led into the master bedroom that comes complete with, his and hers closets, a separate vanity area with make up lights, an additional walk-in closet and a full en suite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, stone counters and tons of storage.
Further into this massive floor plan you will find a large linen closet, a bathroom that services the two other bedrooms with a tub/shower combo and an IN UNIT washer/dryer hook ups. All the bedrooms have massive closets and freshly cleaned carpet. A separate office with original built ins is perfect for anyone working from home or turn it into a quiet nursery!
Walking distance to top rated restaurants, health and fitness classes, Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, BART and steps to famous Lake Merritt make this an incredible location to live. Easy access to major freeways as well!
A secure, attached garage parking spot and another outdoor spot on the property are available for $250/month extra.
Additional amenities include keyless secure entry into building, completely gated, dual pane windows and an additional LARGE storage closet in the garage.
*No Water Beds Please
*No Smokers Please.

This gorgeous condo @ Parkwoods Condominium Complex offers a tranquil place to come home amidst the city bustle. 1 bd/ 1ba offers an open concept lvg room, dining room & kitchen floor-plan w/the private roomy fenced patio with a sliding door from the bd and door to the lvg room.The comfortable floor plan features the living room with gas fire place and dining area, carpet throughout, beautiful spacious bathroom, generous closets and a private balcony with an extra storage. Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 apartments for rent that will inspire you with open spaces soaring 14 to 25' high, original oak beam ceilings and exposed brick walls, and gorgeous windows with views of San Francisco and downtown Oakland. We hope to make Lampwork Lofts your new home.
For more information visit our website:

title: $2000 / 1br - 1917 brick bldg, 1 block to lake and BART 1bd with extra Artist space (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE is on February Sunday 10th from 12:00 pm. to 1:00 pm.
1 bedroom, 1 bath full kitchen with tons of style 1 block from the lake and BART at the Lake Merritt station. 1029 Oak street. The Townsend Apartments
In short, this apartment has tons of style due to the vintage, it's in a great area with an easy commute with BART visible from our front door.
THE BUILDING: The Townsend Apartments, located at 1029 Oak Street, is a beautiful four-story, historical brick building built in 1917. The red brick is offset by marble accents above the windows & entrance as well as the occasional green, yellow or blue tile accents. You will enter the building through a nicely gardened courtyard. The entryway has inlaid wood floors past its oak door and Phone Entry System. There is an elevator. The basement laundry room has two coin operated washing machines and three dryers. There are period light fixtures as well as tons of woodwork and etched glass windows in the hallways. There is some bike storage in the basement. The Museum of Oakland is across the street, Lake Merritt BART, Laney College & the Lake are just two blocks away. There is a CafÃÂ© across the street and Off the Grid food trucks 1 block away each Friday. BART provides an easy commute to San Francisco. The owner pays for steam heat, water and garbage. The Deposit is $2000. 
THE APARTMENT: This apartment is in the basement. Besides the apartment, there are an additional 540 square feet of artist space. This space is only accessible through the apartment so it is your own to use. It is not living space or habitable space because it is an unfinished area. There are windows and there is some amount of heat from the steam heat pipes in this area but it has unfinished brick walls and the ceiling is unfinished and un-insulated to the apartments above. This means that your noise or theirs is more likely to bother one or the other and care must be taken. This also means that there may not be sufficient power receptacles if someone were to attempt to use it as anything other than as an artist space although there is some electrical in that space. But it is 540 square feet of cement floor, brick walled, light filled additional space. In the past, it has been used by a painter and other creative types. If you can use it without bothering the tenants above then it could be a great extra space. The bathroom has a shower and a pedestal sink. There is a gas stove in the kitchen & modern counter tops and sink. The paint is a cream color with white trim.
This is a very period-perfect, cool building with incomparable style and great location. The unit number is #47, rent is $2000.
We do not have parking spaces. Parking is on the street.
Please meet outside for the open house. In order to expedite the application process you might want to bring the following info: current & former address & occupation info with contact #s. title: $2000 / 1br - 1917 brick bldg, 1 block to lake and BART 1bd with extra Artist space (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE is on February Sunday 10th from 12:00 pm. to 1:00 pm.
1 bedroom, 1 bath full kitchen with tons of style 1 block from the lake and BART at the Lake Merritt station. 1029 Oak street. The Townsend Apartments
In short, this apartment has tons of style due to the vintage, it's in a great area with an easy commute with BART visible from our front door.
THE BUILDING: The Townsend Apartments, located at 1029 Oak Street, is a beautiful four-story, historical brick building built in 1917. The red brick is offset by marble accents above the windows & entrance as well as the occasional green, yellow or blue tile accents. You will enter the building through a nicely gardened courtyard. The entryway has inlaid wood floors past its oak door and Phone Entry System. There is an elevator. The basement laundry room has two coin operated washing machines and three dryers. There are period light fixtures as well as tons of woodwork and etched glass windows in the hallways. There is some bike storage in the basement. The Museum of Oakland is across the street, Lake Merritt BART, Laney College & the Lake are just two blocks away. There is a CafÃÂ© across the street and Off the Grid food trucks 1 block away each Friday. BART provides an easy commute to San Francisco. The owner pays for steam heat, water and garbage. The Deposit is $2000. 
THE APARTMENT: This apartment is in the basement. Besides the apartment, there are an additional 540 square feet of artist space. This space is only accessible through the apartment so it is your own to use. It is not living space or habitable space because it is an unfinished area. There are windows and there is some amount of heat from the steam heat pipes in this area but it has unfinished brick walls and the ceiling is unfinished and un-insulated to the apartments above. This means that your noise or theirs is more likely to bother one or the other and care must be taken. This also means that there may not be sufficient power receptacles if someone were to attempt to use it as anything other than as an artist space although there is some electrical in that space. But it is 540 square feet of cement floor, brick walled, light filled additional space. In the past, it has been used by a painter and other creative types. If you can use it without bothering the tenants above then it could be a great extra space. The bathroom has a shower and a pedestal sink. There is a gas stove in the kitchen & modern counter tops and sink. The paint is a cream color with white trim.
This is a very period-perfect, cool building with incomparable style and great location. The unit number is #47, rent is $2000.
We do not have parking spaces. Parking is on the street.
Please meet outside for the open house. In order to expedite the application process you might want to bring the following info: current & former address & occupation info with contact #s. You will also need to bring a personal check for $15 to process the credit check. We don't carry cash at an open house.

body:

Contemporary newly refreshed 1B/1B Condo in a quiet building in the highly desirable Parkwoods gated community.  Light filled unit with open floor and high ceilings; living room and bedroom windows overlooking the serene landscape area; private balcony; new carpet, paint and kitchen countertops; gas fireplace; lots of storage; in-unit washer/dryer; 1 dedicated parking space in the building.  The complex is a gated community with onsite security personnel at night.  Complex amenities include huge swimming pool, fitness center, sauna, hot tub, and community room.  Exceptionally convenient access to public transit with Transbay E-line bus pick up right at Parkwood entrance; a commuter's dream!  Easy car access to Highway 24 and highway 13, with access to nearby College Avenue and Montclair shops and restaurants, or a short ride across Caldecott tunnel to Orinda and Lafayette.   Water and garbage collection paid by HOA.    Non-smoking.  No pets.

title: $2799 / 2br - 800ft2 - 1bd+Loft $2,799 INDUSTRIAL+CONTEMPORARY+ICONIC=Lampwork Lofts (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1 MONTH FREE
 1b/1b + den
-15 ft ceilings + industrial-sized windows with a ton of natural light 
-Exposed brick + oak/steel beams
-Large bathroom with shower + tub
-Stainless steel appliances + 
-Gas stove 
-Granite countertops
-Free wi-fi Internet included
Building Amenities:
-laundry room on every floor 
-Laundry Locker dry cleaning service onsite 
-Lounge area
-Assigned bike room
-Mail room 
-Secured Luxer One Lockers
-Overnight guard on duty 9pm-5am
-Community garden
-Wide hallways 
-Iconic Art work 
Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 units. Our luxury loft rentals feature high ceilings and super-sized windows allowing plenty of sunlight looking out at beautiful city views within one the bays most iconic neighborhood. Renovated kitchens with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, Newly renovated bathrooms with oversized vanity mirrors, and abundant His+hers closet space

body:
