This 600+ sq ft, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom detached cottage apartment
is in the rear courtyard of a well maintained two-story duplex. 
Square footage of the two bedrooms is approximately 10'x12' and 6'x9'. Smaller bedroom is best for children or an office, but can accommodate adults that are fine with smaller spaces!
- 5 minute walk to Lake Merritt
- 3 minute walk to Lucky, Walgreens on E. 18th St.
- 1 minute walk to Woody's and Rooz cafÃÂ© on Park Blvd.
- 5-10 minute bike/drive to Whole Foods
- 5-10 minute bike/drive to the Grand Ave, Lakeshore, Glenview, and Chinatown
retail/dining/shops
- Easy access to the 580 or 880 freeways (5 min. drive), downtown Oakland (25 min. walk / 5 min. drive), and Lake Merritt BART (20 min. walk / 5 min. drive)
This cottage apartment has bamboo wood floors, central heating,
and plenty of light. Kitchen and bath updated a few years ago with new appliances/fixtures cabinets/countertop and bar seating. Energy efficient windows. The cottage opens to a shared courtyard with opportunity for outside living and raised bed gardening.
Other details:
- Street parking within a block is usually pretty easy. 
- No pets or smoking.
- Tenant pays all utilities except water and garbage. 
- Complimentary on-site washer and dryer is shared between all 3 units.
This apartment is vacant and available immediately with a 12-month lease agreement, then converting to a month-to-month lease. Security deposit of $2300 is required (one month's rent).
The unit will be shown first-come, first-served, to interested parties. Simply email me, and we can schedule a showing!

title: $2900 / 2br - 750ft2 - 2 bed/1 bath, huge yard, safe sanctuary in E. Oakland (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are renting our house in East Oakland for $2900/month.  2 bed, 1 bath, recently remodeled.  Municipal costs included (water, sewer, trash).  Looking for a master tenant who will have flexibility to sublet if desired.
Hardwood floors throughout.  The kitchen and bathroom were remodeled just two years ago.  Bedrooms are each about 10' x 10'.  Sunny living room with large window looking at the front porch.  Attached garage can fit (snugly) one compact car, and the driveway can fit two compact cars next to each other if needed, plus there's usually ample street parking.  Appliances included (washer, dryer, fridge, oven).
The real jewel of this location is the yards.  We've put a lot of effort into gardening and have truly transformed both the front and back yards, including new fencing.  Looking for someone who is going to enjoy taking care of the gardens.  There are multiple flower (or vegetable) beds in the backyard plus a fire pit.  Beautiful for entertaining!
While Oakland gets a bad rap for crime, this block is extremely safe.  We have had packages left on our doorstep for days (while on vacation) and sometimes forget to lock our cars, and we've never had any problems.  Neighbors know each other and watch out for each other.
Located an easy drive to lots of great places with access to 580 and 880.  Halfway between the Oakland Zoo and the Oakland airport, about 10-15 minutes to downtown San Leandro, and 20 minutes to Lake Merritt or downtown Oakland.  Coliseum BART can be reached by a bus or a 7-10 minute drive, and new rapid bus route is being constructed just a few blocks away.  Lots of little Mexican restaurants and two Mi Tierra Supermercados within walking distance.
Looking for a move-in on Feb. 1, although something earlier may be possible.  Contact us for details about viewing the house.
Application just requires some proof of credit (CreditSesame.com is free and would do the trick) and/or employment, and basic information.  (Basically, if you can get the rent paid on time every month, we don't care where it comes from).  Move-in with first month's rent plus $2900 security deposit.  Pets welcome (although there may be an increased deposit).  Rental can be month-to-month or on a longer term contract.

title: $3800 / 2br - 1500ft2 - 2 bed + office & garage. Upper Glenview! Entire house. (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
$3,800    Great location!    
Not just an apartment ... a whole house and double garage!  Excellent location in desirable upper Glenview!  This approximately 1,500 square foot, 2+ bedroom, 1 bath house is located in UPPER Glenview in the Oakland hills, one block to East Bay hiking trails and Dimond Park.  Close to Park Blvd., transportation, restaurants and shopping!  An easy commute to San Francisco or downtown.  Includes detached DOUBLE garage with electronic opener with room for two cars and has a mail slot, workbench, car washing set up and storage.  Formal dining room with stained glass, working fireplace,  large rooms, eat-in kitchen, new roof, newly refinished beautiful original old oak hardwood floors, fresh paint, new oak luxury vinyl  flooring in kitchen, bathroom and plus room. Large backyard with patio, gazebo, orange tree, lemon tree, plum tree, and room for a vegetable garden. The house is up off the street for private, quiet living. Available now.
Located on a quiet and friendly cul-de-sac on the edge of Dimond Canyon, across the canyon from Oakmore.  Close to Hwy 13 and 580, walking distance to Glenview Village and 1 mile from Montclair Village. Within walking distance to casual carpool to San Francisco, AC transit bus line (including express to San Francisco), shopping, restaurants.   One block from East Bay trails (refer to Trail Head the documentary), Sausal Creek, Dimond park, tennis courts and pool.  
My ideal tenants will be long term, pay the rent on time, be able to do small repairs if they come up, keep garden watered, will maintain the hardwood floors, love to garden and will respect and love this loveable house. 
* 2+ bedrooms, 1 bath, plus room is a large room upstairs with built in cabinets
* Detached double garage with electronic opener, mail slot, storage, workbench and car washing set up 
* Formal dining room with window seat and stained glass 
* Eat-in kitchen with available gas stove, dishwasher and refrigerator 
* Laundry in kitchen with available newish large capacity, multi-water-level washing machine and dryer
* Newly refinished beautiful old oak flooring, new vinyl wood-like flooring and fresh paint.
* Fireplace with mantel 
* Large backyard with patio, gazebo, fruit trees and room for a vegetable garden 
* Attic and basement with workbench 
* Central burglar alarm system in place but deactivated. Tenants will be responsible for all costs and responsibility for updating, reactivation and maintenance. 
* New roof
* Has some insulation and earthquake retrofitting
* Includes gardener.
No smoking 
No pets of any kind
Not a Section 8 house
Will check credit and references 
Renter responsible for all utilities (including water, PG and E, garbage)
Security and cleaning deposit (each equal to a month's rent)
1 year minimum lease 
*  If interested please drive by first. 
*  Do not disturb the residents! 
*  Then respond to this ad with a contact phone number.

body:

Unit. 104
Oakland, Ca 94609
Located in the energetic Telegraph Ave. This lovely 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment has a good sized living area and two spacious bedrooms. It is a stand-alone unit, which offers a lot of privacy. The unit receives tons of natural lighting. The fresh paint, new floor tiles and blinds, and granite countertops give the unit a new look. Shared washer & dryer in the basement is accessible to all units in the building. 
Good WalkScore! Daily errands can be accomplished without a vehicle. A 4-minute bike ride to MacArthur BART station, perfect for any commuter. Multiple bus lines on Telegraph Ave. Super easy access to freeway I-580, I-980, and CA-24 highway. San Francisco, Downtown Oakland, Berkeley are in close proximity.

title: $3250 / 2br - 2 BR Lake Merritt View W/Large Bedrooms!! (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
1918 Lakeshore Avenue, OaklandThis absolutely stunning 2 BR with large bedrooms and natural lighting with a front view to Lake Merritt is a joy to come home to.  The Classic period architecture combined with a premiere location and unparalleled views across Lake Merritt make this a rare and unique opportunity for all.  Plenty of closet space and all newer appliances add to the grandeur of the building. Located within walking distance to retail shops, restaurants, schools, and public transportation serving the entire Bay Area. The property is only minutes from the major East Bay freeways.   The property's close proximity to Lake Merritt provides residents access to recreational facilities that include a boating center, rowing club, Nature Science Center, playground, and a 3.5-mile jogging/bicycling path. Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 apartments for rent that will inspire you with open spaces soaring 14 to 25' high, original oak beam ceilings and exposed brick walls, and gorgeous windows with views of San Francisco and downtown Oakland. We hope to make Lampwork Lofts your new home.
For more information visit our website:
http://www.lampworkloftsoakland.com/

Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 3030 Chapman, is just across from Alameda and two blocks from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area.
3030 Chapman offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, Caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. Many units have amazing views spanning from Downtown San Francisco to Downtown Oakland, Oakland Hills, and East Oakland. Private balconies and Patios attached to many units. title: $2900 / 3br - 800ft2 - 3Bedroom 1Bath Bottom Unit for Rent--Open House 02/16 (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Hello! 
A 3 bedroom 1 bathroom bottom level of a house is available for rent starting March 1st. We're hosting an open house this coming Saturday February 16th at 1:00pm. The house will be repainted and cleaned. The kitchen will be upgraded with new cabinets and sink. The space will look a lot better than the pictures and during the open house. 
The house is located in West Oakland, within 15 minutes bike ride and less than 30 minutes on foot to the West Oakland, 12th Street, and 19th Street BART station. The unit is approximately 800sqft, two bedrooms are around 10'x9'and the 3rd around 8'x19' Onsite laundry room is shared with upstairs, the sweet backyard offers two plum trees, a veggie garden that could use some more love, some outside furniture, plants, and a giant projector screen painted onto the back wall(!!). The gated front yard has one shared parking spot (or two with small cars). Meows and/or woofs of reasonable sizes and numbers are welcomed with $300 pet deposit. Upstairs neighbors are three young or young at heart professionals.
Rent is $2,900/month plus split utilities(PGnE, WM, EMBUD, and Internet) averaging $70/month/person.  One month rent security deposit and $20 credit check fee per applicant is required. Six months contract minimum followed by month to month. 
The owner prefers a group/family to take over the unit and sign one lease but is open to help putting a group together. If you're interested in attending the open house, please share your PERMANENT E-MAIL address in the reply, a little bit about yourself and we'll group e-mail the house address. 
Thanks for reading and best of luck with your search!

63 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 401 Derby, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area. 
401 Derby offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. Many units have views of the water or private balconies. Jingletown is very walkable and bikeable. The Fruitvale BART station is less than a 10-minute walk so you can be in San Francisco in less than 30 minutes.

title: $3800 / 4br - 4BR Flat Walking Distance to Downtown Oakland! (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Looking for spacious urban living in a convenient location close to the action?
Bordering Downtown and West Oakland, this beautiful flat is within 5-10min walking distance to BART (12th or 19th St Stations) as well as all the arts/culture scenes, shops, entertainment, and restaurants that downtown Oakland has to offer. Convenient locale and transportation options offer an ideal urban living situation for working professionals or commuters. But want to take an occasional break from the hustle and bustle? How about a relaxing jog to beautiful Lake Merritt less than two miles away? Want to get out on weekends?  It's a short hop onto 580/880 to get to the valley, or over Bay Bridge to SF.
What about the house itself? Downstairs unit in a bright, spacious duplex, large enough for you to invite folks over for a dinner party or movie. Beautiful wooden floors, large windows throughout the house allowing for lots of sunlight, and 4 full bedrooms (10'x10' or 12'x12') with plenty of additional closet space. Wooden deck/porch leading to a large backyard allows for lounging over some good beer, or run a barbecue. The unit is also situated on a quiet block, allowing a good night rest from your busy workday. 
Other things you may care about: Stainless steel kitchen appliances (range/stove/dishwasher) and new in-house fridge + washer/dryer. Large shack in back with secure bike rack/storage. Comcast is available for 100mbps for your internet needs.  Street parking is available around the house, plus one or two driveway and backyard spots.
There's lots we could say about the features of the house itself, but we've got pictures for all that (see attached).
Deposit is 1 month rent. Utilities NOT included in rent (except trash pickup). Rent terms are flexible, but we prefer those who can stay for at least a year or more. Unit available now.
Interested? Email us and tell us something about yourself. We appreciate being able to know the house will be in good hands above all else, and we enjoy finding people we'll be able to trust and solve problems with, elegantly and efficiently. Makes for easier living across the board, and if we can keep you in the neighborhood and help make it even better over the years, that's a win for everybody! Email us back to arrange for a viewing.

title: $2100 / 2br - 6 Weeks Free Rent! 2 room suite in Communal Space- Downtown Oakland! (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Schedule a viewing today! 
392 11th St.
Oakland, CA 94607
2 private rooms
1 private full bathroom
Shared common spaces
Furnished room available in a fully renovated co-living building right in the heart of Downtown Oakland. This is a 2 room suite with private full bath.
This fresh new housing concept welcomes people from all social and cultural backgrounds to join us as we create a one-of-a-kind place to call home. If you are tired of having roommates, new to town, or just want a convenient and affordable place to live- look no further. 392 11th St. has everything you need to stay, work, and play! 
How it works:
*Each resident rents a fully furnished room. 
*This unit is 2 rooms connected by a full, private bathroom. There are also additional bathrooms on every floor for all residents to use. 
*There are 5 shared kitchens and 5 shared living areas that can be accessed by all residents in the building. Each floor has a unique theme, so whether you want to lose yourself in a good book in the reading room, perfect your poker face in the game room, host a dinner party in the cook's quarters, relax and catch a flick in the lazy lounge, or root your team on to victory in the sports parlour- we've got you covered!
*Residents will be able to enjoy a variety of amenities in the huge open concept 5,000 sq. foot basement including:
*Coin-op laundry
*Bike storage
*Lounge area
*Theater w/projector screen
*Co-working space
...and more!
1 room comes furnished with modern bed frame, mattress, nightstand, and lamp. The other room is currently empty but can be furnished as well. 
Location, location! A 99 Walk Score and 89 Transit Score means no car necessary to run errands or commute to work. Walk to BART in 2 minutes and Lake Merritt in 11 minutes. Sip espresso at Fig & Poe- the brand new coffee shop on the 1st floor- or make reservations for delicious California fare downstairs at the restaurant (coming soon!).
Pets welcome (with some restrictions and additional terms) and leases start at 6 months in length. Utilities are a flat $95 per month. Security deposit is just $500. 
1 month free rent on 9 month lease minimums. The 1 month free offer will be split over the course of months 2-5 equally (4 parts). 
If you value diversity, community, convenience, and meeting new people- this may be the living situation for you. 
Check out a virtual tour of the room:
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=DaAoVNBrksd
Check out a virtual tour of a shared kitchen and lounge space:
https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=pLChKez22Jy
Contact us now for more information and to schedule a private tour! 
*More room styles available, contact us to inquire.
Kris: kris at vpmpropertymanagement.comshow contact info

*Rental requirements include (but are not limited to): Monthly income must be at least 2x the rent, 650 FICO score or better, no evictions 
Armando Sanchez, Broker 
License #01359505

title: $2450 / 2br - Amazing Corner unit, Parking, BBQ, Laundry, Near Lake! (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
******Available March 1. Unit is occupied till about then. Showings are limited due to current occupants. Showings will be advertised, as an Open House.
Previously remodeled with Beautiful wood floors and a Spacious floor plan, the kitchen includes an updated stainless steel gas stove and refrigerator. The unit overlooks the garden patio area complete with Squirrels. BBQ patio with community BBQ's for your use. Secured covered parking underneath. Laundry room is located in the front of building and open 24/7. Very good, friendly and quite neighbors galore. Beautiful landscape front and back. 
*****Utilities included in rent are Water, and Garbage. ***Parking is Free, ***No Pet Rent, and no other hidden charges! All you pay is rent, electric and gas (PGE), internet, cable tv,  phone jack. Real simple living! :D
Quality you can live with. Arbor Villa Terraces is a well maintained apartment community located just east of the lake off Park Ave. This gated community features remodeled units with spacious floor plans, a central location close to everything, clean grounds, covered parking, and a quiet, peaceful friendly environment. 
GREAT LOCATION INFO:
Sunny all the time! Just off Park Blvd!!! Minutes away from Lake Merritt!!! Located between 880 and 580 freeways and alternate transportation, AC Transit and Bart.ÃÂ 
***7 Blocks to Lake Merritt! About 10 minutes by walking! Nearby shopping, coffee shops, restaurants, parks, trails, and boating. Lake Merritt's running and biking trails on Lakeshore Ave. Nearby parks are Belle Vista, Athol Plaza, Peralta Park, FM Smith Park,Park Boulevard Plaza, Clinton Square, San Antonio Park, Vantage Point Park.ÃÂ 
Located in The Eastlake /Clinton neighborhood. One of Oakland's most desirable areas with its quiet tree lined streets and charming surroundings, and best-kept secrets, close to everything! Very bike-able or walking distance to numerous small grocery, neighborhood stores, restaurants, and cafes.ÃÂ Several excellent choices are: "Woodsy's Cafe, and Rooz Cafe" both on Park Blvd. "Bambu Desserts & Drinks" on International Blvd. "Champa Garden" Thai/Laotian at 2102 8th Ave excellent World Class choice!!!" Just 1 and a half blocks away! "The grocery Cafe" Burmese, "Kainbigan" Filipino and "Philomena" Pizza, "Portal Restaurant", "Sam's Restaurant", "Chopsticks" and some of "Oakland's best taco trucks" are also nearby. Just off Park Blvd: the delights of "Marzano, Bellanico and Park Burger". The closest grocery stores are Dave's Grocery & Liquor, Food 24 Hour Convenience Market and Lucky Spot Liquor.
MORE CHOICES:
Conveniently located 6 blocks distance to the 3rd Ave and East 18th Street the "New Lucky Super Store Shopping Center" which includes: Walgreens, Merritt Bakery, Parkway Theater, Hollywood Video, Chase Bank, Dry Cleaners, and lots more. The great location, centered around the Lake Merritt area, means you'll never be far from Lakeshore's unique shopping and restaurants, Saturday morning's Grand Lake Farmer's Market, and Grand Lake Theater. Minutes away from Trader Joe's and Safeway, Whole Foods, etc.
BART INFO:
By Car or Bike: 7-8 minutes to the Lake Merritt BART Station located at 800 Madison Street, Oakland, CA 94607. Approximately 1.6 miles to the Lake Merritt BART Station.ÃÂ 
By Bus: Easy walk to bus stop 1 block away AC Transit (#AC 62 bus) takes 17 minutes that will take you to the Lake Merritt BART Station or on to San Francisco!
APPLICATION and TOUR INFO:
*****For an application please call and one can be emailed to you.
Call Carolyn the property manager at  show contact info
. This phone number does not accept text.
Arbor Villa Terraces Apartment Homes a well-maintained community that provides quality you can live with. New and mature beautiful landscape front and back. Very good, friendly and quite neighbors galore! At night a quiet, peaceful neighborhood environment for all.ÃÂ ***Future plans include painting the exterior of the building. We use healthy cleaning products and EcoSpec low VOC (healthier) paint, and wood floors.ÃÂ 
RENTAL Requirements:
-1 year lease
-Security Deposit $1500 
-Application per person fee $35.
-All move in monies due at lease signing
-Tenant pays rent,gas/electric, and cable/internet.
-Owner pays water, sewer and trash.
-Non smokers /No smoking in the unit.
-Pet friendly :).  No breed or size restriction! :) However subject to Manager's approval.
-Credit score of 700 or better.ÃÂ 
-No Collections or Evictions.ÃÂ 
-Income has to be 2 and a half times the rent.
-No bad credit need not apply!
-Sorry no Section 8 or Subsidy Income.

http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/

Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff

title: $2500 / 2br - 1100ft2 - Amazing Sound Studio/Apartment Live/Work Combo (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A haven for musicians who like to live loud. At Melrose Sound Studios, each live/work unit includes its own built-in soundproofed sound studio and control room/equipment room. We are noise friendly 24/7, so you can feel free to jam at 3:00 AM to your heart's content.
Our tenants are all musicians and people working professionally in the music industry. We encourage you to run your music business from your sound studio/apartment!
* It's like having your own apartment and sound studio all in one package!
* Play 24 hours a day -- play whenever you want
* No packing up instruments or gear to go somewhere to play
* No more moving gear or driving to practice
* You can have a drink while you play because you don't need to drive home afterwards
* Record at home -- a control room is included!
* Practice, rehearse, and get ready for gigs 24 hours a day
* No fear of disturbing your neighbors or roommates
* Gated on-site parking
* 2 Bedrooms
* Extra room that can be used as an office space or as a lounge for recording clients!
* Kitchen with stove/range, refrigerator, dishwasher, built-in microwave, granite counters
* Living/Dining area
* Bathroom
* 24 hour video surveillance
* Our vacant unit has the Premium Level of soundproofing, 12" of solid cement, sound isolation clips, sound absorbing insulation, plus floating walls, floor, and ceiling.
What you get:
* Apx. 900 sq. ft. 2-bedroom apartment.  This is our largest unit!
* Plus Apx. 200 sq. ft. soundproofed sound studio (apx 19'x11')
All in one!
(this unit does not include a control room, just a soundproofed sound studio)
What you save:
* Comparable 2BR apartment in the neighborhood = $2300
* Separate 19'x11' Practice Space = $600
* Total = $2900
* Rent at Melrose = $2500
* Savings by renting at Melrose = $400/month
The Melrose Difference:
* No more loading/unloading gear
* No more pissed off neighbors
* No more driving home at 3:00 AM
* No more worries about being pulled over if you have a beer while you play
Please check our website for more details. You can fill out an application at our website. We look forward to hearing from you and hope you're interested in living and working in an environment with other like-minded musicians.
To complete an application, please visit our website:
http://melrosesoundstudios.net/

title: $875 / 3br - apartment, w/d in unit, no private bath, private room (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
I am moving out of my lovely Oakland apartment and am looking for someone to fill the space beginning on March first. We are looking for a women (sorry, fellas) in her mid 20s to mid 30s who has a steady schedule and income to join two other women and a husky!
About the house and roomies:
Our apartment is quite new (building was completed only five years ago), includes modern appliances: full kitchen equipped with range, dishwasher and fridge, washer and dryer in-unit; and is located in a quiet neighborhood in upper diamond district. It's a 3-bed/2-bath unit with a small backyard, and is one half of a side-by-side duplex. The unit is on the back half of the lot, so it is set back from the street (though it is visible from the street). The room up for grabs is the front room with a moderate closet, and shares a bathroom with one other roommate. 
We keep a tidy and calm house. We are all working girls with full-time jobs, friends, and hobbies that keep us busy, so our home is our sanctuary. We like to chat over a glass of wine in the evenings, but we also like to take our space and retreat to our rooms sometimes. We generally don't bring the party home, but friends and significant others are welcome (as long as they're not here all the time). 
Roomies:
S- (31) Professional gal who works for a tech company in the city. Relocated from the east coast six years ago and is devoted mom to Daisy.
Daisy- A sweet but rambunctious husky. Daisy is a love bug, but she can also be quite energetic (typical husky), so we want to be clear that we are looking for someone who is very comfortable with dogs.
About you:
Ideal new roommate would be gainfully employed and keep regular-ish hours during the week. We would like to find someone who can commit to a year with a low-key home life that enjoys making their home their retreat from the day to day grind. New roomie can do whatever they want in their room, but should be respectful of shared spaces and willing to clean up after themselves and contribute to the household. We ask that you not be a smoker. We'd also appreciate someone who is willing to assist a bit with Daisy's care (an occasional walk or meal served - nothing major). Other than that, we are just looking for a kind, pleasant, and responsible person to share our home with.
Unfortunately, we aren't able to take any more pets in the apartment. 
If this sounds like a good fit for you, please send a message with some info about yourself and why you're interested in the house.
Thank you!
Lauren

body:

OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 2/17 12:30-1PM
3139 Harrison St.
Oakland, CA 94611
3bd/2ba Single-Family Home w/Bonus Room
This single-family home is a true gem in a hard-to-beat location- close to Lake Merritt, Lakeshore Ave., Whole Foods, Sprouts, Kaiser, Piedmont, Uptown, local favorite Chica Cafe, plus a convenience store across the street. 82 Walk Score! Many errands can be accomplished on foot or bike. 
A few updates inside the home include a new gas range, new fridge, fresh paint, and refinished wood kitchen countertops. The kitchen is large and has ample counter and cabinet space. 
Original built-ins and bay windows provide for that vintage Victorian charm and lots of natural light. Spacious separate dining and living areas. The front bedroom is smaller, the 2 back bedrooms are larger and both have full bathrooms. There is a bonus room off the master bedroom which can be used as a home office or den. Laundry room has storage and private washer and dryer. 
Very LARGE and private backyard- perfect for relaxing, playing, or entertaining! Huge deck that is perfect for seating and a barbeque grill. The lush front yard is also very grand and inviting. The driveway on the side of the home has off-street parking for 2 vehicles. The basement can be used for additional storage. 
Owner pays for yard maintenance and trash.

body:

My husband and I just bought a house, so we have to move out of our beautiful apartment a little before our lease expires on June 1.  Our current lease anticipates increasing rent by $150/month starting June 1 if the lease is renewed.  But this apartment is totally worth it!  
It's spacious with an open floor plan, two good sized bedrooms, a beautiful kitchen with all new, top-line appliances and cabinets, brand new washer and dryer, huge windows and lots of light.  Check out the pictures!  Not pictured: a one-car garage with enough room for storage, an extra off-street parking space in front of the garage, and a large shared yard.  
This apartment is one of four in two-story building, and is the only second floor apartment, so it's really quiet.  The neighborhood is quiet and residential, walking distance to a few good restaurants and bodegas, and an easy drive to the Laurel and Fruitvale.  
This location is great for commuters: close to 880, 580, and 13, and a 20 minute walk/10 minute bike ride to Coliseum BART and Amtrak station.  There a few AC transit bus lines that pick up nearby as well.  We loved living here!

****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) We require the residents to provide a copy of renter's insurance. Bay's Elite Management must be listed as "Additional Insured" and general liability should be $100,000 with a maximum deductible of $1,000. If you do not have renter's insurance we can provide you with a link to a company many of our residents use for low cost insurance.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staff
---
pedram

title: $4400 / 4br - 2138ft2 - Beautiful FURNISHED Rockridge Craftsman Available for 9 Months Only (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A fantastic opportunity for a 9 month stay in the heart of Rockridge. Perfect for families remodeling their own home or who need temporary housing while they are looking to buy. Available February 15, 2019 - November 15, 2019.
This amazing 3+ bedroom, 3 bath house comes tastefully furnished and a $350 monthly flat utility fee covers all utilities, including high speed internet.
This home is a classic 2 story craftsman with a huge front porch. Front door enters into the living room with decorative fireplace and coffered ceiling. Hardwood floors, vintage moldings, and period details run throughout. The formal dining room features a handsome built-in glass front cabinet with drawers and a large table that casually seats six.  The downstairs bedroom is set up as an office.
Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, modern cabinets, and elegant pendant lights accent the updated kitchen. With plenty of space for a breakfast nook inside, the kitchen also opens through French doors to a large deck, perfect for outdoor dining.
The deck and backyard can be accessed through the entertainment room as well. A full bath and ground floor bedroom, currently set up as an office complete the main level.
Upstairs, a spacious landing houses the enclosed washer and dryer. The 2 regular bedrooms have good closets and are furnished with both dressers and desks. A huge full bath with double sink vanity and shower over deep tub is close by, off the hallway. The master suite has a walk-in closet, queen size bed, two dressers, and an enormous en-suite master bath.
Amazing location, close to everything! Just a 5 minute walk to Rockridge BART and all the delights of College Avenue.
Garage is available for storage only. 
One off-street parking space is included.
Minimum deposit is 1.5 the rent.
Pets will be considered.  Increased deposit will be required.
Available February 15th.
Showing by appointment only.
Please email to take a look and tell us a little about yourself.
================
Stephanie DeMott, BRE #02007384show contact info
 /  show contact info

AndreaRentals, BRE #02003472
A Rental Concierge for Bay Area Owners and Renters
www.andrearentals.com

title: $4340 / 3br - 2330ft2 - Beautiful Hiller Highlands 3 Beds/2.5 Bath/Loft Townhouse with Views (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
3 Bedroom, 2.5 bath contemporary Hiller Highlands townhome with large loft. Approx. 2330 sq. ft. Features a sophisticated living room with vaulted ceilings and gas fireplace, modern kitchen, dining area, elegant master retreat with gas fireplace and walk-in closet, large loft suitable for office/entertainment. Master bath has "his and her" sinks, shower, and Jacuzzi tub. Balconies from living room and master suite. Views from master suite, living, dining, kitchen and loft. Lower level has two bedrooms and one full bath, and opens to private patio area. House is unfurnished. Washer/dryer included. Alarm system is installed. Highlands country club membership available at additional cost (http
highlandscountryclub.info/). Fantastic location close to freeway and transportation/BART, minutes to the Rockridge/Claremont/College Ave shops, 20 minute drive to San Francisco. No smokers/no pets. Call or email to arrange a showing:  show contact info
;  show contact info

Available from 5 March 2019
Minimum Qualification:
Must have a minimum FICO credit score of 650
No prior Evictions or Unlawful Detainer filing
Must have verifiable gross income of at least 2.8 times the rent per month
Must have positive references
No smokers/pets
Tenant responsible for PG&E, water, garbage, cable, telephone and internet.
First and last month rent and security deposit of $2,500 due at time of lease signing

title: $3699 / 4br - BEAUTIFUL HUGE 4 BDRM UPPER VICTORIAN FLAT NR MacARTHUR BART (oakland north / temescal)
$3150 / 1br - 917ft2 - Beautiful Large 1 bedroom apartment with upgrades! 1010 2 (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Contact Chris at  show contact info
, text/call
Available November 2nd!
A massive 1 bedroom apartment on the top floor with gorgeous hardwood floors throughout
Fully updated kitchen with a dishwasher, with quartz counters and newer cabinetry
Washer and Dryer in the unit
Old-world charm can be seen throughout the unit with excellent finishes
Plenty of natural light
The property has been fully rehabbed in the past few years
Steps away from the Lake Merritt, public transportation & bart is 10 min on a bicycle
1 car covered parking included
Water and Garbage included 
$3500 deposit
========================================================
LEASE TERMS
========================================================
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
http://eliteapts.com/available-properties/
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. BEMG won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure the lease so that the lease end date is no later than the beginning/end of the Summer and they'd be Renewable again for a Year at the termination.
9) Proof of renters insurance will be required.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.
BEMG Staft
----
pedram

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful Rockridge house available! It's a charming 1 bedroom, 1 bath, lower unit of a large 2 story house(with private entrance). It has wood floors, a lot of natural light, and a spacious kitchen and dining area. There is also access to a shared garden which you're more then welcome to work in if you enjoy gardening. Pros:
Ã¢ÂÂ It is a new building, so we have a few different units available for you to choose from.

Cons:
Ã¢ÂÂ No master bedroom, rooms are not huge, they are about 110 sqft or less and can fit a bed, a closet, and a dresser, maybe a desk but that's about it. 
Ã¢ÂÂ Utilities not included, estimated around $50-150 per unit.

title: $2150 / 1br - Close to Everything,Off Street Parking,New Floors,1/4 Mile from Lake!! (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Open house Saturday (2/16) from 4-4:30pm! Other viewings may be available during the week, please send a message if you're interested in making an advance appointment or attending the open house.
This 1st floor apartment in a quiet, professional building just opened up and it won't last long! Amazing neighborhood (1/4 mile from Lake Merritt, mini-mart around the corner, 15 minute walk to 19th St BART, steps away from restaurants, bars, dry cleaners, etc), open living room, 2 closets, kitchen includes stove, oven, fridge and space for an eat-in setup! Laundry downstairs, no coins needed (rent includes laundry fee). And yes, this rent does include one off-street parking spot--so convenient!
One month's rent for deposit. Landlord pays for water/trash/composting, your only utility responsibility is PGE. Cats are accepted at community for an additional $100 deposit. No dogs allowed. Landlord is good/quick about responding to maintenance items.
Approx room size is as follows:
living room- 17'x14'
bdrm- 10'x10'
The landlord is desiring an early March move, if possible, but willing to wait for the right tenant.
Open house Saturday (2/16) from 4-4:30pm. Email back for a full address and application, you'll want to have it completed when you arrive @ the open house. The landlord is desiring at least 3x income/rent ratio, excellent credit and rental history. Be ready to provide rental references. No section 8.

title: $2670 / 2br - 962ft2 - Come & Live At 401 Derby. $$2670$$ Two Bedroom One Bath (oakland hills / mills)
body:

*************** Pictures may not be of the exact unit, but finishes are similar. ********************
*******************************UNIT AVALIABLE 2/8 *******************************
401 DERBY
Office Hours: Monday - Friday 9-5
63 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 401 Derby, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area. 
401 Derby offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. Many units have views of the water or private balconies. Jingletown is very walkable and bikeable. The Fruitvale BART station is less than a 10-minute walk so you can be in San Francisco in less than 30 minutes. 
Unit features:
LVT floors 
Large double pane windows
High-end contemporary finishes
Stainless steel appliance
Gas range stove
Stackable washer and dryer in each unit
Modern white-matte and dark brown-matte cabinetry with brushed metal hardware with soft-close hinges and hardware
Caesarstone counter-tops
Large bathroom vanities with spacious built-in drawers
A variety of units include large private patios/balconies and/or both with amazing views 
Central heating
Pet friendly

Community outdoor space

title: $2100 / 1br - 742ft2 - Completely renovated 1bdr/1bth garden style apartment (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Conveniently located large 742 sq ft 1 bedroom unit on quiet tree lined street in the Tuxedo/Highland Park neighborhood.  This is the back unit of a duplex that has just been completely gutted and thoughtfully renovated. Upgrades include new electrical, plumbing & heating, recessed lighting, all new dual pane windows, on demand hot water, in-unit laundry room with high efficiency washer and dryer, new cabinetry, stainless steel appliances,  gas range, dishwasher, quartz countertops, new tile and hardwood floors. 
Abundant windows brighten up this already spacious apartment. There is also a separate laundry area that has exit accessing backyard and also features an open kitchen with breakfast area. Off street parking in driveway included, with plenty of street parking also available.
Close to Grand, Lakeshore, Glenview and Dimond neighborhood. Shop at Trader Joes, Farmer Joes, La Farine, visit the weekend farmer's market, or eat at the plethora of restaurants. Easy access to 580 Freeway, BART, Downtown Oakland, casual carpool, and AC Transit lines (short walk to Transbay stop).
Lease Terms:
-1 year lease
-Owner pays water and garbage
-Tenants responsible for all other utilities
-No pets
-No smoking
-Monthly rent: $2100.00
-Security Deposit $2500.00
Application fee: $15 per person
Contact Zhong to schedule a tour of this home. 
Application Fee: A check written out to Wells and Bennett Realtors is required for processing each applicant's credit report. The check amount is $15.00 per adult living in the household. All applicants may request a copy of their credit report. Type of Tenancy: One year lease. Security Deposit: $2500.00.  Monthly Rent: $2100.00. Non-smokers only, No Section 8, No pets. Move in expenses: Tenant to pay first month rent along with Security Deposit. Please note this must be in the form of a cashier's check. Renters insurance is recommended.
Information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.
Zhong Lei

title: $4900 / 3br - 2240ft2 - Contemporary Montclair Home with Bay Views Available in March! (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are proud to present a mid-century contemporary three bedroom, three bathroom home with outstanding views of the San Francisco Bay Area with bridge views. An interior walkway leads to the front entry. Descending into the main level, which opens to a bright and airy living space, a spectacular wall of glass highlights the views of the bay. Opaque windows offer light and privacy. A floor to ceiling glass fireplace is sure to draw your attention and separates the formal dining room from the living room. A home office on this mail level offers a cozy place to work or study. 
The updated modern kitchen boosts excellent storage with oak cabinets, granite counters and stainless steel appliances. A double oven, cook top, side-by-side refrigerator, dishwasher and microwave offer an efficient place to cook a meal. To complete the kitchen, a utility room offers a stacked full size washer and dryer. On the opposite end of the floor are the large master suite, hall bathroom and second bedroom. Under the main stairs is a custom-built storage space for your wine collection. 
A circular stairwell leads to the large family room with a dry bar and wine captain. An adjacent ensuite bedroom offers a retreat away from the rest of the sleeping quarters. Exterior access to the lower level is accessible from the side of the house. Three decks perch from each level of the home to offer a spectacular outdoor living space for entertainment, al fresco dining and wonderful views. This home is approximately 2240sf and located minutes away from Montclair Village shopping and eateries. Additional features include: 
*Washer and Dryer 
*Sliding Glass Door Access to Multi-Level Decks 
*Hardwood and Carpet 
*Canyon and San Francisco Bridge Views 
*Open Floorplan 
*Three Full Bathrooms 
*Central Heating 
*Storage Area 
*Two Car Garage with Interior Access 
*Short Distance to Montclair Village, Lake Temescal, Redwood Regional Parks and Trails, Glenview's Restaurant Row, and Rockridge BART 
*Close to Joaquin Miller and Montclair Elementary, Montera Jr. High, and a Number of Great Private Schools 
* http://montclairvillage.com 
* http://www.greatschools.org 
* http://www.urbanvillageonline.com/markets/montclair-village 
* http://www.ebparks.org/parks/redwood 
Welcome Home! 
Terms: 
Minimum One Year Lease 
Renter's Insurance is Required 
Owner Pays for Annual Gardening Maintenance 
This is a Non-Smoking Home 
Sorry, No Pets Allowed 
Contact: 
Martin Chan 
DRE# 01400871 or 
Bonita Chinn show contact info

Discovery Investments, Inc. 
DRE#01911108

title: $2100 / 1br - Cozy 1bedroom/1bath furnished apartment (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Fully furnished 1 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment located in the Lower Bottoms of West Oakland. The property is 3 blocks from West Oakland Bart station which is a 6-minute walk. Highway 80, 880 and 580 are no more than a 5-minute drive. 8 minutes to Downtown Oakland and 10 minutes to San Francisco without traffic.
UNIT: 
Bedroom has a queen size bed with 1 nightstand and television. Fireplace is accessible via bedroom and living room. Living room couch sits 3 people, there is a living room table and mounted television.  The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, new dual pane windows throughout the apartment. Tile bathroom with bluetooth lighting. Accent lighting in bedroom and living room. Water and garbage are included in the rent. Private mailbox inside the secured gate.
THINGS TO KNOW ABOUT THE PROPERTY: 
We are currently in the process of remodeling all units. 2 units have been completed and 4 more units are scheduled for remodeling. The backyard is a part of the remodel but as of now, it is only used for emergency exits. The exterior of the property needs to be repainted and will be completed after the units and backyard. All remodel work will be done during the day Monday - Friday. There is street/permit parking. We ask that potential tenants drive by the property and through the neighborhood in order to get a feel of the area and an actual view of the outside of the property prior to making an appointment.
CURRENT TENANTS:
The upstairs unit is currently occupied by a family with children. The tenant will be moving out of the unit once we start the remodel of their apartment. We have made the family aware that the downstairs unit will be rented out soon and that they have to be mindful of the noise. 
There are two tenants that have been renting from us prior to the no-smoking request. They are aware that they aren't allowed to smoke cigarettes in the building. Our goal is to make the property tobacco-free. 
RENTAL REQUIREMENTS:
*Background, credit check and application process will be done through TENANTMAGIC; there will be a $35.00 fee that you pay directly to the company allowing us access to the reports. 
*Accepting pets with $500 deposit. Pet deposit can be split into payments.
*No prior, pending or near pending evictions. 
Rent/deposit:
Monthly rent is $2,100
Security deposit is $2,100 (can be split into 4 payments)

title: $5900 / 3br - 3000ft2 - Custom/lux home for lease (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This custom beauty is located in Montclair hills in the section of piedmont pine. Only a few minutes driving to downtown Montclair and hwy 13 and very short distance to all the big cities and SF bar station. Less than a mile to elementary and the middle schools.
Peace, tranquility, privacy and beauty of nature are in this neighborhood.
Biggest corner lot in Montclair hills nearly 24000 SQF hillside. It has a canyon views, plenty of parking space in the case of entertainments.
3000 SQF living space.
very elegant French architectural design.
Facing east, a lot of sun and light energy during winter, cool and light energy during summer, So many windows canyon views from each and every windows.
3 large bedrooms all have high ceilings with the shape of pyramids.
Master suite is very large, high ceiling, private canyon views, marble fire place, extra large walking closet including skylight, extra large master bath with whirlpool jacuzzi tub.
3.5 baths all are marbled, new fixtures and freshly painted.
Kitchen is very large and elegant. It has a pyramid shape high ceiling. It has all Viking brand stainless steel appliances, Italian granite, elegant kitchen cabinets and antique fixtures.
Living room, dining room and formal dining rooms are very large. They all are hardwood flooring, French crystal chandeliers and marble fire places in living room and family room.
3 wood burning fire places all marbled.
Vacuum system, intercom system and security alarm system through the house.
Large laundry room including washer/drayer.
2 decks on the side yard, private canyon views very peaceful ideal for BBQ and entertainments..
This property is also available for lease with option to buy, it is available both long/short term or month to month.
For more information please contact the owner at  show contact info
.

body:

Gorgeous Updated One Bedroom in Awesome Location in Grand Lake with Washer and Dryer.
Move-in special: Half off your first full month of rent!
Grand Lake is situated on the northeast corner of Oakland's Lake Merritt. This neighborhood fuses intimate with urban, featuring hilly streets, great nightlife, a variety of restaurants and bars, shopping, the Grand Lake Theatre, and much more. There is also an awesome weekly farmer's market close by which features live music and locally grown produce.
Safeway, Starbucks, Trader Joe's, and many of the attractions are within close walking distance.
Getting around is easy, with local transportation stops within a 5-minute walk and the Ford GoBike Station is a 10-minute walk away.

*First floor one bedroom/one bathroom apartment, reached by a flight of stairs.
*Carport parking available for $200.
*Upgraded kitchen with new white cabinets, granite counters, stainless steel appliances (refrigerator, dishwasher), black/stainless electric stove/oven, tile design backsplash, and modern recessed lighting.

*Laminate/vinyl wood floor throughout.
*Washer and dryer.
*Electric wall unit heat.

title: $2075 / 2br - 600ft2 - Fruitvale Cottage with Art Studio (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This remodeled 1924 cottage combines the best of an old Oakland bungalow with Mid-Century Modern decor.  Inside, it features new floors, counters, deluxe appliances, light fixtures, and paint;  while outside, the cottage is surrounded by two large patios, a shed with new washer and dryer units, mature fruit trees, and a new Tiny Home for use as a studio.  Privacy is assured by a fenced yard with lockable door, producing the feeling of being in a private compound.  We intended this as a possible owner's unit, hence the deluxe treatment throughout--but our plans have changed, and we have decided not to sell the complex.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ One bedroom, one bath cottage.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Separate Tiny Home about 120 square feet, featuring a loft, electricity, and heat, but no plumbing.  Brand new!
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Open floor plan with tile kitchen counter.  Perfect for entertaining!
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Five burner gourmet stove, stainless steel refrigerator with ice maker, new sink and cabinets in kitchen.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ All new, distressed random-plank wood flooring throughout.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Separate dining room with exterior access to rear patio.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ Brand new bathroom with high-quality, never-used tub, toilet, and sink.
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ New, professionally installed landscaping including drip system for low maintenance.  Mature fig tree, avocado tree, kiwi vines, and lemon tree. 
Ã¢ÂÂ¢ The two large patios seem made for summer parties, outside dining, or just relaxing with a book. 
The cottage is located in the heart of Oakland's Fruitvale District on 38th Ave. Easy walk to BART, restaurants, and shopping.  For a recent description of the neighborhood, see the East Bay Express article "The Town's Gem": https://www.eastbayexpress.com/oakland/fruitvale-the-towns-gem/Content?oid=23672375
We are looking for a reliable, friendly tenant for this amazing cottage.  Requirements: Three times the monthly rent in income, FICO score of 700, and great landlord references.  First months' rent and security deposit of two months' rent required before possession.  $45 application fee.  Tenants pay utilities.
Please email and tell us a little about yourself.  The cottage is available now.  Showings by appointment.
Thanks for reading, and we look forward to meeting you!

This home was completely renovated inside and out in December 2018 and features a bright and open floor plan with a gourmet kitchen filled with brand new high end stainless steel appliances. The huge master bedroom features an en suite with a double vanity and large tiled shower with stainless multi-function shower panel.
1224 38th Avenue, is located just blocks from Fruitvale BART station, convenient freeway access, and tons of great restaurants, including nationally acclaimed restaurant Nyum Bai!
List of Home Features:
 Contemporary and bright home with 3 BR & 2 bath including master en-suite.
 Home completely renovated inside and out and completed in Dec. 2018.

 All new high end appliance suite including full size washer and full size dryer, stainless slide-in range, contemporary peninsula range hood, large stainless French  door refrigerator, stainless dishwasher, stainless under cabinet microwave and large stainless sink with pull down faucet, soap dispenser and  high powered garbage disposer.

title: $2499 / 1br - 700ft2 - Fully-furnished 1bed 1bath mins from Lake Merritt (monthly available) (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A cozy spacious independent in-law unit that has everything you will need for a short (minimum one month) or long stay on a monthly basis or yearly contract. This place is conveniently located just a 15-minute drive from the Oakland Airport, minutes from 580 highway, casual carpool station to San Francisco, and AC Transbay bus stops. 
The unit has a large open plan living and bedroom area. The spacious main bedroom overseas the entrance door to the unit from the back yard. There is also a large picture window that looks out to the yard and lets you enjoy the warmth of ample natural lighting. In the second room you will find a dining table, a comfy sofa where you can sit back and relax or open it up and take in a good night sleep. The unit has a kitchenette furnished with full size refrigerator, dishwasher, and a microwave. The unit also comes with a full size washer and dryer. 
Summary of important features:
- Available on a monthly basis or longterm contract
- Fully furnished 
- Fully independent (separate access with independent security system and no shared space with landlord)
- Inside unit washer/dryer and dishwasher
- All utilities included in the monthly rent
- Free wifi and basic TV cable
House rules:
- Absolutely no smoking inside the unit or anywhere on the premises 
- Quiet Hours
- No subleasing 
- Overnight guest requires permission 
If you are interested, please kindly send us an introductory email to coordinate your visit within or outside our upcoming open houses. The process of selecting the tenet will include background check, and contacting references. The security deposit will be one month rent.

title: $3600 / 2br - 1200ft2 - FURNISHED: 2 BR, 1 BA with Bonus Private Indoor and Outdoor Space (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Traveling for the next year so our amazing home is available [$3,600 per month]
Available: Feb 15, 2019 onwards
West Oakland BART 7 minute walk away
============================
Bright and private oasis in the heart of San Francisco Bay Area's tech / art district, while still being less than 10 minutes to the Bay's major hubs (i.e. downtown - SF, Oakland and Berkeley) and hiking in the East Bay's regional forest / hills. 
This is a first floor unit that is large, comfortable, with a private outdoor space and all the amenities ready... just bring your suitcase!
Perfect for: longer term sublet (minimum: 1 month +)
- Visiting Postdoctoral / Professor at UC Berkeley (10 min drive, or 4 BART stops away)
- Moving to SF bay area looking for a temporary home while setting into a new job (downtown SF is 1 BART stop away or 10 minute car ride)
- Place to hang your hat in between selling your home and purchasing your new one.
==============
The Space:
This is a first floor unit that is completely private and was recently remodeled and decorated with all new furnishings and appliances.
The Accommodations:
Sleeping: this unit sleeps 2 - 7.  But ideally most comfortable for for 4 or less. 
- 1 to 2 in the front bedroom (queen bed)
- 2 to 4 in the master (queen bed and queen fold out couch)
- 1 in living room (fold out double size couch)
Outdoor Space: The unit includes outdoor space to enjoy the sunny Oakland weather. 
- Private furnished patio great for reading, and unwinding
- Shared fenced in backyard to host cookie outs or just have lunch outside
Bathroom:
- Fully remodeled bathroom with walk in shower
Kitchen:
- Newly remodeled kitchen with breakfast bar
- Fully stocked with flatware, cookware, and coffee bar
- New appliances
- Dishwasher
Parking:
- Off street parking available for 1 car with the unit (Additional parking spot available for fee)
Bonus:
- Office: Added private office / study booth
- Laundry: stocked laundry room with washer and dryer
- Storage: closet in each room and a large common closet
Amenities:
- Linens are available and can be provided. (sheets, pillows, towels)
- Smart TV with basic cable and ready to be linked to any Netflix, Prime, etc. account
- Wifi is available
==============
Location:
Close to everything!
Public Transportation:
- 5 block walk to West Oakland Bart
- Be in downtown SF / Union Square / Ferry Building in 1 stop (7 mins)
- Be in Downtown Oakland / Paramount theatre and restaurants in 1 stop (3 mins)
- Be in Downtown Berkeley and UC Berkeley in 4 stops (10 - 15 mins)
- Be in SF's Mission District in 5 stops (15 mins)
Driving:
- Easy access to freeways 80, 580 and 880
- All three major cities (San Francisco, Oakland and Berkeley) are all within 10 mins drive
Alternative Transport:
- Ford Bikes rent as you go public bicycles https://member.fordgobike.com/map/
- Lime Scooter pay as you go public motor scooters https://www.li.me/about-us
- Bird Scooter pay as you go public motor scooter https://www.bird.co/
- GigCar pay as you go car https://gigcarshare.com/the-cars/

title: $4500 / 3br - 1832ft2 - Furnished modern 3 bedroom home with views (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Furnished, modern and spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom on over Ã¢ÂÂ acre in the Oakland hills. At over 1800 sq. ft. this is perfect for a professional couple or family. Walk into open floor plan living on the main level with cathedral ceilings. Relax on the deck, or enjoy the views of greenery outside from the 3 sliding doors in this main space. Downstairs you'll find 3 bedrooms (3rd currently furnished as an office), a laundry room, and the two main bathrooms. Master bedroom with built-in bookcases is spacious enough for a sitting area and plenty of closet space: a walk-in closet within the en-suite bathroom, and 2 other closets in the main area. Each room downstairs also has a sliding door to lower deck, and a spiral staircase will take you out to the backyard. 
The yard has a newer 1,000 sq. ft. tile patio with built in firepit, umbrella, and patio furniture for you to admire the gorgeous views. There is a small fenced yard area, 3 tiers of grassy areas, and two large planter boxes for you to grow your own produce. Includes monthly yard maintenance.
Come and find your home away from home and enjoy everything Oakland has to offer. 20 minutes to UC Berkeley, 10 minutes to both Rockridge and Fruitvale BART stations, or take an express bus or the ferry into San Francisco for work. 
Deposit: $6000
Tenant pays all utilities
No smoking or vaping
1 year lease preferred, 6 months considered

title: $2200 / 2br - Gated 2br/1ba in Oakland's Premier Art District, Jingletown! (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Your future, newly remodeled (2018) home is 2 blocks and a 5 minute walk to Fruitvale's BART station! 
Located in Oakland's Premier Art District, Jingletown, this house is seconds away from Alameda, Oakland's International Shopping District, various shopping centers and the I-880. 
This location is ideal if you are a working professional in San Francisco or a UC Berkeley college student. From the Fruitvale BART Station, take a quick 16 minute ride into Downtown San Francisco or 20 minutes into Downtown Berkeley. 
Multiple shopping centers and grocery stores are within walking distance. Alameda's Bridgeside Shopping Center is 0.5mi a way and Fruitvale's Shopping Station is right across the street. Fruitvale's International Shopping District aka. home of Oakland's best Mexican food is also steps away. 
Jingletown's Shoreline Park offers a community-friendly, relaxing escape complete with giant art displays, grassy knolls, and park benches to watch the sailboats and UC Berkeley's Crew team sail by. 
Enjoy working out and staying fit? Oakland's 24 Hour Fitness is right behind you. Got the midnight munchies? McDonald's is in the same adjacent complex. 
2 Bedrooms + 1 Bathrooms
Dining/living room + kitchen.  
$2,200/month

- $2,200/month rent.
- Utilities: water, garbage, and gas utilities included. Electricity responsibility of tenant. 
- Coin-operated laundry on-site.
- Sorry, no pets!

- 1 year lease minimum. 
Thanks for looking, please contact us if interested!

body:

Welcome to your new home in Oakland's wonderful Grand Lake neighborhood! Steps away from some of Oakland's finest restaurants (such as Penrose and Boot & Shoe Service), happening bars (such as The Ordinaire), the Grand Lake farmer's market, the historic Grand Lake Theater, and of course beautiful Lake Merritt. All of the fun and convenience of city living without the noise or crowds, and a relaxed, low-ÃÂ­key neighborhood vibe. Easy access to public transportation.
This 2 bed, 2 full bath condo is in a friendly 4 unit building (owner lives in adjacent upstairs unit). Renovated in 2015, it has all new construction and modern finishings. The chef's kitchen (gas range and hood) with cathedral ceilings and skylights, ample granite counter tops and large kitchen island is sure to be the centerpiece of your new home ÃÂ­whether you're cooking, entertaining, or just having a quiet night in.
Lovely green PRIVATE yard with entrances through kitchen as well as a private gate. En suite master bath with glass tile shower. Private inÃÂ­-unit washer/dryer.
Did we mention a fully enclosed PRIVATE GARAGE? Great for avoiding the hassle of street parking, or for extra storage space.
Condo is a short walk to multiple bus lines (including transÃÂ­bay bus) and casual carpool. Easy bike or scooter ride to BART (19th and Broadway). Easy highway access.
WellÃÂ­-behaved pets welcome, pending interview by owner and deposit.

title: $3800 / 2br - 1200ft2 - Gorgeous furnished Craftsman near Temescal, long-term lease (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
AVAILABLE: March 1st.
SHOWINGS: Sunday Feb 17th, 10am - 3pm & Sunday Feb 24th 10am - 3pm. Email us in case you cannot make it to the above showings and we can set up a separate showing.
THE LOCATION:
Great location: Short commute to San Francisco (transbay F bus stop, 1min walk/ C bus stop, 5min walk or MacArthur Bart Station, 12min walk) and easy trip to downtown Oakland (88 bus stop, 1min walk). Super easy to get to UC Berkeley/ downtown Berkeley (10min car ride, 15min bike ride, or take the F/88 bus).
Short walk from all the shops and restaurants in Temescal (3 blocks away!), Safeway, Arizmendi Bakery, and Arthur Mac Beer Garden. 
Short bike ride to both Berkeley Bowls (best grocery store in the Bay Area!) and UCSF Children Hospital. 
Short 5-min drive to AMC Theatre, IKEA, Target, and Home Depot in Emeryville. 
THE HOUSE: 
This is a beautiful, spacious, charming and light-filled cottage house in Oakland with 2BR, 1BA - elegantly furnished for long-term lease. Perfect for young couple or young family! You will love the house! 
Tons of natural light in all rooms. Original hardwood floors throughout. The place comes furnished with modern, comfy, and design furnitures. Nest Thermostat.
Large dining room features coffered ceiling, built-in cabinet - great for entertaining friends. Newly renovated kitchen with new cabinets, quartz countertop, stainless steel appliances. Cozy laundry room with washer/dryer. Living room comes with large TV and quality speakers. 2 sizable bedrooms with plenty of closet spaces and view out to the garden.
Sunny landscaped backyard with wood deck, fire pit, and gas grill - great for hosting BBQ party. There is garden space for you to grow your own edible plants with automated drip irrigation system - in the past, we have succesfully grown tomatoes, radish, beets, etc. The existing garden includes fruit trees such as figs and plums. 
Additional storage space in the basement. Driveway can fit 3 cars. 
The foundation is bolted and sheerwalled-very earthquake safe.
TERMS: Rent is $3800 monthly, deposit is $7,000. One year lease or longer.

title: $2500 / 1br - 1100ft2 - Gorgeous Furnished Double Room with En-suite, Walk-in Closet and Gym (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Furnished private room for let in shared 2-bed apartment, 04/07/2019 - 08/21/2019.
My husband and I have lived here for almost 2 years but are moving overseas. We love this building and we love our roommate Darren and are super sad to have to leave. The size, light and location of this place are ideal with numerous bars, cafes and grocery stores within a few minutes' walk. 
Double room with King-size bed, large double-drawer unit, bedside tables, walk-in closet and huge, private his-and-hers en-suite bathroom. Full-length windows provide amazing light and views of the bay and the city - even the Golden Gate bridge!
Minutes from Lake Merritt and Oakland 19th St station.
Building has a gym, 2 roof-top gardens with hot-tub, entertaining space and BBQs. Concierge in reception provides various services such as taking deliveries, organizing dry-cleaning, welcoming guests and providing 24h security. 
14th Floor "Tokyo" is 1100 sq ft 2-bedroom 2-bathroom apartment. 3D tour here: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=U47eyxSqHTy 
Sharing with one other roommate Darren - friendly, considerate, full-time professional in his 30s. We're looking for someone employed, similarly tidy and reliable to take our room for 5 months. Ideal for someone new to the area.

title: $3300 / 2br - 1200ft2 - Gorgeous View - Lake Merritt, 2 BR (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Gorgeous 2BR apartment in one of Oakland's most sought after Lake Merritt locations. Savor the incredible views from the giant bay window in the living room and watch the ever-changing panorama of light and activity on the lake.  Penthouse floor of a beautiful Art Deco building with tons of charm but only 8 units primarily occupied by owners, so it's quiet and need a temporary tenant that prefers that type of dwelling.  (Access to the back bedroom requires passing through the other; so it's sort of a 1.75 BR or just a "Large 1BR with a great office space, etc.")
Close to BART (short walk), restaurants, cafe's and the farmer's market.  Enjoy everything that lakeside living has to offer!  You're not close to the lake, you're on the lakefront on a cul-de-sac.  Unit has reserved parking spot,  laundry, BBQ patio, etc.  The flat is the top left window in the pic of the building.
Fully furnished as in pictures or can be made unfurnished.  All utilities (including water, heat and wi-fi) included; no extra costs.

title: $3395 / 1br - Historic Cigar Warehouse transformed into Modern Lofts (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Be the first to live in our West Oakland 1940s Cigar Factory restored by an award winning architect. High ceilings, original timber, factory windows, and natural lighting throughout.
Lovingly made 1 & 2 bedroom apartments that preserve the building's historic character while providing modern living environments.
Enjoy panoramic Bay views of San Francisco, downtown Oakland, Mt. Tam, and the Oakland Hills from our rooftop community space.
West Oakland BART just 6 blocks away via Mandela Parkway greenway bike path.

title: $2699 / 1br - 800ft2 - Incredible Views/High Ceilings ***1 MONTH FREE...APPLY TODAY!!!!*** (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Unit Features:
- 1b/1b + den
-15 ft ceilings + industrial-sized windows with a ton of natural light 
-exposed brick + oak/steel beams
-large bathroom with shower + tub
-stainless steel appliances + gas stove + granite countertops
-free wi-fi Internet included
Building Amenities:
-laundry room on every floor + Laundry Locker dry cleaning service onsite 
-lounge area
-assigned bike room
-mail room + Luxor One Lockers
-overnight guard on duty 9pm-5am
-gated parking spaces available $100/month
-storage units available
-community garden
Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 apartments for rent that will inspire you with open spaces soaring 14 to 25' high, original oak beam ceilings and exposed brick walls, and gorgeous windows with views of San Francisco and downtown Oakland. We hope to make Lampwork Lofts your new home.
For more information visit our website:

This modern, upscale 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom, 1,211 sq ft condo comes with a 2-car assigned parking in a secure underground garage at 288 3rd St in Oakland. Its open floor plan and high vaulted ceilings lets in plenty of natural light and with the open space upwards, the layout really makes for a larger feel. The condo comes with a private balcony and an up-to-date kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, a great deal of kitchen cabinet space, and a large walk-in pantry. Also fitted with hardwood and carpet flooring, and an in-unit washer and dryer with an adjacent linen closet.
The serene and inviting master bedroom has a very large walk-in closet with built-in drawers, shelves and rods, and a convenient en-suite bathroom. The second bedroom has a similar sizable walk-in closet with no lack of storage space, and an adjacent bathroom with a towel closet.
About the Neighborhood:
Walking distance to Jack London Square, Lake Merritt, Sunday farmers market, Swan's Market, and restaurants, coffee shops such as Blue Bottle Coffee, Chop Bar, Beer Revolution, Forge, Plank, to name a few. Close proximity to the Oakland Museum of California, Chinatown and downtown Oakland. Within 3-9 minutes drive to several parks such as the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail, Lakeside Park Garden Center, and Rotary Nature Center. Also a few blocks drive to the 880 freeway on-ramp, 580 and 980 freeways, or a short walk to Lake Merritt BART Station, Amtrak station, and San Francisco/Alameda Ferry. The location has a Walk Score of 95.
