title: $4850 / 3br - 1400ft2 - Large, Modern Condo in Jack London (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Spacious, Modern 3-Bedroom/2-Bathroom Condo in the Heart of Jack London!
This spacious home provides luxury finishes, to be expected of Jack London, as well as design additions that make this a unique one-of-a-kind home. The home is located at the corner of 3rd and Harrison, which allows access to soft morning light, and stunning afternoon illumination. Jack London provides a unique Oakland opportunity to live within a vibrant urban lifestyle while enjoying the amenities and finishes of a luxury condo. The neighborhood puts you close to many living conveniences, fine dining options, great nightlife, the marina/waterfront, and multiple public transportation options.
There are only a handful of condos in the Jack London area with 3-bedrooms and even fewer with 1,400 square feet of living space as this one has. The home makes efficient use of the spacious interior with a large living room and open floor plan. The home has oversized windows to take full advantage of the corner location, and vaulted ceilings with sleek, loft-style exposed concrete beams and ceilings that make the most of the natural illumination provided.
Home has high-end wood laminate flooring in the common spaces and new, plush modern carpet in the bedrooms to provide additional warmth and comfort when you retreat to any of the bedrooms. The contemporary kitchen provides ample cabinet and counter space, granite countertops, recessed lighting, and stainless steel appliances (range/oven, microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher), and countertop seating. There is a separate laundry room in the home with washer/dryer plus a large storage cabinet with granite countertop. The master suite has a stunning accent wall and large bathroom, making the master its own oasis within the home. Each bedroom has a large closet, and provides for plenty of space for clothing, accessories, and storage. The master bedroom closet has built-in sliding shoe-racks and drawers for maximal space and efficiency.
The lobby is sleek and sophisticated, and the building boasts Jack London Square's best rooftop deck with built-in BBQ, kitchen, dining, and lounging areas. The home is wired for internet access at 100 Mbps and is serviced by Webpass. Lease includes 2 tandem parking spaces located within the secured garage.
The home is located half a mile from two BART stations and the ferry terminal, which provide options for quick access into the surrounding areas and to San Francisco. Yes, there's more! There is a free bus one block away that runs from Jack London up through Oakland downtown/Uptown and provides easy access to those areas without driving or walking. In addition, Amtrak provides easy access to the East and South Bay, and is a great way for out of town visitors to comfortably arrive within a block of your home. Lastly, the home is within 30 minutes of San Francisco International Airport and just a short 10 minute drive to the Oakland International Airport.
Jack London provides proximity to thriving businesses and entertainment districts. Oakland's First Fridays, Yoshi's, the nightlife of Uptown, Chinatown, and the historic Old Oakland district are all easily within reach. Within Jack London itself, fine dining options exist, (Lungomare, Scotts), numerous casual dining options (Chophouse, Nido, Oakland Grill, and Forge Pizza to name our favorites), wineries (10 individual wineries on the Urban Wine Trail), beer gardens and breweries (Federation Brewing, Independent Brewing). Jack London provides easy access to the Oakland Estuary Boardwalk, and the waterfront provides multiple festivals and events throughout the year (weekly, year-round farmer's market, Eat Real Fest, Jack of All Trades, Oakland Bacon and Beer Fest, Pedalfest).
You will not want to miss out on this opportunity to call this your home!
Minimum credit score of 700 required.
Lease includes water, gas, trash, and recycling service. Lessee is responsible for PG&E (electricity), cable, and internet services. Resident must confirm receiving CCRs and abide by HOA CCRs or risk fines and/or eviction. This is zoned as a Live-Work unit. 
Pets are considered with an additional monthly fee and security deposit.
Section 8 is not considered for this property.
This is a no smoking/no marijuana residence.

body:

Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 apartments for rent that will inspire you with open spaces soaring 14 to 25' high, original oak beam ceilings and exposed brick walls, and gorgeous windows with views of San Francisco and downtown Oakland. We hope to make Lampwork Lofts your new home.
For more information visit our website:
http://www.lampworkloftsoakland.com/

This home has 3-4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living room, family room, kitchen, rumpus room, backyard, attached garage, driveway parking and street parking.  Lots of light. body:

Come live in a cute cottage in my backyard! You'll have your own gated entrance to the place. The space offers privacy with access to the backyard and garden. I am looking to create a community and am seeking folks who are interested in engaging and fostering relationships in this living arrangement.
The neighborhood is great. It's a short walk to the MacArthur BART. There is a Ford bike station one block away, and the F bus one block away as well, which takes you directly to San Francisco. The neighborhood offers restaurants nearby and is very close to the shopping in Emeryville. 
The rent is $2100 per month, plus utilities. The security deposit is 1.5x rent. Move-in date is flexible (as soon as you want). Plenty of street parking. Couples and dogs are welcome.

If interested, please email to schedule a viewing over the weekend.

title: $4495 / 4br - 2269ft2 - Lovely Townhouse (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This  Townhouse High up in the Oakland Hills has some additional upgrades which have created a very nice environment for you to live in. It is 4bd/3ba with Three Levels.  It also has an awesome View of the Bay. It  has a nice back yard where you can spend some great time with your kids or  pets.  The daily commute to SF is nice because a special A/C transit bus goes there every Morning (M-F) Non-Stop; also, from this Townhouse you can get to the freeways of  #580 and #13 in about 30 SECONDS. The HOA has a recreational room whereby you can do regular exercises along with playgrounds and many streets just to walk on that you may like to do.  
This is a wonderful part of the City of Oakland which is the hometown of the current World-Champion Oakland Warriors who are now looking forward to a Three-Peat this year; and it is also the hometown of the Oakland Raiders who will leave soon.   Our phenomenal  Oakland Zoo is only a hop, skip and a couple of jumps away.  This would be a nice place to come home to after work.

title: $3695 / 3br - Marvelous 3 Bedroom Townhouse in Caballo Hills w/ Amazing Views! (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 2/10 11:30AM-12PM
6415 Blue Rock Ct. 
Oakland, Ca 94605
This spacious 3bd/2.5ba townhouse is settled in the Caballo Hills neighborhood of Oakland. Built in 2007, it is located in the friendly Monte Vista Villas community. The property has great views throughout the home, and is outfitted with two balconies. The comfortable and vast living room is the perfect place to sit back and relax after a long day. The wide window gives a panoramic view allowing a lot of natural lighting to set in.
Carpet throughout the home. The master bathroom has a separate shower and bath tub. Great closet space in all the bedrooms, enough to store plenty of items. The kitchen has the full set up, refrigerator, oven, stove, microwave, dishwasher, etc. All adjacent to the laundry room, which includes a full size washer/dryer. 
The attached garage can easily park two vehicles, or can be converted into a personal gym or workspace. 
Immediate access to I-580 freeway is around the corner and is a direct route to Downtown Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville, San Francisco. Nearby parks include Concordia Park, Frick Neighborhood and Leona Heights Park.

title: $3000 / 3br - 1248ft2 - Maxwell Park Home near Mills College (oakland hills / mills)
body:

Not accepting Section 8/voucher, pets for this rental.
Built in 1921, this traditional Craftsman style home is located in the trendy Maxwell Park District of Oakland and is situated on the top of a very desirable street.  This home has been lovingly cared for by long time owners, offers original charm, yet has been tastefully updated, is spacious, and has sunny and cheerful rooms!  There is also a very usable large rear yard.
This home is less than a half-mile from Mills College with excellent nearby shopping in the Laurel District offers wonderful selection of restaurants, grocery stores and transit availability to BART, downtown Oakland and San Francisco from High Street and MacArthur Blvd.
Highlights:
* Available for immediate occupancy
* 3 bedrooms and 1 full bath (large walk-in shower only, no tub)
* Lots of sun light as the rooms have large windows
* Approximately 1248 interior sqft
* Built in 1921
* Multiple vehicle parking in driveway, new fence, no garage, but large rear yard, no basement
* Lots of interior cabinet space in the kitchen too
* Kitchen appliances included (gas range/oven, disposal, new dishwasher, washer and dryer)granite 
   counter tops
* Large formal dining room, larger living room with fireplace
* Hardwood, tile and carpeted floors
* New window coverings, updated force-air gas furnace, updated water heater, fresh interior

* Tenants pay all utilities including garbage, owner will pay gardening services

Section 8/voucher not being accepted for this rental.

title: $2475 / 1br - 500ft2 - Meticulously remodeled one-bedroom apartment (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Meticulously remodeled light-filled, one-bedroom apartment in the heart of Oakland's vibrant Uptown Arts District.
The apartment features a completely new kitchen with stainless steel appliances, new tiled bathroom, a spacious living/dining area with wood wainscoting and hardwood floors throughout as well as new insulated windows and updated plumbing and electrical systems. It is located on the second floor of a charming, turn-of-the-century building with ground floor retail and artist's studios downstairs. There's a coin operated laundry and convenient, secure off-street parking on site. In addition, there's easy access to BART and several bus lines. Even Lake Merritt is just 1/2 mile and a five-minute bike ride away.
The rent includes water and trash. Gas and electric are not included. Parking is an additional $118.50/car per month. We will require a $3600 security deposit and ask that you supply a credit report with your application. We will consider a well-behaved small to medium-sized pet with an additional deposit.

title: $2950 / 2br - 800ft2 - Modern Build, Loft-Like Home in Upper Maxwell Park (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This beautiful new(er) construction home is situated in Upper Maxwell Park on a very neighborly street. The home was built in 2008, and features modern design with efficient living. A "loft like vibe" lends itself to a flexible work-from-home environment, creative space for artists, craft room or bonus guest room.
Features of this home include:
*Open living space on main level with half bath, small room (for office, craft, or could be a second bedroom), laundry room with storage and open kitchen
*Kitchen features updated stainless steel appliances, gas range, and a surprising amount of storage!
*Concrete flooring for that industrial feel with radiant heat supplied by on demand water!
*Master bedroom upstairs has beautiful french doors that open up with a wonderful view of the Oakland hills, "tree house" feel for a relaxing home environment
*Master also features his/her closet space with wonderful organizer system
*Home was built with a modern user in mind - lots of outlets/plugs/lights for the technology-minded tenant!
*Back yard space with patio, cover, and small garden available exclusively for tenant use
Other terms to know!
*This home sits on a lot with two houses. The owners live on-site. They are fairly hands off; and want tenants to feel at home! There is an organized map of tenant area for yard use; for tenant to use how they would like.
*The second "bedroom" would be most comfortable used as a home office or work space, and does not have a closet.
*Street parking only; but there is plenty of it!
*Small pets OK w/ landlord approval and non-refundable pet deposit
*Credit score of 700, conditional approval for a score of 600-700 ($500 additional deposit), *Debt-to-income ratio 1 to 3
*Deposit is $3000, refundable, due upon lease signing
*Non smoker
*Square footage is approximate
*Week days quiet hours 10pm and beyond, weekends ok.
*One year lease required
*Owner pays garbage, Tenant pays PGE, splits water with Owner

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Renting our beloved urban modern home in Temescal/lower Rockridge. 
Fully renovated historical property in the heart of vibrant Temescal/lower Rockridge. Equal walking distance (.5 mile) to both Rockridge and MacAurthur BART stations. Close to Trader Joes, Market Hall, Safeway, Piedmont Ave, Telegraph Ave, Hwy 24/580/80, casual carpool or AC Transit to SF

Open concept living room, dining area, and kitchen with custom concrete contertops, Heath tile, stainless appliances. Dining area french doors open fully to cozy, private fully fenced back yard. There's room to entertain, bbq, urban garden, as well as secure storage area for bikes, etc. This level also has full bath and good sized private office/playroom. 
Concrete floors with efficient radiant heat system.

3 bedrooms
Large master bedroom with attached bath, sliding glass doors to small private deck with Oakland view. Second large bedroom with sliding glass doors to private deck. Third, smaller bedroom facing out to floral backyard. The two bedrooms share a full bath in hallway. 
Newer stacked washer/dryer sits conveniently tucked away. 
Hardwood floors with radiant heating.
We love this home and hope to find tenants who enjoy and care for it as well. In the past we've rented long term to a family, but open to variety of scenarios and rental period.

Pets welcome with homeowner approval and pet deposit.

Tri level house nestled in the Montclair hills featuring four bedrooms 3 baths; bright and airy with skylights and mixed modern with cozy cabin feel.

title: $3800 / 2br - Must See!! Amazang Townhouse Beauty with views (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Amazing! Beautiful setting in top location of Oakland.    This incredible town house is located on the 5th floor.  As you enter the unit you will see very green views from all the windows.  Unit is located on the fifth floor.  On the fifth floor you will see a spacious dining room, the kitchen and a deck off of the living room.  On the sixth floor, i.e. upstairs,  you will find a laundry room and two bedrooms and two bathrooms.  The light makes the unit cheerful and bright.  The location is between Grand Ave Area and Piedmont Ave Area.  The place has incredibly soft carpets.  In addition there is a 1/2 bath on the main level.  
If you are interested in a unique place to call home. Please no pets and no smoking of anything.  If this sounds like home, please call for an appointment.  This is a perfect place to relax from the day.
Others available around Lake Merritt, Grand Lake and Lakeshore area.   show contact info

title: $3600 / 3br - 1500ft2 - New Live/Work Units - Across from Starline Social Club (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Here is a quick breakdown,
If you want to come to visit, follow this link to book a tour or schedule a call:
https://owow.com/apa/23rd
Pros:
Ã¢ÂÂ It is a new building, so we have a few different units available for you to choose from.
Ã¢ÂÂ 12-minute walk to 19th Street BART Station.
Ã¢ÂÂ Pet-friendly, if sign-up now there is no pet deposit. 
Ã¢ÂÂ 3 flex space rooms. (bedroom, or office).
Ã¢ÂÂ 2 full bathroom.
Ã¢ÂÂ Brand new appliances: refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, stove, and oven. 
Ã¢ÂÂ Heating and AC
Ã¢ÂÂ Rooftop with movie theatre (Wait, what?!)
Ã¢ÂÂ 10-15 minutes to anywhere in downtown Oakland, Walk Score: 92, Bike Score: 97.
Ã¢ÂÂ Zoned as Live/Work Unit - it means you can run a business from the unit and enjoy large tax befits.
Cons:
Ã¢ÂÂ No master bedroom, rooms are not huge, they are about 110 sqft or less and can fit a bed, a closet, and a dresser, maybe a desk but that's about it. 
Ã¢ÂÂ Utilities not included, estimated around $50-150 per unit.
Ã¢ÂÂ Not washer/dryer in unit, but there is a laundry room on the ground floor, with multiple machines. 
Ã¢ÂÂ No dedicated parking spots, but there is free street parking.

 KEY FEATURES Year Built:  1928Sq Footage:  1283 sqft.Bedrooms:  2 BedsBathrooms:  2 BathsLease Duration:  6 Months+Pets Policy:  No Pets AllowedProperty Type:  CondoDESCRIPTION
 NEW MARKET LOFTS: 201 4th Street, Oakland - Originally built in 1928 as the Safeway Corporate Headquarters and its warehouse space, New Market Lofts was renovated and developed into 53 mixed use spaces in 2001. Live in this amazing LIVE/WORK corner unit with concrete floors, slab granite & stainless steel appliances in kitchen, & vaulted ceilings. Also included are: maple cabinetry, in-unit laundry, 1 secure parking space, & gym. Excellent location in the thriving and heart of Jack London Square, minutes from San Francisco by BART, with the Lake Merritt station just a few blocks away. The New Market Lofts is also convenient to the 880 Freeways, The Alameda/Oakland Ferry and AMTRAK. Oakland International Airport is just a quick drive south. And, of course right down the street is the dining, shopping and entertainment in scenic and historic Jack London Square. * Short term and long lease are available. Ask for details. title: $2600 / 1br - 900ft2 - Newly Remodeled 1Bathroom Fontainebleau Apartments (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please contact Chandra for a viewing appointment  show contact info

-1Bedroom 1Bathroom Apartment 900 sqft.
-One-of-a-kind rehabbed apartment in the Heart of Oakland's Adam point district.
-Fully Updated Kitchen with white Granite, New Oak Cabinetry, All Stainless Kitchen with new appliances including a dishwasher.
-NO Pets Allowed
-Lots of natural light
-Sold Oak floors, Gorgeous Tiled Kitchen and Bath
-New double-paned windows and insulated walls, new heater, new electrical
-New recessed lighting throughout on dimmer
-Fresh paint throughout
-Serene and quiet neighborhood
-Walk to the Lake Merritt, BART, Bus Line
-30 minute Commute to Downtown SF
-Conveniently located by all major freeways
-Water, Garbage and Parking Included
-$2900.00 Deposit
-$2900.00 Month Rent 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
=========================================================
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. Goldstone Management won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure all lease term of 12 months. A 6 month lease may be available on higher monthly rent payments.
9) We require the residents to provide a copy of renter's insurance. Goldstone Management must be listed as "Additional Insured" and general liability should be $100,000 with a maximum deductible of $1,000. If you do not have renter's insurance we can provide you with a link to a company many of our residents use for low cost insurance.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.

title: $1990 / 1br - 1300ft2 - Newly Remodeled Unit - and more! (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        


47th Avenue aka The Boise -  Lofts Apartments Available


We have a new, unique loft available and three larger loft spaces currently available at 47th Avenue Studios, aka The Boise! on 47th Avenue in Oakland. All spaces include access to secure off-street parking, laundry room with coin-operated washers & dryers, an outdoor bbq area and a large, shared garden.  Our building is located about 1/2 mile from the Fruitvale Bart Station with easy access to Hwy 880 and just a few minutes by bike or car from Alameda. 

1066 #15 - This is our most recently remodeled unit, just on the market now.  It is approx 1300 square feet for $1,990, located up a private staircase in the 1066 building.  Fully remodeled, with luxury vinyl flooring, carpeting, and kitchen cabinets.  Kitchen, bathroom, and living areas are all upstairs.  Windows and skylights provide plenty of natural light.  Ideally suited for a single person, however there's plenty of room for two.  Laundry is conveniently located right outside the front door across the hall.  
1050 #11 - approx 1600 square feet for $2,560, along the breezeway of 1050.  Completely remodeled, with luxury vinyl flooring, carpeting, and kitchen cabinets.  Large living or work space downstairs.  Kitchen, bathroom, and living area upstairs with an additional small raised loft.  Windows on the end and skylights overhead provide ample natural light, and a light well allows additional natural light to reach the lower level.  
1050 #12 - approx 1500 square feet for $2,400, along the breezeway of 1050.  Also just remodeled, with luxury vinyl flooring, carpeting, and kitchen cabinets.  Large living or work space downstairs.  Kitchen, bathroom, and living area upstairs.  Windows on the end and skylights overhead provide ample natural light, and a light well allows additional natural light to reach the lower level.  
1066 #4 - approx 1900 square feet for $2,850, in the main hallway of 1066.  Extra large living space downstairs, with a newly carpeted bedroom.  Kitchen and bathroom upstairs in a loft that overlooks the ground floor level.  Windows on the end and skylights overhead provide ample natural light.  

The first 3 pictures are of 1066 #15.  The next 6 pictures above are of 1050 #11, the next 6 pictures are of 1050 #12, and the last 6 pictures are of 1066 #4 and the common area gardens.

All units' common area fee is $108 per month.

***

Please note that the spaces at 47th Avenue Studios are not suitable for band rehearsal or other sound-intensive use, and cannabis growers/businesses are prohibited.

These beautiful artist live/work studios, located at 1050-1066 47th Avenue in Oakland, will be shown on Saturday at 11am and Wednesday at 6:30pm. If you are interested in more information or would like to arrange an alternative time to see the space, please reply via email, or call Tracy at  show contact info
.

title: $3700 / 3br - 966ft2 - Now $1,233 per bedroom in 3 Bdrm Townhomes in Trendy Temescal (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Believe it! These townhomes were carefully designed to make shared living a joy.  You can get your own bedroom in a brand new 3 bdrm townhome with a real kitchen and great room for less half the price of a one bedroom microunit.  Each bedroom is private with it's own closet, storage, HVAC and internet.   Share with friends and save a bundle. More space.  More options. And definitely a lot cooler.
The Temescal Muse offers a different approach to apartment living.  It's's not a building.  It's a neighborhood of discrete town homes wrapped around an Italian street scene.  There are no corridors, only gathering places: courtyards, terraces, and private rooftop patios. Discover the efficiency of french balconies, even if you're not French.  These are town homes with a personality...yours.  We created a place, not a room number.  It feels like a home because it is.
Small and friendly is the answer to big and institutional.
Each home has it's own identity, designed with flexibility built in. Sliding walls turn a dining area into a media room, private office, guest bedroom, or nursery.  Our 2 and 3 bedroom 2 story townhouses have lofty 10'-6" ceilings in the great room, with modern chef's kitchens featuring stainless steel appliances, plenty of storage space, pantries, and even guest powder rooms and baths.  Upstairs are 2 or more bedrooms, with 1 or more full baths, generous walk in closets, and a front loading laundry center in each unit sized for families.
Convenient, covered, secure parking is available for cars and bikes in the garage.
The Temescal Muse is connected to everything, even other people.  It's a sun baked Mediterranean Village within walking distance of the rest of the world. Three blocks to the dozens of restaurants and shops on Piedmont Avenue.  Not to mention the Piedmont theater.  Two blocks to the Kaiser Center. Four blocks to Bart and you are linked to the whole Bay Area.  It's closer to downtown San Francisco than most of San Francisco.
Downstairs is "Bierhaus", a Mountain View favorite watering hole now coming to The Temescal. It's Oakland's word for friendly and everyone's "third space" for dining (with or without) dogs around beerhall tables featuring great comfort food, pizza, brat, and brew.  Honest food for honest friends.  Honestly.  In fact it's a place so good you can take it with you.  Drop in on the way home to "Take out dinner" after a hard day work.  It's like having your own chef and they clean up.
Why settle for ordinary?  Call call  show contact info
 to arrange an appointment.
Perfect location spans the Piedmont Avenue and Temescal neighborhoods
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
Located on 40th Street and Manila.
2 Blocks to Kaiser Center serviced by Kaiser shuttle
3 blocks to Piedmont Ave. featuring groceries, shopping, restaurants, bars, theater, and coffee houses
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
6 minutes walk to Macarthur BART
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13

title: $6800 / 4br - 4060ft2 - Oakland Hills Home With Panoramic Views (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Escape to the Oakland Hills! We are honored to present a modern four bedroom, four and a half bath home built in 2017. At 4,060 square feet, this spacious and well-lit abode features a grand chef's kitchen and open concept living space for entertaining.
Nestled in Oakland's Caballo Hills, this luxury home features engineered hardwood flooring throughout the living area with carpeted en-suite bedrooms. A spacious and inviting great room welcomes you into the main level. A contemporary chef's kitchen features a large island, shaker style cabinets, under cabinet lighting and Thermador appliances including; convection oven, dishwasher, 32'' refrigerator, 6-burner gas stove, and microwave. The custom butler's pantry between the kitchen and formal dining room offers a beverage refrigerator and serving buffet. A casual breakfast nook and living room effortlessly tie together the living space. Off the living room is a large patio, backyard access and private entrance to the au pair unit, which features: built-in cabinetry, a wet bar, living and sleeping space, and a bathroom with shower stall. Also located on the main level is a half bath and storage closet.
Upstairs sitting area leads to the master suite with walk-in custom closets and a private deck which overlooks the Bay Bridge, Golden Gate and San Mateo bridges. A spa-like master bath includes a soaking tub, walk-in showers, and double sinks. A family area features built in cabinetry and the remaining two bedrooms are both located upstairs.
Additional features include:
Dual Heating Systems and A/C
Control4 Automation System
Remote Controlled Gated Entry

title: $2850 / 1br - 1000ft2 - One Bedroom Luxury Apartment/Condo, Utilities Included, 1010 sqft (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are renting a beautiful one-bedroom luxury apartment starting May 15, 2019. 
The Apartment
It is very spacious, about 1,010 sq ft, and absorbs beautiful natural light throughout the day. The apartment does not face the street and offers absolute privacy 24/7. We will be renting the place semi-furnished, with mid-century modern furniture that matches the style of the apartment.
The Building and Location
The building is situated on the top of Adams Point, and has a view of the North Bay, including Mount Tam. It is located 15 minutes walking to downtown Oakland and 19th St. BART station. On average it takes about 30 minutes to commute to downtown SF or Berkeley. The neighborhood is very quiet and safe, so that you can enjoy the city life and quickly escape back to a cozy, quite home. 
Additional Features:
- Gas, Water, Electricity, HOA, and Garbage are all included in the rent
- Walk-in closet
- Gas Fireplace
- Balcony with a view of sunsets and the golden-gate

- 15 minute walk to BART and downtown
- 30 minute commute to downtown SF

- Coin-operated laundry in the building (4 sets of washer/dryer)
- Well maintained and clean lobby in the building
The lease will be for 12 months, starting May 15, 2019, with the security deposit and last month's rent due by May 5, 2019. Security deposit is $2,500.00.

title: $2850 / 2br - OPEN 1:00 pm Home above the Mills College area with large yard! (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Are you looking for a large garden?  If so this might be the perfect place for you.
If you would like to plant some food, there is ample space. This home has two bedrooms, a small study, living room, formal dining room, and kitchen with a breakfast nook. Please note that the laundry machine will not be provided. 
 You do have space to put your own washer and dryer.  Please call for an appointment.  Absolutely no smoking of anything, no pets, deposits and references required for this one year lease.  Others available.    Call  show contact info

OPEN at 1:00 pm February 12, 2019.  Please call if you plan to come.  
Thank you.

title: $2595 / 2br - 962ft2 - ((Open Concept)) Two Bedroom Two Bath AVAILABLE 2/1 (emeryville)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
*************** Pictures may not be of the exact unit, but finishes are similar. ********************
*******************************UNIT AVALIABLE 2/1 *******************************
401 DERBY
Office Hours: Tuesday 8-5
Wednesday - Friday 9-5
63 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 401 Derby, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area. 
401 Derby offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. Many units have views of the water or private balconies. Jingletown is very walkable and bikeable. The Fruitvale BART station is less than a 10-minute walk so you can be in San Francisco in less than 30 minutes. 
Unit features:
LVT floors 
Large double pane windows
High-end contemporary finishes
Stainless steel appliance
Gas range stove
Stackable washer and dryer in each unit
Modern white-matte and dark brown-matte cabinetry with brushed metal hardware with soft-close hinges and hardware
Caesarstone counter-tops
Large bathroom vanities with spacious built-in drawers
A variety of units include large private patios/balconies and/or both with amazing views 
Central heating
Pet friendly
Two bedroom/One bath - approximately 962
Amenities: 
Bicycle storage
Community outdoor space
Courtyard
Secured parking garage
**Bay Street, Jack London Square, Old Oakland, Lake Merritt, Grand Lake Theater, AMC 16, Jack London Stadium 9, Brown Sugar Kitchen, Luka's Tap Room, Athletic Club Oakland, Home Room, Fentons Creamery, Zachary's Chicago Pizza, Pizza Amigos, Agave, Rob Ben's Restaurant and Lounge, Bakesale Betty, Mua, Yoshi's, Everett & Jones, Buttercup, Scott's Seafood, Nation's Giant Burger, Dragon Gate, Forge, Kincaid's, Lake Chalet, P.F. 63 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 401 Derby, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area. 
401 Derby offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. Many units have views of the water or private balconies. Jingletown is very walkable and bikeable. The Fruitvale BART station is less than a 10-minute walk so you can be in San Francisco in less than 30 minutes.

This gorgeous property is located in the most highly sought after neighborhoods in the 'Grand Lake' area; high up on Grand Ave and very close to the Piedmont border. The entire property has recently been remodeled and is nestled in a serene and quite neighborhood, with great tenants and wonderful neighbors; all of which makes for the perfect setting to call your next Home. The Landlord (yours truly) is also very nice!! :-)  
The unit for Rent is the Ground floor, sits beneath the super low key and quite Landlord's Unit. Property has it's own Laundry Facility serving all 4 Units' usage. Rent was just lowered from $2,450 to $2,250. Flexible on Lease Length. Rent includes a Dedicated Private Parking space. title: $2695 / 2br - 1050ft2 - Peaceful TOP FLOOR w/ Parking in Upper Grand! (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Large apartment just off historic Grand Avenue (three blocks North of Grand Lake Theater), one block from City of Piedmont, in the most desirable neighborhood in Oakland! This is the most central location for all that's happening in Oakland and in the East Bay. 10 minutes to the Bay Bridge. Public transportation nearby. Peaceful and quiet 2 bedroom apartment in a very well maintained, clean building. We take great pride in how our building is operated! This apartment is walking distance to several grocery stores, an array of great shopping and well reviewed restaurants (see below for some of the businesses that are walking distance from the building). Apartment #308 at 475 Weldon Avenue. Sorry, no pets. Available immediately.
-HUGE walk-in closet
-Modern aesthetics
-Hardwood flooring
-Quartz countertops
-Dishwasher/Garbage Disposal
-Nice sized bedrooms with lots of closet space
-Crown molding
-Peaceful balcony
-Parking spot available (gated and assigned, $50/month).
OPEN HOUSE TIMES:
Please call Brian at  show contact info
 to schedule 
475 Weldon Ave is a 45-unit three story apartment building just off Grand Ave two blocks from The Grand Lake Theater in the Grand Lake Neighborhood. This is a well-maintained, modern building. There is parking under the building in a gated area. Each floor has two washers and two dryers. 7 total of each in the building. There is an elevator. This building is set in a neighborhood full of very nice homes. There is a phone entry system.
We are steps from Grand Ave between Grand and Lakeshore. Very close to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION. 3 blocks from the award winning Grand Lake Farmer's Market! You can walk to Penrose, The Alley, Boot and Shoe Service, Bangkok Palace, Grand Oaks Restaurant, Modigliani Cafe, Coffee Mill, The Star, Safeway, Camino, Libertine Lounge, Mijori Sushi, Grand Lake Theater, Trader Joe's and Walgreens. Lake Shore Avenue is just a few blocks away with all of its shops and restaurants including Peet's, Shakewell, Prohibition Chicken, Starbucks, Arizmendi bakery, Top Dog, The Cat House, Buckingham Spirits, The Gap and many more local treats. The Rose Garden is just across the street and over one block. Many more parks in the neighborhood. Easy living with good tenants. Modern, convenient and accessible are common words used to describe our building from our tenants.
For commuters to the city you can take "Casual Carpool" (two blocks away) or the Transbay Bus at the theater, or take the 10 minute bus ride (right across the street!) to BART. The Lake is only a few blocks away!
Apartments at this building have garbage disposals, electric stoves and dishwashers. The owner pays for water, hot water and garbage. The heat is from electric heaters in each living room and bedroom. The lease is one year, which turns into a month-to-month lease thereafter. Parking is available for $50. Security deposit is flexible dependent upon credit report.
From the 580 freeway exit on Grand or Lakeshore exit. Travel east on Grand Avenue past the farmers market and past the Grand Lake theater. go about two or three blocks and turn right onto Weldon ( if you pass Safeway you went to far). 
Applications will be made available at the open house and credit check fees ($15 per adult applicant) will be accepted via personal check or money order. We require NEW credit checks for all applicants.

title: $1100 / 4br - Pick a time to tour! (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
If you want to live in a highly productive environment, you've come to the right place. 
We have a brand new building looking for our first round of tenants :) 
The unit is live work so you could set up a business out of this space and live here to save money!   The building is awesome and the living room has this HUGE skylight .  So much natural light and exposed reclaimed wood from the 30s.  The building has a Roof deck you gotta check out.
The location is in between West Oakland and Uptown Oakland.   Which is perfect for pricing and walkability.  The 19th Bart station is not even a 10 min walk away.   
We have parking options and bike storage in the building.  
 Have too much stuff? Don't worry, The building has an extra storage unit you can use for free.   
Sounds too good to be true?   Well out of the 24 units in the whole building we only have 2 left so this opportunity is almost off the market.  Schedule a tour through the link below to check it out before its gone :) 
https://owow.com/apa/23rd
Im really looking for fun people that will help us build our community to do fun events around town.

title: $2395 / 1br - 700ft2 - PRIME SPACIOUS SUNNY APT- NEAR PIEDMONT (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
PRIME SPACIOUS SUNNY APT- NEAR PIEDMONT
RENT: $2395
Recently remodeled one-bedroom apartment in charming 1947 fourplex in a great neighborhood. Built for comfortable living and entertaining, the apartment is large, bright and well appointed. There's no shortage of living space - there's a huge living room and a formal dining room with built-in cabinets. The large, modern kitchen is designed for people who like to cook and has a gas range, extensive granite counters and new cabinets. 
The apartment is available immediately with a security deposit of $2400 on a month to month lease.
This is a unique opportunity. This one-of-a-kind unit has only had two tenants in the past 15 years. We're looking for the right person who can appreciate the beauty and value of this apartment.
Location: Upper Grand Ave/Lakeshore, 1 block from Piedmont border.
Convenient to Rockridge and Piedmont Avenue. This is a quiet, safe neighborhood of large single-family homes and a few smallish, well-kept rental properties. Just a short walk to shopping and dining in the both the Grand Avenue and Lakeshore Avenue business districts and the historic Grand Lake Theater.
Details:
-	Hardwood floors throughout
-	Fireplace
-	Apartment is quiet and private, located on the top floor in the read of the building with a private entrance and individual address.
-	Nicely appointed bathroom with both shower and tub.
-	Tons of storage - two extra large closets, coat closet, linen closet, bathroom closet and individual storage space in basement.
-	Nice views of Grand Avenue
-	Rent also includes individual garage parking with a remote door opener.
-	Laundry in building
-	Convenient to public transportation. 5 minutes' walk to AC Transit; carpool to SF.
-	No pets please
Please contact us to set up an appointment to see the apartment.
Available: Now at 1035 Walker Av. Open house hours: 1 to 4 PM Sat and Sun
Raymond B. Auker
RB Auker Associates
Cell:  show contact info

It's NOT ok to contact this poster with service or other commercial interest

title: $3100 / 1br - 1700ft2 - Real Live/work with free parking (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Real live/work, designed for working artists and business.  This unit features great natural light from two huge banks of windows and a large skylight. Features views of the hills and downtown Oakland.  It has newly refinished hardwood floors (original 1928), 14-foot ceilings, and has convenient access for materials and products from nearby 3,000 lb. freight elevator.   A wide range of work activities can be performed in this space.   This unit features a mezzanine bedroom, walk in closet, a new kitchen with maple cabinets, granite counters and stainless appliances, and a bath with a claw-foot tub and a separate shower.
It has 100 amps power, and comes with washer and dryer.  This unit is also wired for cable.  This unit comes with one free parking spot in the gated parking area with remote control access.
Suite 335: 1,700 square feet  plus 120 sq. ft. mezzanine = $3,100 a month + CAM
Tenants pay all utilities.  One year lease.  The Common Area Maintenance (CAM) is 4 to 6 cents per square foot per month.  The heat is provided by quiet, efficient Hydronic heaters.
This located in a 100,000 s.f. 3 story building that has a roof deck garden/BBQ area, secure parking.
Sorry, No Dogs, band practice, or marijauna cultivation, and cats in moderation. Also, no build-out allowed
Will show by appointment. Available March 1, 2019

* NO PETS 
This 2 bedroom downstairs apartment has been renovated with new flooring, paint, fixtures, etc. The property features off-street parking behind a gate and has an on-site laundry area, for your convenience. The property is conveniently located 0.5 miles from Bishop O' Down and has immediate access to the 580 freeway and the 90/98 bus lines that lead directly to BART. Water and garbage is included in the rent. 
Open house Information dates and times: https://slpm.appfolio.com/listings/detail/9b281c09-68ff-4299-bba0-2052c332acab
For additional information, photos, online applications as well as information on our other available properties go to: https://slpm.com/browse-rentals
We ask that you drive by any property you may have an interest in to acquaint yourself with the neighborhood and exterior of the home.

title: $4320 / 3br - 2000ft2 - Remodeled & Furnished House w/ Amazing Yard in "Walkers Paradise" (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
An amazing opportunity to rent a large single-family home on a huge lot in one of the most central parts of Oakland. This fully furnished home is for rent from March 1 to March 27th. Please email us for details.
With a Walkscore of 90 ("walkers paradise"), we are less than two blocks from Lower Piedmont Avenue. We are easily walkable to Piedmont shops and restaurants such as Chow and Commis, as well as Uptown institutions such as Firebrand and Drake's. 19th Street BART is a 15-minute walk or 5-minute bike ride away.
Ours is a very special old house designed for indoor/outdoor living. It is located on a big wooded lot, part of a leafy pocket neighborhood centered around Oak Glen Park and Glen Echo Creek. The creek runs through our front yard. 
Recently extensively renovated, the 1914 home has historic details intact: original oak floors and wood paneling, doors, and windows. The first floor has an open plan, with the kitchen flowing into an oversized dining room with large banquet table, which flows into the living room through vintage pocket doors. The new kitchen--with Carrera marble countertops, a deep porcelain double sink, an induction cooktop, convection oven, and pull-out custom cabinetry--is a happy place for cooks.
On the second floor there are two very large bedrooms and large study (optional third bedroom) with an attached balcony. There is one enormous bathroom finished in natural stone, marble, and hand-painted tiles. It boasts a frameless glass shower, a new cast-iron tub, a marble sink with ample storage, and located in a separate alcove, a tankless Japanese bidet toilet. 
The 13,000-square-foot lot is dotted with mature oaks, a very necessary hammock, two outdoor couches located around a fireplace, a patio area with a very large outdoor dining table, a smaller table in the front-yard flower garden, and a bench that overlooks the creek. 
The yard itself is landscaped with native water plants and woodland plants and FOOD: mature avocado, meyer lemon, orange trees, also American sour cherry, Turkish cherries, pink and red-fleshed apples, raspberries, blueberries, boysenberries, strawberries, blackberries, pomegranates, figs, currants, and all manner of herbs. There are great big redwoods surrounding us too, but we didn't grow those.
The driveway provides parking for two cars front to back. You will also have use of the attached garage and basement, where the laundry room is located.
The house comes with cable TV and wireless internet. We will require a security deposit. 
If interested, send us an email about yourself. Will follow up w/ a viewing.

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Fall in love with this 4-story apartment home. Come and tour beautiful Quarry-Ridge Apartments!!!!
Pack your bags and load up the moving truck. This is one home you don't want to miss out on. You will have 1-bedroom1 1 bathroom 700 sqft apartment.
Monthly Rent: $2500.00
Deposit: $2500.00
Your home will offer you an open kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Granite/Marbel counters, and custom wood cabinets. The gourmet kitchen island has space for breakfast bar seating and is open to the living and dining area, making it perfect for entertaining.  Hard-surface flooring and the entire home has zoned heating that is individually controlled.
There is plenty of storage space throughout this home. A large walk-in closet in the bedroom. Spacious coat closet in the entry way, custom cabinets and built-in storage in the bathroom. 
Our community have exclusive access to 1 parking spaces in our underground parking garage.
Call Quarry Ridge Apartments your new home and you can enjoy the amenities we offer. Seasonal style pool and outdoor seating area . To make your commute easier, we are conveniently located just steps away from the Oakland BART station, and just a short drive to the 580 & 680 ramps. We are also walking distance to many great stores and a large shopping center called The Shops at the Ridge plaza.
Newly remodeled unit that includes soundboard walls and ceiling and padding added under fresh wooden flooring. Our complex includes gated access. We are a quick walk to the Ridge, College Avenue Shops, and public transportation.
This unit sits back from Gilbert on the second floor of the complex. It overlooks the Whittmore street. It has a nice quiet balcony street view. 
Included in rent is parking, trash, water/sewer, electric is sub metered.
All electric unit includes dishwasher, microwave, refrigerator, stove/oven. 
ATT fiber optic wired or Comcast ready
We are a non pet, no smoking complex. We have on site management and a staff of three maintenance personnel. 
Find our more information about #313. It's ready for you to move in now, so call us today and we can help you get started with the application process. Save big by applying today with a move-in date on or by 2/01/2019. 
****TAKING APPLICATIONS NOW*****
APPLICATION PROCESS (please read):
1) All Applications must be filled out online and Application Fees paid through the LINK BELOW before they can be processed. One Application per person over the age of 18 please.
2) All supporting documents such as pay-stubs, IDs, current and past rental history with phone numbers must be attached to the online application please.
3) All the documents must be submitted before we process an application.
4) Submitting an application would require paying an application fee. This fee won't be refunded whether we run your credit or not since the company we contract with would not issue refunds and the money goes to them and not us. So if you genuinely like the apartment, apply. Please set clear expectations before applying. We don't want your application fees and we encourage people not to randomly apply and pay an application fee that they cannot recover. 
5) We are 100% transparent and believe in full disclosures. Every once in a while an error may creep into one of our advertisements even after we proof and re-proof an ad. We in no way intend to make any misrepresentations and attempt to correct any errors as soon as we are notified. Also, we often must rely on the words of a property owner for various items listed in our posts. Goldstone Management won't accept any responsibility if any such errors appear into our advertisements.
All square footage is approximate. At times pictures may be of a similar unit and not necessarily of the unit being advertised.
When in doubt, please ask questions until you are fully satisfied. 
6) We look at all applications on a first come, first serve basis based on qualifications. We are an equal opportunity housing provider.
7) Upon being approved, we require a holding deposit (by 1pm of the next business day) which is part of your move-in deposit so that we would hold the apartment for you. At that time, we remove the ad and email you a lease. 
8) We structure all lease term of 12 months. A 6 month lease may be available on higher monthly rent payments.
9) We require the residents to provide a copy of renter's insurance. Goldstone Management must be listed as "Additional Insured" and general liability should be $100,000 with a maximum deductible of $1,000. If you do not have renter's insurance we can provide you with a link to a company many of our residents use for low cost insurance.
Thank you for your attention to all of the above.

title: $3950 / 2br - 1210ft2 - Rents slashed on Spacious 2 Story Townhomes in Trendy Temescal (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The Temescal Muse offers a different approach to apartment living.  It's's not a building.  It's a neighborhood of discrete town homes wrapped around an Italian street scene.  There are no corridors, only gathering places: courtyards, terraces, and private rooftop patios. Discover the efficiency of french balconies, even if you're not French.  These are town homes with a personality...yours.  We created a place, not a room number.  It feels like a home because it is.
Small and friendly is the answer to big and institutional.
Each home has it's own identity, designed with flexibility built in. A spacious Great Room combines a chef's kitchen with a dining area, media room, private office, conversation seating area.  Our 2 bedroom 2 story townhouses have lofty 10'-6" ceilings in the great room, with modern chef's kitchens featuring stainless steel appliances, plenty of storage space, pantries, and even guest powder rooms and baths.  Upstairs are 2 bedrooms, with a full baths, generous walk in closets, and a front loading laundry center in each unit sized for families.
Convenient, covered, secure parking is available for cars and bikes in the garage.
The Temescal Muse is connected to everything, even other people.  It's a sun baked Mediterranean Village within walking distance of the rest of the world. Three blocks to the dozens of restaurants and shops on Piedmont Avenue.  Not to mention the Piedmont theater.  Two blocks to the Kaiser Center. Four blocks to Bart and you are linked to the whole Bay Area.  It's closer to downtown San Francisco than most of San Francisco.
Downstairs is "Bierhaus", a Mountain View favorite watering hole now coming to The Temescal. It's Oakland's word for friendly and everyone's "third space" for dining (with or without) dogs around beerhall tables featuring great comfort food, pizza, brat, and brew.  Honest food for honest friends.  Honestly.  In fact it's a place so good you can take it with you.  Drop in on the way home to "Take out dinner" after a hard day work.  It's like having your own chef and they clean up.
Why settle for ordinary?  Call call  show contact info
 to arrange an appointment.
Perfect location spans the Piedmont Avenue and Temescal neighborhoods
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
Located on 40th Street and Manila.
2 Blocks to Kaiser Center serviced by Kaiser shuttle
3 blocks to Piedmont Ave. featuring groceries, shopping, restaurants, bars, theater, and coffee houses
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
6 minutes walk to Macarthur BART
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13

title: $5200 / 3br - 2500ft2 - Rockridge Craftsman Bungalow - 5 min walk to BART (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Restored 1910 Craftsman bungalow on a quiet, tree-lined street, a five-minute walk from BART, Market Hall, cafes, shops and restaurants. Custom kitchen with granite countertops and river rock backsplashes, Viking gas range, high efficiency washer/dryer; tons of kitchen cabinet and drawer space.
Nine-foot coved ceilings, hardwood floors, redwood baseboards and wainscoting; formal dining room with built-in redwood china hutch and window seat; wood-burning fireplace, honeycomb windows.  
Main floor has two bedrooms plus a knotty pine sleeping porch and a remodeled full shower/tub bath with custom tile.  Built-in dressers and a cedar-lined closet. 
A redwood and cedar-lined staircase leads to a finished basement with a bedroom, two full bathrooms (one with a large custom-tiled, glass-enclosed shower; the second with a combination shower/tub); a large living room filled with morning sunlight, cozy gas fireplace, custom woodwork, wet bar with refrigerator; and a family room. 
Heated floors keep your toes warm in winter.  Multi-zone hydronic heating with 24/7 thermostats, fully insulated walls and ceilings. 2013 Whole House Green Point Rating for energy efficiency. 
New cedar shingles, custom river rock foundation in traditional Craftsman style, sunny entry porch with terra cotta floor and French doors.  Rosemary, lavender, and other herbs and flowers in the front garden are drip irrigated from a 1250-gallon underground water tank filled by a passive rainwater collection system. 
One-year lease $5200 per month. First, last and $5200 security deposit due upon signing.
For questions or to set up an appointment to see the house, please reply with a telephone number and a little bit about yourself.

title: $555 / 1br - room available Feb 14 in house near bart (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
One single occupancy furnished room in a house 2 ÃÂ½ blocks from Macarthur Bart. Sublet for February 14 until the end of month. Rent is $555 for the sublet period, and a $300 security deposit.
The house is spacious. Neighborhood is not quiet or trendy but is otherwise well-situated. Central location is ideal for commuters. The close proximity to BART will get you to San Francisco in 25 minutes. House is connected to bike paths that lead into Temescal, Piedmont, Emeryville, and Downtown Oakland. 
House:
3 bd/1.5 ba, 2 large furnished living rooms and full size kitchen. House includes a basement which has an additional bathroom, and a large backyard set up with 2 planter boxes. New wood laminate flooring through living areas, shower has a tub, and kitchen appliances are ~10 years old. Washer and dryer are in the basement/first story. No one pays for cable, but we have HBO and Netflix setup on a TV if you wanted to watch something there. 
People:
Four tenants (2 couples and 1 cat) will be staying. Unfortunately we are not looking to have another pet in the house. We enjoy cooking and tend to cook pretty often and keep a stocked kitchen. We have converted a corner of the basement to a music studio as well a leather workshop. We prefer a relatively quiet and reasonably clean house since everyone has differing work schedules--being as early as 6am. 
One thing to note is that the shower is located in a Jack-and-Jill bathroom (with 3 doors) situation meaning the other two occupied rooms are connected to the bathroom and requires us to be cognizant of its use.
Some of us drink occasionally and are 420 friendly. Not super regularly or a lot by any means, but if you are sensitive about that sort of thing then it might not be a good fit for you.

title: $4500 / 4br - 1820ft2 - Sanctuary Home Ready for Your New Life! (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Looking for an amazing home space in the Oakland Hills?  Check this space out!
This home in the Oakland hills (off Skyline Blvd) home features epic view of the entire bay area, the Golden Gate Bridge, and Mt. Tam.
It's just a 5-minute walk from miles of open trails (Huckleberry & Sibley Regional Park). This 3-floor home has many wonderful elements!
The first floor features a high-end kitchen with appliances and granite counter tops. There's a living and dining room and front and back deck.
The second floor has three bedrooms and wrap around decks and a full bathroom. The third level has an exercise room with an infrared sauna, steam-room shower, and bathroom with its own entrance.
There is a third large expansive deck below surrounded by nature and trees. The house includes washer and drier and everything is in excellent condition and has been recently remodeled. Home includes a two-car garage at the top on street level, as well as 4 additional off street car parking in front off garage and a few more on the street.  
The monthly rent is $4500 and the initial security deposit is $7500. Garbage service is included (other utilities not included).
As the landlord, I strive to be kind, empathic, and understanding (within reason) in relating with tenants. I do not live in the area, and so I'm looking for mature, responsible, financially stable tenant(s) who will value and take care of this beautiful home.  
If you are interested in viewing the space, please send me an email.

title: $2195 / 1br - Sophisticated in the Temescal (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful one bedroom with lovely architectural details, crown moldings,  extravagantly large baseboards, in a beautiful palette of colors. Plaster medallions adorn the ceilings with beautifully milky light fixtures and LED bulbs.  The kitchen has granite counter tops,  a gas range in stainless steel and a stainless steel French door refrigerator.  The bathrooms have a sophisticated vanity, with a granite counter top,  an under mount rectangular sink, and a fabulous mirror.  Floors are a rosewood color. Laundry on site.  Plenty of bicycle parking in the secure backyard.
It is one block from Telegraph Ave.  Loads of wonderful neighborhood restaurants...Pizzaiolo, Lanesplitter Pizza, La Dona Tomas, Burma Superstar and great tapas.  Also close to the Post Office, Peet's Coffee, a drug store, and Berkeley Bowl. A two block alley with ice cream vendors, bookshops and trendy gift shops is within a short walk. 
A great neighborhood vibe.  A five minute drive to MacArthur BART and Ashby BART and a close bike or car commute to UC Berkeley.  Easy access to Highway 580, San Francisco and Walnut Creek. Cats are welcomed.  Please feel free to text, and I look forward to meeting you at the property.  Neighbors are professionals who are warm and inviting.
Trash is $55.00 and water is $40. per person.
Deposit is the same as the rent plus utilities.  Sorry no Section 8. Cats are welcome, sorry No dogs.
Please call me at  show contact info
, and I'll be glad to meet you the property. The address is 4732B  Shattuck Avenue, Oakland.

title: $1950 / 2br - 1200ft2 - Spacious 2 bed, 1 bath with large private deck (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a newly remodeled, large 2 bedroom, 1 bath, with a dining and living area with lots of natural light.  This unit is the lower level of a house in Montclair with a private deck and separate entrance.  The house is nestled on the side a valley and the deck has expansive views of hillsides and eucalyptus trees. 
The kitchen has a refrigerator, sink and lots of cabinet space - but it does not have a stove or oven.  The last tenant used a microwave, toaster oven and hot plate and she loved the place. 
The ideal renter would be a quiet, conscientious person who requires a calm, serene place without large/complex cooking needs.
Parking is on the street and washer and dryer are located in the common use garage. 
Rent is $1950/ month $100 additional for all utilities ( WiFi, Electric, Garbage and water).  
Looking for a year lease 
If interested, please email a bit about yourself and include a phone number and I will be happy to call back to provide details and set up time for viewing.

Beautiful apartment now available for move-in! All utilities (water, gas, electricity, and garbage) are included in rent. 
Great location! Close to downtown Oakland, Temescal shopping district and Telegraph nightlife. Convenient walking distance to MacArthur Bart (20min), busing along Broadway to Jack London (15min), or bus/biking to UC Berkeley (30min). Central location for accessing 580, 980, 80, and 880 freeways.
Great unit! This unit is recently remodeled with new stainless steel appliances. It has tall ceilings, dimmable lights, app-based video surveillance, hardwood floors, and windows in every room! Ideal for an individual or for a couple that is flexible with space.
Wonderful landlords! Longtime Bay Area residents who are responsive, friendly, supportive, and reasonable. They even helped us (current tenants) wall mount some of our furniture. Above and beyond our best living landlords since moving to California!
Take over our lease through the end of July 2019, sign a 6-month lease, or sign a 1-year lease. Move-in date slightly negotiable. We are open to selling some of our furniture, but unit will otherwise come unfurnished.
Still interested? Email us an introduction to who you are and your availability for evenings to schedule a viewing with us, the current tenants. We are responsible for identifying new tenants, and will refer you to the landlords after the viewing.
Application process: (1) introduce yourself and schedule a viewing via email! Then submit (2) application form, (3) bank statements, (4) proof of income, and (5) credit report to landlords.

title: $3250 / 2br - 1800ft2 - Spacious Lake Merritt Charmer with Backyard and Parking (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

This charming spacious 1912 duplex has been fully updated while retaining its period details and delightful individuality. Sit a spell on the shared front porch or relax in the large backyard under the fruit trees. A real gem, conveniently located close to everything.
Enter into the spacious living room with delightful chair rail molding and coffered ceiling. Hardwood floors run throughout. The formal dining room beyond is a light-filled, airy spot for meals, with a gracefully curved wall of windows and a handsome built-in sideboard, with shelves above and drawers below.  The large kitchen is sure to please your inner chef, with plenty of room for a center island and modern appliances including a gas range and dishwasher.
Both bedrooms are in the back of the home and have hardwood floors and picture rail molding. Off the hallway, a stacked washer and dryer and the full bath, with elegant pedestal sink and shower over tub. 
Back door leads to an enclosed rear yard perfect for lounging on lazy weekends. It's hard to believe this peaceful retreat is so conveniently located 3 blocks to Lake Merritt, and only 15 minutes to BART. One off-street parking space included.
Well behaved cats and small dogs will be considered.
$250 flat fee for ALL utilities (including high speed internet).
Available Now.
Showing by appointment only.
Please email to take a look and tell us a little about yourself.
================
Stephanie DeMott, BRE #02007384show contact info
 /  show contact info

AndreaRentals, BRE #02003472
A Rental Concierge for Bay Area Owners and Renters
www.andrearentals.com

title: $2290 / 2br - 1240ft2 - Spacious Two Bedroom Home Renovations (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Available asap is a spacious two-bedroom lower unit in up-and-coming West Oakland. One swift Bart ride away from downtown San Francisco with *every* eastbound train going thru West Oakland Station coming home.
The residence includes a fully renovated bathroom with convenience of private Kenmore washer and dryer, a partially renovated kitchen with brand new tiled floors, and rare urban spaciousness.
The vision for the backyard is American southwestern: succulents to conserve water, table and chairs, hanging solar lights, a hammock for hot East Bay summers and starry Oakland nights.
A vintage brunch venue with happy hour is at the end of the block; two cafes a mere block away. Mandela Greenway, a block away, bursts into bloom every spring and summer. Historical Central Station, a playground, and bike path are all blocks away.
Split water, PGE, recycling/garbage, pretty standard and reasonable divided amongst downstairs residents. One cat is fine; no dogs allowed.
Kindly state number of occupants, respective jobs, credit scores, hobbies.
First month's rent and security deposit of $1500 for move-in (installments of deposit negotiable).
Best of luck in finding Home!

title: $3700 / 2br - 990ft2 - Sunny 1800's Italianate Victorian Duplex unit + 975sf Workspace/Studio (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Completely renovated and restored landmark 1880's Italianate Victorian Duplex - side by side units.  
ONE UNIT AVAILABLE NOW.
EVERYTHING is new from the foundation up.
Be the first to live here!
The upper floor is sunny and spacious boasting 10 foot high ceilings, skylights, oak floors and a large open kitchen and living space.
Two bedrooms - one has a spacious sleeping loft accessed by a rolling ladder.
The bathroom includes abundant cabinetry and a claw foot tub/shower.
The kitchen has a generous amount of cabinetry and storage, granite countertops, new appliances and great lighting.
All in 990 square feet.
But wait.  There's more!
The lower floor has 975 square feet of open space - perfect for a large work area or studio.  
Concrete floors and sheetrocked walls and ceilings, all insulated.
Access by 5' doors at the street entry and 3' doors to the back yard.
The backyard is private and bordered by greenery.
Friendly neighborhood with convenient access to West Oakland BART, AC Transit, 880 & 580 freeway and minutes to downtown Oakland and San Francisco.  The 10th Street Cafe is just down the block with breweries and cafes a short walk or bike ride away.
- All green construction.
- Efficient tankless water heater for both hot water and hydronic heat.
- Oak floors with water based finish.
- Excellent sound separation between units and floors.
- Lots of closet space.
- Sunny private backyard.
- All windows are dual pane with interior cellular window shades (bottom up/top down, light blocking).
- Washer and dryer in unit.
This is a 1 year Lease.
Available now.
- First month rent of $3700 + Security Deposit of $3700 ($7400 total) required to move in.
- PGE (gas & electric) and EBMUD (water) responsibility of tenant.
- Owner pays garbage and recycling.
- "Renters Insurance" required.
Showing by appointment.
The following will be required:
- $40 (cash/per applicant) credit report fee.
- A separate application for each applicant.
- Good credit score.
- Current ID.
- Income verification such as pay stubs.
- Past employment and rental history including phone numbers.
PLEASE SEND A RESPONSE WITH THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION:
- Name of each applicant.
- Contact information (telephone/cell number and email address).
- A brief description about each applicant.
THANK YOU!

title: $4995 / 4br - 1850ft2 - Sunny and Southfacing. Near Dover Park. (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This is a very large and nicely updated detached Temescal home that will be available March 10th. 
Downstairs is large and open living room/dining room combination, a big kitchen with gas stove, dishwasher, and garbage disposal. There is also a bedroom on this level, with a full bath with shower, laundry machines, and access to the back yard.  The gardener maintains the fenced yard weekly. Hardwood floors everywhere except the kitchen and three tile bathrooms.  The yard is green and beautiful and has an outbuilding which can be used for storage, or as an office, art studio, or playroom. There is a covered patio area as well.  There is room for your vegetable garden.
Upstairs are three bedrooms, and two full baths.  Two of the bedrooms have two closets per bedroom, and the third has a walk-in closet.  A pull down ladder leads to a large and not-creepy attic for additional storage.
Dover Street Park is at the end of the block and is a great place to take your little ones, if you have them.  There is also a community garden there.

title: $3575 / 2br - 1400ft2 - Sunny Apartment on Greenwood Ave - Glenview (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This large, well-maintained, two-bedroom apartment available in a duplex on the border of Crocker Highlands and Glenview. Each apartment has a separate entrance, and street parking is always available close to the apartment (usually right out front). The apartment for rent has a bonus room off the main bedroom, living room, dining room, kitchen with a breakfast nook, laundry area (w/ washer & dryer), and ample storage. 
The is located on a quiet street that is a short walk (about two blocks) from Park Ave, where there is a market, several restaurants (Sushi, Mexican, Italian and more), and other shops. You can access highways 580 and 13 within minutes of walking out the door. If you commute to SF, within two blocks there is both a casual carpool as well as a bus stop for the V line, which departs for SF every 30 minutes on weekday mornings, has Wi-Fi, and is one of the last two stops before going over the bridge.

title: $1995 / 1br - Sunny Balcony Apt, on Piedmont/Oakland border, close to bus/freeway (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        


OPEN HOUSE:
WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 13TH, 6PM-7PMBy appointment or Open House only.


360 Monte Vista Avenue, APT 213
1 bedroom, 1 bath
$1995/month
$2150/deposit
No unscheduled drop-ins.ABOUT THE APARTMENT
This won't last long, so don't wait! Lovely one-bedroom apartment with lots of morning sun, priced to move. Located directly on the Grand Lake/Piedmont border, this is a quiet building in one of Oakland's best rental areas. This unit has a great layout, with excellent separation between the living and bedroom areas. 

Great storage: lots of cabinets, walk-in closet in bedroom, and convenient extra hallway closet.

Full kitchen with dining area, stone countertops, dishwasher, electric range, refrigerator, and garbage disposal. Bathroom has a full-size tub, and separate vanity area with new quartz countertop. Carpet was just professionally cleaned. Shared access to courtyard area. This is an elevator building, with coin operated laundry just across the hall from this apartment.This is a non-smoking unit. For the health and comfort of all our tenants, we take smoking and noise complaints VERY seriously in this building.  COMMUTING
Easy freeway access nearby. San Francisco Casual Carpool, Local and TransBay bus stops right at the corner. Quick bus ride to 19th Street BART. GIG CarShare service is active in this neighborhood.PARKING
Optional gated, underground garage parking available for an extra $95/month. One space available with this apartment. Street parking on block does not require permit or meters. (Sorry, no electric car charging available.)GREAT NEIGHBORHOOD
Desirable, walkable neighborhood, just a block from the Morcom Rose Garden. Lake Merritt is a 20-minute stroll away. Just up the hill from Piedmont and Grand Avenues, near many shops, Kaiser Oakland, grocery stores, dry cleaners, banks, cafes and many, many restaurants. Safeway, Trader Joe's and Whole Foods are all just a 5 minute drive away. Multiple gyms, yoga, Pilates, etc. within walking/biking distance. Located in the service zones of most popular delivery services.BUILDING AMENITIES
- Elevator
- Underground, gated garage (extra $95/space) 
- Women's and men's SAUNAS in building, with free 24-hour access. Very unique!
- Two coin-operated laundry rooms
- Shared outdoor courtyard
- Locked building entry
- Resident manager and on-call handyman. (No doorman, concierge or security guard.)MISC.
* $20 application fee per adult, payable by personal check. 
* All applicants must visit in person before applying. No long-distance, site-unseen rentals.
* Sorry, no Section 8.
* Cats OK (limit of 2). Sorry, NO DOGS, even small ones.
* Water, composting and trash/recycling included.
* Tenants may NOT sublet/rent out apartments or parking, in whole or in part, on AirBnB, VRBO, or any other 'sharing' service.If you are reading this on a website other than Craigslist, the listing has been copied without permission and may contain errors. Descriptions and template in this advertisement are proprietary marketing materials, and may not be copied or modified.

title: $3690 / 2br - 1126ft2 - Sunny Spacious Lake Merritt House - Parking & Utilities included (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Sunny and spacious two bedroom furnished (or unfurnished) house. Located in one of Oakland's best neighborhoods, Cleveland heights, just two blocks from the lake, walking distance to Trader Joes, Peet's coffee, the Grand Lake Theatre, Grand/Lakeshore shopping district and the best farmer's market in the East Bay. 
Easy access to freeways 580, 13, and 24, and just a 20 minute walk to Lake Merritt BART. Easy public transit; a short walk to casual car pool to SF, or the NX express bus to SF, or the 29 bus to downtown Oakland and to BART.
The house has recently been renovated. The open floor plan is welcoming with a mix of old world charm, hard wood floors and modern amenities. The living area features lots of sunlight and a working fireplace. Just off the living area there is a spacious dining room.
Off the dining room there is an eat in kitchen. The open kitchen has a breakfast area, granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances which include refrigerator/freezer, gas stove, microwave, and dishwasher. 
The two bedrooms are spacious and comfortable. Lastly, there is a full bathroom, with tub and shower. Tenants also have access to an enclosed small back yard. 
The house has an in-law unit on the ground level with a separate entrance in the back occupied by a single tenant. There also is a small cottage in the back of the lot independant of the house, occupied by a couple. 
The house includes a dedicated parking spot in the driveway and access to shared washer and dryer.  
Call /email / text to schedule a viewing.

No smoking
