Top Floor with skylights 
Pool, Jacuzzi,and Sauna on premises.
Water and Garbage/recycling included

CONVENIENT, SAFE LOCATION FOR WORK, PLAY, AND FOOD
Intersection of Broadway and Pleasant Valley, within walking distance of Rockridge, Temescal, and Piedmont Ave.ONSITE INDOOR PARKING for one car, + plenty of street parking: Onsite indoor parking space, + storage locker for extra gear and equipment.
Plenty of nearby street parking for a 2nd car. Bicycle rack and storage inside the garage.
 THE UNIT2 bedrooms/ 1 bath, which is very conveniently split into two sub-rooms so one person can shower and do his/her business while the other brushes his/her teeth and primps.
Remodeled Kitchen and Bath, new floors in the kitchen and bath, granite countertops, and brand new carpet in bedrooms. 
Remodeled, modern kitchen with open layout to living room.
Top story unit: never be woken up by your upstairs clog-wearing neighbors.
Venting Skylights in the bathroom and living room, balcony for fresh air and herb garden. 
Water and Trash are already included: you pay the electricity only, plus internet, which could be shared.
ROCKRIDGE MANOR AMENITIESThis unit is an individually-owned condo.  There is an active neighborhood association that keeps an eye on things, and keeps things more consistent than the average apartment building.
The HOA allows one pet, under 30 pounds.  Additional pet deposit of one-month rent.
Onsite front-loading Laundry Machines on your each floor. Yours is right across the hall. 
Onsite Pool, Hot tub, and sauna, all very private. 
Stable, active, and well-funded homeowner's association: interiors and exteriors are always well-maintained and cleaned.
The residents plan "getting to know you parties" every 6 months. While I thought that was weird at first, it helps to know your neighbors. 

TERMS 
$2850 /mo, 1 year lease + month-to-month
$3800 /mo If you want a month-to-month lease.  (We like long-term tenants) 
$300 move-in fee paid to Condo association.
Security deposit will be first/last after a credit check and the standard California rental application.
Good luck with your home search, I look forward to meeting you soon!

Cherie  show contact info

title: $3950 / 2br - 1083ft2 - The Temescal Muse - 2 Bed+ Townhome, Balcony, and a Chef's Kitchen (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Please be 
advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company. 
If you have any concerns about the
  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at  show contact info
.
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building. The 
currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured 
above.
Two Bedroom + Bonus Room, Townhome, 
Balcony, and a Chef's Kitchen364 40th Street, townhouse, Oakland 
(North/Temescal), $3950Call now to schedule your tour today!  
For an 
Appointment to View, please contact: Tamara mobile:  show contact info
 or Tony 
mobile:  show contact info

Key 
Features:2 bed 2 bathParking:$100 - 
Garage ParkingLease Duration:YearDeposit: 
$3950Pets Policy: Cats and dogs welcome.  Breed and weight 
restrictions apply.Laundry: In UnitUnit 
Description:
Community

The Temescal Muse offers a different approach to apartment living.ÃÂ  
It's's not a building.ÃÂ  It's a neighborhood of discrete town homes wrapped 
around an Italian street scene.ÃÂ  There are no corridors, only gathering 
places: courtyards, terraces, and private rooftop patios. Discover the 
efficiency of french balconies, even if you're not French.ÃÂ  These are town 
homes with a personality...yours.ÃÂ  We created a place, not a room number.ÃÂ  
It feels like a home because it is.

Small and friendly is the answer to big and institutional.

Each home has it's own identity, designed with flexibility built in. 
Sliding walls turn a dining area into a media room, private office, guest 
bedroom, or nursery.ÃÂ  Our 2 story townhouses have lofty 10'-6" ceilings in 
the great room, with modern chef's kitchens featuring stainless steel 
appliances, plenty of storage space, pantries, and even guest powder rooms 
and baths.ÃÂ  Upstairs are 2 or more bedrooms, with 1 or more full baths, 
generous walk in closets, and a front loading laundry center in each unit 
sized for families.

Connected

Internet is included (it is the 21st century) and convenient, covered, 
secure parking is available for cars and bikes in the garage.

The Temescal Muse is connected to everything, even other people.ÃÂ  It's a 
sun baked Mediterranean Village within walking distance of the rest of the 
world. Three blocks to the dozens of restaurants and shops on Piedmont 
Avenue.ÃÂ  Not to mention the Piedmont theater.ÃÂ  Two blocks to the Kaiser 
Center. Four blocks to Bart and you are linked to the whole Bay Area.ÃÂ  It's 
closer to downtown San Francisco than most of San Francisco.

Downstairs is "Bierhaus", a Mountain View 
favorite watering hole now coming to The Temescal. It's Oakland's word for 
friendly and everyone's "third space" for dining (with or without) dogs 
around beerhall tables featuring great comfort food, pizza, brat, and brew.ÃÂ  
Honest food for honest friends.ÃÂ  Honestly.ÃÂ  In fact it's a place so good 
you can take it with you.ÃÂ  Drop in on the way home to "Take out 
dinner" after a hard day work.ÃÂ  It's like having your own chef and they 
clean up.

Why settle for ordinary?
Location Description:
City of Oakland
	Alameda County
	Temescal neighborhood
	Located on 40th Street and Manila.
	Just 5 blocks to Telegraph shopping
	1 block to Broadway
	Very close to Piedmont Ave. excellent shopping, restaurants, bars, 
theater, and coffee houses.
	6 blocks to Macarthur BART
	Bus stops for AC Transit nearby on Telegraph Ave and Broadway
	Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
	Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13
	Close to Downtown and Jack London Square
Contact info: Tamara mobile:  show contact info
 or Tony 
mobile:  show contact info
 Or Contact Lapham Office at  show contact info
 
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pmFor 
applications or to view more listings, please visit our website by copying 
and pasting this link into your browsers address bar   
http://www.laphamcompany.com

title: $2695 / 2br - 1050ft2 - Top Floor 2BR w/ Balcony, Parking, Hardwood, Peaceful (oakland lake merritt / grand)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful modern apartment in a well maintained, friendly and quiet building in Oakland's most vibrant neighborhood: Grand Lake! This apartment is walking distance to several grocery stores, an array of great shopping and well reviewed restaurants (see below for some of the businesses that are walking distance from the building). You won't find a nicer unit in this neighborhood, at this price. Apartment #308 at 475 Weldon Avenue. Sorry, no pets. Available immediately. We also have another apartment with the EXACT same floor plan for $2595  on the 2nd floor. 
*Open House Times*
Tuesday, February 12  6:00-7:00pm
Saturday, February 16 10:00-11:00am
Or, email/call to schedule an appointment to see the unit at another time.
-HUGE walk-in closet
-A few blocks from the Freeway and less than a block from public transportation
-Modern aesthetics
-Hardwood flooring
-Quartz countertops
-Dishwasher/Garbage Disposal
-Sizable bedrooms with lots of closet space
-Crown molding
-Peaceful balcony
-Parking spot available (gated and assigned, $50/month)
-7 washers/dryers in the building 
-Owners pay for water/hot water/garbage
-building is rent controlled
-phone entry system
The Grand Lake neighborhood: We are steps from Grand Ave between Grand and Lakeshore. Very close to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION. 3 blocks from the award winning Grand Lake Farmer's Market! You can walk to Penrose restaurant, The Alley, Boot and Shoe Service, Bangkok Palace, Grand Oaks Restaurant, Grand Tavern, Modigliani Cafe, Coffee Mill, The Star, Safeway, Camino, Libertine Lounge, Mijori Sushi, Grand Lake Theater, Trader Joe's and Walgreens. Lake Shore Avenue is just a few blocks away with all of its shops and restaurants including Peet's, Shakewell, Prohibition Chicken, Starbucks, Arizmendi bakery, Top Dog, The Cat House, Buckingham Spirits, The Gap and many more local treats. The Rose Garden is just across the street and over one block. Lake Merritt is just three blocks away with it's amazing array of birds from around the world and 3.2 mile walking path. Many more parks in the neighborhood as well!
Application fee is $15 per adult. You can bring your own application or pick one up on site.

title: $3280 / 1br - 1450ft2 - TOP FLOOR LOFT-SPACIOUS-INCREDIBLE VIEWS (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

Through it's creative design and exposed architectural elements, 5th street Lofts at 1155 5th street, offers a unique experience for those seeking the urban landscape and loft-style living.
We currently have one unit that will be available in March. This space is a Gem! This is a top floor, corner unit with sweeping views of West Oakland, San Francisco and the port of Oakland. This unit has an updated kitchen and bathroom and features one bedroom with barn style doors and a lot of storage. The community at 5th street lofts is eclectic, animal friendly and inviting. Please emial or text today to set up an appointment to view the space and pre-qualify for leasing. The apartment is currently occupied.
Highlights:
* Free Internet!
* Garbage Disposal 
* Hard wood floors
* Onsite coin operated laundry. 
* Two gated parking lots.
* Includes one parking space(for additional fee)
* Pet friendly with deposit and monthly pet rent-dog area in gated parking lot. 
* Water and Garbage paid 
* 3 blocks from Bart 
* 5 blocks from Jack London square. 
* Close to Amtrak and ferry. 
*Straight shot to Bay Bridge
...did we say free internet??
*1450 sq ft
*$3280 per month
(Security Deposit is equal to one month's rent, but may vary depending on credit, pet application, gate remotes and parking)
$45 dollar application fee(NO CASH)
12 month lease
E-mail to schedule an appointment for viewing. Don't miss out on this opportunity!
This location is in the West Oakland/Jack London neighborhood and is a 10 minute walk and 5 minute drive to the West Oakland Bart Station. Nearby parks include Fox Square, Skate, and Lowell Park. This location is very walkable so most errands can be accomplished on foot. There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain is flat.  Nearby coffee shops include Cafe Lizzi, Urban Blend Cafe and Autobahn Cafe. Nearby restaurants include Old Kan Beer CO. , Lungomare, Chop Bar, and Forge Pizza.
Keywords: 5th street lofts, madison park, lampwork lofts, 4thstreeteast,Allegro at Jack London, Oak Village Apartments, Ironhorse, Acorn Apartments, City Towers, Mandela Gateway, San Francisco, West Oakland, hipster, trendy, radical, awesome, spacious, adorable, amazing, loft, open, windows, open floor plan, views, port of Oakland, bay bridge, salesforce, twitter, facebook, comalopa, zella's soul food, pizza love, 10th and wood, pretty lady, Yoshi's Oakland, spinning dough, chile bravo, student, BART, bart, zipcar

This apartment is filled with possibilities. Large front room can be used as a master bedroom or comfortable living room. Enjoy eating and entertaining in a real dining room with built-in cabinets. Rear bedroom is perfect for a cozy sleeping space or home office. Fresh paint and refinished flooring throughout, and new quartz counters in kitchen. 

This rental has lots of storage options: Walk-in closet (with its own window!) in large bedroom, original built-in cabinets throughout, two smaller closets in rear bedroom, and access to your own 7ft x 7.5ft (52.5 square ft., included in rent) private storage room in basement.

Coin laundry on-site. This is a non-smoking unit.  COMMUTING
Easy freeway access nearby. Bus and carpool is a short walk away.PARKING
One off-street, uncovered parking space in rear of property available for $100/month. GREAT NEIGHBORHOOD
Desirable, walkable neighborhood, close to Lake Merritt, Trader Joe's, the Grand Lake Theater, Safeway, Post Office and all the shops, restaurants and cafes you could ever want on Grand and Lakeshore Avenues.MISC.
* $20 application fee per adult, payable by personal check. 
* All applicants must visit in person before applying. No long-distance, site-unseen rentals.
* Sorry, no Section 8.
* Cats OK (limit of 2). Sorry, NO DOGS, even small ones.
* Water, composting and trash/recycling included.
* Tenants may NOT sublet/rent out apartments, in whole or in part, on AirBnB, VRBO, or any other 'sharing' service.If you are reading this on a website other than Craigslist, the listing has been copied without permission and may contain errors. title: $2895 / 3br - Unique 3bd/2ba Apartment w/ Balcony Views - Caballo Hills (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
OPEN HOUSE SUNDAY 2/17 10:45-11:15AM
7400 Mountain Blvd.
#3A
Oakland, Ca 94605
This eccentric apartment unit is located in the harmonious Caballo Hills neighborhood of Oakland. At first glance, the high living room ceiling gives the common area a sense of flexibility and openness. The functional fireplace offers a warm welcome and is the best place to gather friends and family for a cozy night. Transitioning from the kitchen and living room is the beautiful top floor. All three bedrooms have a ceiling fan and their own exclusive closet space. The master and hallway bathrooms have been updated to a more modern taste.
The two balconies in the unit literally offer a breath of fresh air. One is located off the kitchen/living room area and the other one off the master bedroom. The unit comes equipped with stackable washer/dryer hook-ups, which gives the option to bring any desired laundry machine of your choosing. The attached garage serves best to park any car or simply utilize it as partial storage space.
Immediate access to I-580 freeway is around the corner and is a direct route to Downtown Oakland, Berkeley, Emeryville, San Francisco. Nearby parks include Concordia Park, Arroyo Viejo Park and Arroyo Viejo Recreation Center.

title: $1900 / 1br - \\ Unique Retreat in Oakland Hills // (oakland piedmont / montclair)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Unique retreat for relaxation and concentration located 12 miles from downtown San Francisco.
The house is surrounded by two hundred year old oak, sequoia, and eucalyptus trees. This is a guest house which is a part of a compound spread on several acres that are hidden in the Oakland Hills on the border of Piedmont, Oakland, and Berkeley. The house overlooks a manicured Zen garden with a three tier cascades of waterfalls. It is a perfect place to merge into the busy life during the day while having the privacy afterwards. Remodeled in 2017, the house features a redwood deck, dining/living area, upstairs loft/bedroom, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. This place is perfect for someone who likes gardening and nature. 
Activities nearby include: 
- Montclair driving range: 10 minutes walking distance
- Hiking and biking trails: 5 minutes away
- Montclair Village: 5 minutes driving
- Oakland Zoo: 15 minutes driving
- Chabot Space Observatory: 10 minutes driving
There is easy access to Highways 13, 24, 80, 580, 680, and 880. 
You will be provided with detailed information upon request. 
Accessibility: 9 steps up to the house, sorry no wheelchair access.
Pet friendly: your dog can stay in an outdoor kennel.
Rental fee: $1900 + utilities

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Beautiful and spacious renovated Victorian Duplex. This 3 bedroom/1 Bathroom unit has a huge Living/Dining Room with high ceilings and built in book shelves. Freshly painted and completely remodeled featuring dual pane windows, LED lighting throughout the unit and an extra walk in hall closet for storage. 
The eat in kitchen has new appliances and plenty of cabinet/pantry space for the avid cook and a washer and dryer in the unit.  There's even a cozy front porch overlooking the garden to sit and have your morning coffee or tea. 
The huge enclosed back yard offers a peaceful environment and is perfect for an afternoon BBQ or gardening. Private New Washer and Dryer inside the unit. 
Bathroom remodel with walk in shower, over the sink mirror cabinet and an extra storage cabinet. 
Imagine living only 2 and a half blocks from West Oakland BART, just 7 minutes from S.F.
 Ideally situated for access to either 880 or 580 freeways. Great space for 2-3 people or a small family.
Easy street parking with residential zoning. Water and Garbage services are included.  
The tenant pays for P G & E.
This is a charming historic Victorian side by side Duplex with all the modern day conveniences.
This unit has a no pet policy. 
This unit is not section 8 compliant.
No previous Evictions.
Non-smoking/non vaping
Lease term: 1 year: no sublets.
Monthly rent: $3,600  and security deposit of $3,900 required to move in.

title: $4100 / 2br - 1155ft2 - We've slashed the rent on 2 Story Penthouses in Trendy Temescal (oakland north / temescal)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
The most imaginative Penthouse Townhouses in the East Bay are now the most Affordable.
Four spectacular and unique Townhome Penthouses each with private rooftop terraces overlooking the Golden East Bay Hills and the City of San Francisco sit atop The Temescal Muse.  They are part of The Muse's different approach to Urban Living.
The Temescal Muse rethinks apartment living.  It's not a building.  It's a neighborhood of discrete town homes wrapped around an Italian street scene.  There are no corridors, only gathering places: courtyards, terraces, and private rooftop patios. Discover the efficiency of french balconies, even if you're not French.  These are town homes with a personality...yours.  We created a place, not a room number.  It feels like a home because it is.
Small and friendly is the answer to big and institutional.
Each home has it's own identity, designed with flexibility built in. Sliding walls turn a dining area into a media room, private office, guest bedroom, or nursery.  Our 2 and 3 bedroom 2 story townhouses have lofty 10'-6" ceilings in the great room, with modern chef's kitchens featuring stainless steel appliances, plenty of storage space, pantries, and even guest powder rooms and baths.  Upstairs are 2 or more bedrooms, with 1 or more full baths, generous walk in closets, and a front loading laundry center in each unit sized for families.
Convenient, covered, secure parking is available for cars and bikes in the garage.
The Temescal Muse is connected to everything, even other people.  It's a sun baked Mediterranean Village within walking distance of the rest of the world. Three blocks to the dozens of restaurants and shops on Piedmont Avenue.  Not to mention the Piedmont theater.  Two blocks to the Kaiser Center. Four blocks to Bart and you are linked to the whole Bay Area.  It's closer to downtown San Francisco than most of San Francisco.
Downstairs is "Bierhaus", a Mountain View favorite watering hole now coming to The Temescal. It's Oakland's word for friendly and everyone's "third space" for dining (with or without) dogs around beerhall tables featuring great comfort food, pizza, brat, and brew.  Honest food for honest friends.  Honestly.  In fact it's a place so good you can take it with you.  Drop in on the way home to "Take out dinner" after a hard day work.  It's like having your own chef and they clean up.
Why settle for ordinary?  Call call  show contact info
 to arrange an appointment.
Perfect location spans the Piedmont Avenue and Temescal neighborhoods
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
Located on 40th Street and Manila.
2 Blocks to Kaiser Center serviced by Kaiser shuttle
3 blocks to Piedmont Ave. featuring groceries, shopping, restaurants, bars, theater, and coffee houses
Bus stop for AC Transit direct to SF 100 feet away
6 minutes walk to Macarthur BART
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, and San Leandro
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13
City bus stop to Downtown Oakland and Jack London Square

63 brand new upscale apartments in Oakland's vibrant Jingletown neighborhood.
Oakland's newest live-work and apartment community, 401 Derby, is just across from Alameda and a block from Oakland Estuary in the heart of Oakland's artistic Jingletown neighborhood. It's one of the fastest growing arts districts in the San Francisco Bay Area. 
401 Derby offers a variety of floorplans with great natural light, stainless-steel appliances, caesarstone counter-tops, and individual washer and dryers. title: $1850 / 1br - 225ft2 - Your Own Fully Furnished Studio in Fruitvale (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
All UTILITIES AND WIFI INCLUDED, FREE LAUNDRY
Charming, furnished studio, newly renovated last year. Sliding glass doors open out to a private patio for your use. Unit is complete with kitchenette and en suite with beautiful cast iron tub/shower. You'll have your own fridge, microwave, hot plate, electric kettle, butcher block, crock pot, and basic kitchenware.
Rest serenely in your own peaceful space with black-out curtains and a queen bed, linens provided. Closet with shelving for storage. Desk and bookshelves included. Smart TV included.
The patio outside provides access to a barbecue if you like to grill or a chill space to relax and sip a glass of wine in the evening. Cute patio lights give a festive feel.
Wifi, garbage, water, electricity, sewage, gas bills (all utilities) are paid by landlord. Free use of washer and dryer available in the basement of the main house. Plug-in heater/radiator and fan.
Property is located on a cul-de-sac in the Fruitvale neighborhood of Oakland with a great walk score (86)! A mile to Fruitvale BART (5-minute bike ride) and just a mile to the 580 and 880. Close to Highland Hospital (1.7 mi), Oakland Kaiser, UCSF Benioff Oakland, and 20-minute commute to SF on BART. Close by you'll find Alameda Island, Jack London Square, and plenty of hiking in the Oakland hills. Also close to Dimond District with Farmer Joe's Marketplace, coffee shops, La Farine Bakery and more. Street parking is available and free. 
An extra $200 rent for couples.
Details:
-	Available Date: February 22nd
-	Security Deposit (refundable): $1500
- Rent and all utilities, wifi, completely furnished: $1850/mo
-	Refundable Pet deposit: $500 (cats only) and non-refundable pet rent of $50/mo (cats only)
- One-time cleaning fee of $125
- Off-street parking spot available for $100/mo; street parking readily available
-	Lease length: short term leases available (3-month, 4-month, etc.)
-	All utilities and Wifi included, Smart TV 
-	No smoking or vaping of any substance in the studio. 
Reviews from previous stays:
"I loved my stay at this studio. It's well furnished, clean, and private. The hosts are very accommodating and easy to get in contact with. I highly recommend this charming spot." - Andrea
"Last year, I embarked on a new career in San Francisco and needed a place to live for about 18 months. During my house search, I crossed with this owner's listing on Craigslist and knew immediately that was the place for me. The owners made me feel like I was home from day one, with their welcoming and details. I originally lived with them in San Francisco and then moved to their new house in Oakland; in both cases, the common areas and my space were well maintained and spacious, nothing to complain about. They are very respectful and responsible people, and their place is great as well. I will definitely recommend their house to anyone!" - Rosi
"I really enjoyed staying in this spacious, sunny, newly-built studio. The amenities include a handy kitchenette, ample closet space, clawfoot tub/shower, and a patio area. I always prefer to get the feel of a city's neighborhoods and communities. Meeting 'real people' like the owners was also great; they were available to give me tips about local shops and restaurants. They are both very helpful and accommodating. I will definitely come back if I am in the Oakland area." - Susan

They are very respectful and responsible people, and their place is great as well. I will definitely recommend their house to anyone!" - Rosi

title: $1850 / 1br - 225ft2 - Your Own Fully Furnished Studio in Fruitvale (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
All UTILITIES AND WIFI INCLUDED, FREE LAUNDRY
Charming, furnished studio, newly renovated last year. Sliding glass doors open out to a private patio for your use. Unit is complete with kitchenette and en suite with beautiful cast iron tub/shower. You'll have your own fridge, microwave, hot plate, electric kettle, butcher block, crock pot, and basic kitchenware.
Rest serenely in your own peaceful space with black-out curtains and a queen bed, linens provided. Closet with shelving for storage. Desk and bookshelves included. Smart TV included.
The patio outside provides access to a barbecue if you like to grill or a chill space to relax and sip a glass of wine in the evening. Cute patio lights give a festive feel.
Wifi, garbage, water, electricity, sewage, gas bills (all utilities) are paid by landlord. Free use of washer and dryer available in the basement of the main house. Plug-in heater/radiator and fan.
Property is located on a cul-de-sac in the Fruitvale neighborhood of Oakland with a great walk score (86)! A mile to Fruitvale BART (5-minute bike ride) and just a mile to the 580 and 880. Close to Highland Hospital (1.7 mi), Oakland Kaiser, UCSF Benioff Oakland, and 20-minute commute to SF on BART. Close by you'll find Alameda Island, Jack London Square, and plenty of hiking in the Oakland hills. Also close to Dimond District with Farmer Joe's Marketplace, coffee shops, La Farine Bakery and more. Street parking is available and free. 
An extra $200 rent for couples.

title: $2850 / 1br - $2850 / 1br - 1000ft2 - One Bedroom Luxury Apartment/Condo, Utilities (oakland downtown)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
We are renting a beautiful one-bedroom luxury apartment starting May 15, 2019. 
The Apartment
It is very spacious, about 1,010 sq ft, and absorbs beautiful natural light throughout the day. The apartment does not face the street and offers absolute privacy 24/7. We will be renting the place semi-furnished, with mid-century modern furniture that matches the style of the apartment.
The Building and Location
The building is situated on the top of Adams Point, and has a view of the North Bay, including Mount Tam. It is located 15 minutes walking to downtown Oakland and 19th St. BART station. On average it takes about 30 minutes to commute to downtown SF or Berkeley. The neighborhood is very quiet and safe, so that you can enjoy the city life and quickly escape back to a cozy, quite home. 
Additional Features:
- Gas, Water, Electricity, HOA, and Garbage are all included in the rent
- Walk-in closet
- Gas Fireplace
- Balcony with a view of sunsets and the golden-gate
- Mounted TV
- Wine Fridge
- Plenty of storage space in unit
- Recently renovated bathroom
- Balcony with potted plants garden
- 15 minute walk to BART and downtown
- 30 minute commute to downtown SF
- 5 minutes walk to restaurants, bars
- 5 minutes walk to Wholefoods
- One-car parking spot
- Bike parking on ground floor
- Coin-operated laundry in the building (4 sets of washer/dryer)
- Well maintained and clean lobby in the building
The lease will be for 12 months, starting May 15, 2019, with the security deposit and last month's rent due by May 5, 2019. Security deposit is $2,500.00.
Rent: $2,850.00

title: $5000 / 3br - 3200ft2 - $5000 / 3br 3ba 3200+ft2 - Spacious Executive Home in Berkeley/Oakland (oakland rockridge / claremont)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This elegant, secluded Berkeley/North Oakland hills home, built in 1996, nestled above Tunnel Road, above the Claremont Hotel and the Caldecott Tunnel is now fully renovated to exacting standards and available for yearly lease mid-March. It features beautiful sweeping canyon views and is located close to public transportation, shopping, the historic Claremont Resort Hotel, University of California Berkeley, and the cities of Berkeley, Oakland, and San Francisco. 
This brightly lit home with luxurious finishes has 3 bedrooms, 3 full baths, and garage. Inviting natural slate entry leads into a formal living and dining area with a balcony overlooking the scenic Oakland hills. Large eat-in kitchen and family room have access through French doors to a lovely garden patio and backyard. The dining room is conveniently located next to the kitchen and formal living area. The brand-new, gourmet kitchen with chef's counter tops, lots of cabinets, stainless steel appliances, a wine rack, fresh paint and new hardwood floors throughout the living areas of the home. The well designed floor-plan is topped off with a spacious and private master suite, a marble tiled master bath with jacuzzi tub, and enormous walk in closet, which overlooks scenic Oakland hills. 
Two good-sized additional bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms.  Garage with laundry has direct access to home. Pets okay with owners' approval. No smoking. Easy access to Highway 24, Rockridge BART, AC Transit express service to San Francisco, UC Berkeley and Contra Costa County. College Avenue and Orinda shopping and services nearby. Adjacent to Tilden Regional Park's 2000 acres of open space as well as the regional bike trail and trails through Claremont Canyon. 
Please contact  show contact info
 (Ekta) or  show contact info
 (Paul) to arrange a showing.

body:

1 MONTH FREE
- 1b/1b + den
-15 ft ceilings + industrial-sized windows with a ton of natural light

Building Amenities:

-Overnight guard on duty 9pm-5am
-Community garden
-Wide hallways 
-Iconic Art work 
Lampwork Lofts is where historic industrial meets contemporary living. A nationally designated historic landmark built in Oakland, CA in 1912, the masonry building was designed as an incandescent light bulb factory owned by General Electric, notable for being the first factory to employ women on the West Coast.
Now redefined and newly restored, Lampwork Lofts has 92 units. Our luxury loft rentals feature high ceilings and super-sized windows allowing plenty of sunlight looking out at beautiful city views within one the bays most iconic neighborhood. Renovated kitchens with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances, Newly renovated bathrooms with oversized vanity mirrors, and abundant His+hers closet space

title: $3340 / 1br - 1342ft2 - One of a Kind Stunning Loft for Rent~ (oakland west)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
This 1342-square-foot live/work artist's loft is located in the historic Clawson School built in 1917.  The pride of Oakland's school system for 52 years, this grand building features art deco brick-and-molded-terracotta facade detail rare to find in a residential setting.  This ground-floor loft features high ceilings throughout and beautiful brick-work on several walls.  With its sunny Southern exposure and large double-paned windows, the warm daytime natural light creates the perfect atmosphere for a creative tenant.  Create your own living layout in this spacious unit that is plenty large enough for a couple.  No one is living below, above or around you in the large main space, which gives you the freedom to work late or watch movies at any hour of the night, making this a truly unique environment.   The unit's parking space is 5 feet from your large back door that opens into the secure parking area.  This is the only unit in the building that has an original fireplace (non operational). Right above, a sun-drenched deck enables you to sit or barbecue outdoors.  A very large bathroom has a washer dryer, new toilet and shower tub combo. Just outside, apple, peach and Asian pears produce fruit in season and lemon trees offer their bounty year-round.  This unit has tons of soul and emits creative energy from the solid concrete that schooled young people for 50 years! They can't build buildings like this anymore. 
Please note that some of the photos in this posting are from when loft had different wall paint~
The 28-unit building houses an artist/young professional community. Looking for a tenant who loves this space, is responsible, and will enjoy being part of this vibrant community.
 Includes:
- water, garbage and sewer 
- washer and dryer in unit
- stainless steel refrigerator 
- stainless steel semi-pro gas range and oven
- Bosch quiet dishwasher
- garbage disposal
- central gas heating
- double-paned windows
- one secure parking space in back lot
- additional parking in front lot
- kitchen island table with drawers
- gate clicker
- pest control
- large wooden Venetian Blind that can be used as a divider
Location:
- 3240 Peralta St. Unit #5
- access to I-80, I-580, CA-24 I-880 and the Bay bridge are just blocks away.
- a few blocks from major shopping: Home Depot, Ikea, Target, Best Buy, AMC,          
    Emery Bay Mall, Safeway, Trader Joe's, Starbucks, etc.
- on Emeryville-West Oakland border - a few blocks from the Pixar campus
- minutes from West Oakland Bart and SF is 12 minutes away from there
Terms:
-  Available Feb. 8th, 2019
-  1 year lease
-  Rent = monthly @ $3340
-  Security deposit $4000
-  No cigarette smoking
-  Renter's insurance required
-  No sublets
-  Must follow WCL HOA CC&Rs and Rules
-  $100 move in/out fee.
-  $25 application fee
Please email for a private showing!
$25 application fee will be waived if a current credit report (within 2 weeks ) is provided by applicants. 
Some more info on history of the building:
In 1971, Clawson was the center of Superintendent Marcus Foster's partnership with UC Berkeley working to improve education for low-income students.  In the mid-1970's, the building became Oakland's foray into creating a public school dedicated to the arts. Dogtown Developers purchased the building from Oakland Unified School District in 1999, after it closed in 1979, and renovated it to create these unique and amazing live/work lofts.

body:

French doors open to a large living room with vaulted ceilings and a wood burning fireplace, and large windows capture surrounding views of the Bay. An adjacent formal dining room leads to a spacious white kitchen featuring dual ovens, tile counters, hardwood floors, stovetop with grill, and partial views of Downtown Oakland. A bonus family room leads to the garage entry. 
Across the other wing of the home, you will find two Jack and Jill bedrooms. The master bedroom features built-in custom closets and a doublewide shower. A second adjoining bathroom features a spa tub. Well-maintained, this property opens to the wrap around deck on the main level. 
Downstairs is an au-pair style bedroom with bathroom and seating area that provides exterior access to a private fenced-in yard. This home sits on an 11,000 square foot lot and features:

title: $3500 / 3br - 2000ft2 - **DOG FRIENDLY** 3 BR/3.5 BA Townhouse Near NEW Richmond Ferry (richmond / point / annex)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
3 bedroom 3.5 bath townhouse located in the city of Richmond (near the marina) available for rent! The new Richmond Ferry is officially open, making it a convenient location for people commuting to San Francisco.
This 1,975 sq ft, 3 story townhouse is new (completed in 2017) and perfect for people looking for a place to live near the water. Easy commute to the city or other parts of the East Bay as well.
Message us with information about yourself if you are interested in a viewing.
Features:
- Open kitchen with middle island - new stainless steel dishwasher, high end gas stove, and microwave
- Lots of natural light in the living room and dining room (located on 2nd floor with kitchen)
- 2nd floor also includes powder room and pantry
- Ground floor bedroom or office with full bath
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet and large bathroom
- Secondary bedroom with full bath 
- New Washer and dryer in unit
- 2 car garage with room for storage
- 1 additional parking spot available within community for guests or extra car
Commute:
- 10 minute walk to Richmond Ferry (now open)
- Easy access to I-580 and I-80
- 25 minutes to San Francisco
- 20 minutes to Oakland
- 20 minutes to UC Berkeley
- Richmond Bart station is 2 miles away
Lifestyle:
- Great running or biking trails at the nearby waterfront
- Riggers Loft is nearby, with great wine and breweries!
- Beautiful views of San Francisco from the waterfront
- Marina Bay Yacht Harbor is within walking distance
- Many parks and hiking trails nearby
- Delicious restaurants and bars walking distance
- CVS pharmacy and Kaiser nearby
- Safe neighborhood with police department nearby
Perfect for:
- Long term renters. We require at least a 1 year lease.
- Newly weds or couples
- Families
- Friends
Other details:
- Images are from the model home. This townhouse will be unfurnished
- Move-in deposit is $5,000
- Background check required
Message us with information about yourself if you are interested in a viewing. We look forward to hearing from you!

title: $1900 / 1br - 500ft2 - El Cerrito Hills Studio Loft (albany / el cerrito)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
A well planned, separate studio cottage designed by the architect Ron Senna in the 1980s has privacy and warmth.  Included in the well thought out space is a fireplace, kitchenette, spacious bath, sleeping loft plus a private deck off the main room.
Bask in the sun on your own private deck. Independent detached unit studio-loft home located off a safe, private driveway in upscale El Cerrito Hills. Enjoy the peace and tranquility of a residential neighborhood hidden in surrounding nature areas. 
Neighborhood Features
5 minute drive down the hill to I-80 and El Cerrito Del Norte BART
10 minutes from El Cerrito Plaza BART, Trader Joes and Movie theater, etc.
The #7 bus stops directly outside of the home. Takes minutes to get to Del Norte BART station in one direction, or taking it in the other direction brings you to downtown Berkeley and UC Berkeley.
5 minutes from fantastic Arlington Park and Playground
30 second walk to Tassajara Park and tennis courts
6 minute drive to Wildcat Canyon and Hillside Reserve hiking trails
17 minute drive to Tilden Park
19 minute drive to UC Berkeley
15 minute drive to new Richmond Marina Ferry Terminal
4 minutes to Safeway, Giovanni's grocery, Safeway, Natural Foods, and more...
The Unit
Lots of windows, natural light, and plenty of privacy.
Free washer/dryer on premises
Dishwasher

Private parking as well as street parking

Non-smokers only, no drug use

title: $3650 / 4br - 1776ft2 - Enjoy stunning views from this 4/3 home in the Richmond hills! (richmond / point / annex)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Come home to this spacious and well laid out 4 bedroom 3 bath house on a dead-end street in Richmond! This charming property has been impeccably maintained and is move in ready. There are gleaming hardwood floors throughout the main living areas and bedrooms and tile on the floors and surfaces of the bathrooms. There are 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the main floor and an In-law suite on the 1st floor with 1 en-suite bathroom, mini fridge and countertop, heat and it's own entrance through the garage. There are built-in bookcases and benches throughout the living room and dining room and a warm and sunny enclosed porch off of the kitchen. The kitchen and the sun porch are beautifully tiled and the sun porch is glass enclosed for enjoyment of the garden/patio. The home has a two car attached garage and ample storage throughout. There is an elementary school less than a half a mile away. Vacant and easy to show!

body:

403 S. Garrard Blvd - 216 | Richmond, CA 94801


  Available: Now

Offered By

SG Real Estate
Description
  
    This large open-concept two-level 2 bedroom plus bonus room, 2 bathroom townhome features a bonus room great for use as a guest room, den, or office. The home is well lit and has beautiful modern dark gray wood-patterned luxury vinyl tile (LVT) floors; high ceilings; quadruple-pane windows; forced air conditioning and heating; a large deck with views of Point Richmond; and a full-size washer and gas dryer in the unit. The modern open kitchen has a Caesarstone quartz countertop and backsplash and stainless steel GE appliances including a gas range. The large bathroom has high-end finishes and a tub. The apartment is uber-efficient with a Navien tankless gas hot water heater, LED lighting, and spray foam insulation for superior sound insulation and temperature regulation. Parking for 1 car completes the home.
One of the reasons the Point is so special is its location within the small "downtown" of Point Richmond. At the same time, it is just minutes from Berkeley, Larkspur, and downtown San Francisco. Point Richmond is a gem, enjoying a historic small-town feel with quaint coffee shops, beaches, shops, restaurants, and even an old-fashioned barber.

title: $2995 / 2br - 1007ft2 - Renovated 2 BR Condo in Beautiful Marina Bay (richmond / point / annex)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

    
      Beautiful 2 Bed 2 Bath Marina Bay Condo
    
  
  Property Address

176 Marina Lakes Drive | Richmond, CA 94804


  Available: 02/18/2019

Offered By

MSB Property Management
Description
  
    Fully Remodeled 2 bedroom 2 bathroom condo for rent in beautiful Marina Bay. 
COMMUNITY AMENITIES
- Two fitness studios
- Two pools
- Tennis courts
- Canals & fountains throughout complex
NEIGHBORHOOD
- Easy access to Richmond Ferry Terminal for commuters
- Short walk to Marina
- Short walk to public park
MASTER BEDROOM
- Private bathroom and 2 private closets
- 2nd Floor
- New carpet
- Canal-facing window
UNIT AMENITIES
- Refrigerator
- Stove
- Dishwasher
- Garbage disposal
- Washer
- Dryer
- Balcony w/dining set
PERKS
- Parking spot included
- Gated complex
- Water and trash included
The condo gets a lot of natural light, there are canals with water fountains throughout the grounds of the complex so there is always a calming sound of wildlife (birds) and water. However the sounds are not "noisy" and cannot be heard if the windows are closed. The complex is gated, and the unit is near the entrance so its a short stroll to the gym, yoga room, pool, and tennis courts. Parking space included. 
The condo is about a 5 minute walk to the Marina which has a walking trail that leads you all the way down to Berkeley and Emeryville. It's about a 7-10 min drive to Point Richmond, which has tons of restaurants and cafes, and about 8-10 miles north of Berkeley and where you can easily find nightlife, food scenes, and urban comforts. Great location for commuters too! https://sanfranciscobayferry.com/richmond-sched

title: $2350 / 2br - 720ft2 - Sunny 2bd 1ba all updated, private yard, dogs welcome! (richmond / point / annex)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Our single-level 2 bedroom 1 bath unit is situated in a sunny tri-plex only a few minutes from Del Norte BART (about 5 blocks away). 
The triplex is situated in the middle of a flat and quiet street with very little car traffic (not a thoroughfare).
It's close to everything: a wide array of restaurants, the US Post Office, the DMV, Safeway, Target, The Home Depot, Planet Fitness, and multiple parks are all within walking distance.
The bright 2 bedroom 1 bath has it's own large enclosed yard off the living room and an open kitchen.
There's a large closet in each bedroom and storage closets the entire length of the hallway leading from the front door to the bedrooms and bathroom.
The unit it about 5 blocks from Del Norte BART station, highways 580 and 80. 
Off-street covered parking for 2 cars + a secure storage unit adjacent to the carport.
This is a great location and very convenient for commuters.
The entire unit has been freshly painted, new kitchen countertops have been installed and a clothes washer and dryer are included.
Non Smoking Building.
Available February 18, 2019.
2 Bedroom 1 Bath- Approximately 780sq ft.
Rent $2,350/mo.
Security Deposit: $2,350
Pet Policy: Dogs OK! Additional; $500.00 deposit (sorry no cats)
Thanks for your interest!

body:

$1,650.00/mo 

KEY FEATURESBedrooms: 1Bathrooms: 1Parking: Street ParkingLease Duration:  1 YearDeposit:  $2,150.00Pets Policy:  No PetsProperty Type: ApartmentDESCRIPTION
This is a beautiful brick apartment complex in HISTORIC POINT RICHMOND with separate secured entry entrance for residents. Directly facing the historic downtown Point Richmond with theater, Hotel Mac, two grocery stores just to your right, post office, churches, quaint stores and offices coffee houses, and charming restaurants. The famous pool Natatorium, http://www.ci.richmond.ca.us/2140/Richmond-Plunge?nid=2140, is a few blocks to the left for swimming. You can easily walk to everything including the elementary school and playground. Great walking streets nearby with awesome three bridge Bay views. Easy walk to Chevron or to the bus stop. 5 minutes across the bridge to Marin and San Rafael, 10 minutes to Berkeley, 20 minutes to downtown San Francisco, and 8 minutes way from the NEW Richmond Ferry Terminal.

Corner unit

title: $3000 / 3br - 1066ft2 - We Ã¢ÂÂ¤ Locals! No application Fee for Residents of Richmond (richmond / point / annex)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

    
      Brand New Construction in the Heart of Point Richmond - Open to Short Term Leases.
    
  
  Property Address

403 S. Garrard Blvd - 207 | Richmond, CA 94801


  Available: Now

Offered By

SG Real Estate |  show contact info

Description
  
    This large open-concept two-level 2 bedroom plus bonus room, 2 bathroom townhome features a bonus room great for use as a guest room, den, or office. The home is well lit and has beautiful modern dark gray wood-patterned luxury vinyl tile (LVT) floors; high ceilings; quadruple-pane windows; forced air conditioning and heating; a large deck with views of Point Richmond; and a full-size washer and gas dryer in the unit. The modern open kitchen has a Caesarstone quartz countertop and backsplash and stainless steel GE appliances including a gas range. The large bathroom has high-end finishes and a tub. The apartment is uber-efficient with a Navien tankless gas hot water heater, LED lighting, and spray foam insulation for superior sound insulation and temperature regulation. Parking for 1 car completes the home. 
The building offers landscaped common areas, bike parking, and a rooftop deck with a fireplace and a view of the park, hills, and homes of Point Richmond. 
Just minutes from Berkeley, Larkspur, and downtown San Francisco. Point Richmond is a gem, enjoying a historic small-town feel with quaint coffee shops, beaches, shops, restaurants, and even an old-fashioned barber. 

Open: Thursday, February 7th @ 12-12:30 and Saturday, February 9th @ 11-11:30am. Please call/text us at  show contact info
 for Private showings!

body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
WCM  apartments is nestled in the center of Richmond, CA. We are close to everything including the post office, schools, community college, gas station, bus stops, shopping and restaurants. We are a quiet community with some greenery of trees and plants.
Available February 8, 2019
1 Bedroom 1 Bath- Approximately 643sq ft.
Rent $1650.00.
S. Deposit $1000+
Application fee per adult $25.00
We currently have a 1 bedroom 1 bath available February 8, 2019. The unit includes wood floors throughout and vinyl floors, new blinds, new paint, gas stove, refrigerator, kitchen and bathroom. Paid water, no laundry facility on site but there is a laundry facility with short walking distance. Clean, quiet complex that is near bus lines,schools, restaurants, grocery stores, freeway. Great location and very convenient for commuters. Non Smoking Building. Pictures are of another unit but same exact layout. 
Must have good credit, make 3's the rent and no evictions. No section 8 or subsidized programs.

The community is professional managed by Castle Management.

title: $2000 / 1br - 1080ft2 - Beautifully Furnished Condo For Rent in AOKLAND (oakland east)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        

Unique opportunity to live in one of San Francisco's oldest buildings. This National Historic Landmark building with its converted live/work lofts has retained much of its original brick and old world charm while offering contemporary living. Open floor plan flows nicely from entry, front room, kitchen, dining area, through living room. Kitchen is smartly remodeled with gorgeous granite counter tops and high end appliances. Kitchen island provides extra work and entertaining space. Beautiful solid hickory wood flooring flows throughout the unit. Washer/dryer in unit. Fern lined courtyard gives complex an upscale relaxed feel. Building perfectly located, just steps off Embarcadero. Walk the water's edge to the Ferry Building or ball park.

title: $1999 / 2br - 750ft2 - Sophisticated in the Hot Laurel District (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Set far back from the street, this sophisticated apartment has been newly painted with a beautiful palate of colors, lovely moldings throughout, new light fixtures, new hardwood floors.   The kitchen has newer cabinets, beautiful sparkling granite counter tops, stainless steel French door GE refrigerator, garbage disposal and stainless dishwasher.  The bathroom has a new vanity and granite countertop, with a new tile shower and floor.   The apartment comes with deck.
There are new high efficiency washers and dryers on site (very nice, you barely need a dry cleaner).  Comes with one parking place.  
Located in the Laurel district above 580, 10 minutes to downtown Oakland, and 10 minutes to a nearby BART station. There are commuter buses on Mac Arthur Blvd.  Easy walking distance to shops, cafes, banks, grocery stores, a new gym, post office and a great hardware store.  Tenants in the building are friendly and inviting. Sorry no dogs but cats welcomed, and sorry no section 8.
To get there: go to 3724 Maybelle Ave.  There is a driveway to the right of the house.  Please park on the street and walk up the driveway to the apartment building with the red door, the address is 3726 Maybelle.
Tenants pay utilities: garbage is $40.00 per month and water is $40.00.  Security deposit is the same as the rent.                                        
Feel free to call me at  show contact info

title: $1850 / 1br - 700ft2 - The Sophisticated Apartment You've Been Looking For Meow! (oakland hills / mills)
body:
QR Code Link to This Post
            
        
Set far back from the street, this sophisticated apartment has been newly painted with a beautiful palate of colors, lovely moldings throughout, and new light fixtures. Floors in living areas are newly refinished and are a deep rich  cherry.  The apartment comes with deck.
There are new high efficiency washers and dryers on site (very nice, you barely need a dry cleaner).  Comes with one parking place.  
Located in the Laurel district above 580, 10 minutes to downtown Oakland, and 10 minutes to a nearby BART station. There are commuter buses on Mac Arthur Blvd.  Easy walking distance to shops, cafes, banks, grocery stores, a new gym, post office and a great hardware store.  Tenants in the building are friendly and inviting. Sorry no dogs but cats welcomed, and sorry no section 8.
To get there: go to 3724 Maybelle Ave.  There is a driveway to the right of the house.  Please park on the street and walk up the driveway to the apartment building with the red door, the address is 3726 Maybelle.
Tenants pay utilities: garbage is $30.00 per month and water is $30.00 per person.  Security deposit is the same as the rent.                                        
Feel free to call me at  show contact info
 direct, and I will be delighted to meet you there.
Sorry no dogs, but cats are Meow welcome.

All the comforts of home and all the beauty of an apartment home are waiting for you at Sundance Apartments at Vallejo Ranch. This carefully planned community offers a quiet, private setting with dramatic panoramic views. Surrounded by beautiful, mature landscaping, every Sundance Apartment is as attractive as it is spacious.
